item.trans: art. 一；任一；每一 row A in a cinema电影院第一排座位
vt. 绑架；诱拐；使外展 同义词:spirit, kidnap The police caught the terrorist who tried to abduct the girl for ransom.警察抓住了那个企图拐走这女孩以便勒索赎金的恐怖分子。
vt. 废除，废止；取消，革除 同义词:recall, suppress to abolish slavery废除奴隶制
n. 废奴主义者；废除主义者 He had also been an ardent abolitionist and a founding -father of the Republican Party .他也曾是一名积极的废除主义者和共和党的创立者。
n. 废除；取消 同义词:withdrawal, cancellation, abolition to abrogate an old law废除一项旧法令
adv. 突然地；唐突地 同义词:suddenly, shortly, sharp to abrupt one’s visit突然中断访问

acid 【生物化学】脱落酸[略作ABA,亦称作 abscisin Ⅱ, dormin, 参较 brassin, cytokinin]
in the light from temperature and wind effects may increase their abscisic acid content some 40 - fold .同样，在光下由于温度和风的作用而萎蔫的植物，它们的脱落酸含量可以增加约40倍。
n. [数][天] 横坐标；横线 同义词:x axis, horizontal line This paper presents a method to calculate the short circuit current of an abscissa compensation circuit .以电力系统中常见的串联补偿电路为研究对象，提出了一种新的分析方法——级数分析法。
adj. 绝对的；完全的；专制的 n. 绝对；绝对事物 同义词:strict, complete, full, positive, total an absolute truth绝对真理
n. 节制；节欲；戒酒；禁食 同义词:temperateness, denial The doctor prescriBed abstinence .医生嘱咐病人戒酒。
vt. 使……加快；使……增速 vi. 加速；促进；增加 同义词:improve, increase speed to accelerate one's steps加快步伐

vt. 使用；存取；接近 n. 进入；使用权；通路 同义词:make use of, fashion, employ, border, exercise, opening, admittance Bank customers can access their checking accounts instantly through the electronic system.银行户主可通过电子系统即刻查找自己的支票活期存款账户。(或：银行客户可通过电子系统立即取出活期存款。)
adj. 意外的；偶然的；附属的；临时记号的 n. 次要方面；非主要的特性；临时记号 同义词:unexpected, sudden, subsidiary, surprising, occasional Was she an accidental victim , in the wrong place at the wrong time ?或者只是一场意外——在错误的时间出现在错误的地点？
adj. 服水工的，适应的

n. 住处，膳宿；调节；和解；预订铺位 同义词:residence, adjustment, conditioning There is a familiar pattern in which youngsters turn to the movement for accommodation and then agree to follow a regime of fasting and prayer .一般最常见的模式是：年轻人为了找到栖身之所而投靠葛兰运动组织，接着便同意遵守禁食和祈祷的生活制度。

n. 符合；一致；协议；自愿 vt. 使一致；给予 vi. 符合；一致 同义词:agreement, unity, identity, keeping, consensus, afford, allow, deal, extend, deliver, cotton, identify, square, meet with, correspond with to accord disputes调解争端
adv. 因此，于是；相应地；照著 同义词:therefore, hence, consequently, thus, then Please amend your copy of the contract accordingly .请将你的合同副本做相应地修正。

n. [会计] 账户；解释；[会计] 账目，账单；理由 vi. 解释；导致；报账 vt. 认为；把…视为 同义词:interpretation, explanation, construction, sake, reason, result in, to interpret, count, find, guess, feel, rate He was accounted a merciful man.他被人看做是一位仁者。
vi. 产生；自然增长或利益增加 vt. 获得；积累 同义词:result, breed, acquire, earn, buy, score, find The interest accrued to our account.我们存款长了利息。
vi. 默许；勉强同意 同义词:connive to acquiesce halfheartedly in a business plan半心半意地同意一项商业计划
adj. [医] 后天的；已获得的；已成习惯的 v. 取得；捕获（acquire的过去分词） 同义词:aposteriori, captured, grabbed to acquire an education受教育
n. 获得物，获得 同义词:getting, procurement, winning For the museum had no acquisition policy .博物馆没有任何收购政策。

n. 赦免；无罪开释；履行；尽职；（债务等的）清偿 同义词:implementation, tender, fulfillment But in jury trials , which were introduced in all Russian regions except Chechnya in 2002 , the acquittal rate is about 20%.而在陪审团审理（2002年，俄罗斯除车臣以外的其它地区都引入了这一制度）的案件中，宣判无罪的案件占到大约20%。
n. [有化] 吖啶（一种医药原料） Acridine to time , and you Fast !吖，到时间了，你们快走！
adj. 丙烯酸的 Perspex lenses have long since been replaced by acrylic ones .有机玻璃晶状体很久以来已被丙烯酸的代替。
vt. 刺激；使活动；使活泼；使产生放射性 vi. 激活；有活力 同义词:stimulate, fan, motivate, needle activate a recording device开动一个录音装置
vt. 开动（机器等）；促使，驱使；激励（人等） 同义词:bring, stimulate, gear, force, power to actuate a machine开动机器
vt. 对…施行针刺疗法 n. 针刺；[中医] 针刺疗法 同义词:needling, pinprick Perhaps acupuncture also sends messages through the nerves .或许针灸疗法也通过神经传递信息。
adj. 严重的，[医] 急性的；敏锐的；激烈的；尖声的 同义词:serious, bad, keen In short the joy was ephemeral and the hangover acute .简言之，欢乐是短暂的，纵情后的头痛是严重的。

adj. 固执的，坚强的；坚定不移的；坚硬无比的 n. 坚硬的东西；坚石 同义词:fixed, strong, persistent, tough, steel, solid rock But it is adamant that it would not do the deal if it did not believe that Geely would be a "responsible future owner ".但是福特公司坚持认为，如果吉利公司不能成为一个“未来称职的所有者”，他们将拒绝同吉利签订协议。
n. 添加；[数] 加法；增加物 同义词:add, accretion addition , fund managers can lack bargaining power .此外，基金管理者缺乏议价能力。
n. 添加剂，添加物 adj. 附加的；[数] 加法的 同义词:addition agent, make weight, attached, plus, more, second, excess Some food additive are regarded as beneficial by the manufacturer .有些食品添加物，生产者认为是有用的。
adj. 脂肪的；肥胖的 n. 动物脂肪 同义词:fatty, round, adeps Actually , reducing weight is subtractive " adipose " , is not moisture .其实，减肥是减去“脂肪”，而不是水分。
adj. 邻近的，毗连的 同义词:nearby, neighbor China owns indisputable sovereignty over the Nansha Islands and their adjacent waters .中方对南沙群岛及其附近海域拥有无可争辩的主权。

adj. 邻接的；毗连的 v. 邻接（adjoin的ing形式） 同义词:adjacent, conterminal A city of east-central Illinois adjoining Urbana. It was founded in 1855 with the coming of the railroad . Population , 63, 502.美国伊利诺斯州中东部一城市，与乌巴马毗邻处的。1855年随着铁路的修建而建立。人口63，502。
n. 裁定；判决；破产之宣告 同义词:sentence, award, ruling Most of procedural law is addressed to the problem of adjudication of disputes in court .大多数程序法是用于在法庭上调解纠纷的。
n. 警告 同义词:warning, caveat The admonition was prompted by Bush's rebuke of how China stifles free speech and religion .告诫源于布什指责中国是如何压制言论自由和宗教自由。
vt. 采取；接受；收养；正式通过 vi. 采取；过继 同义词:assume, take in sth The committee ultimately adopted his suggestions.委员会最终采纳了他的建议。
adj. 肾上腺的 n. 肾上腺 同义词:suprarenal, suprarenal gland, paranephros The outer layer of an internal organ or body structure , as of the kidney or adrenal gland .皮层内部器官或身体结构的外层，如肾或肾上腺皮层。
adj. 阿谀的，奉承的；谄媚的 同义词:gnathonic, flattering Husband ( one face is adulatory ) : Hey , do not want to eat .老公（一脸谄媚）：嘿嘿，不想吃。

adj. 对抗的；对手的，敌手的 同义词:confrontational, oppositional A lawyer , she 'd brought peace to warlike situations all her life , whether dealing with family conflicts or the adversarial legal system .不论是处理家庭纷争还是对抗性的法律制度面前，她是一辈子都在给火药味的场面带去和平的律师。

adj. 不利的；相反的；敌对的（名词adverseness，副词adversely） 同义词:against, contrary, opposite, counter, cross A second error was that Japan tried to offset the adverse economic effects of a strong yen with over- lax monetary policy .第二个错误是日本试图用过度宽松的货币政策来冲销强势日元带来的负面经济效应。
adj. 需氧的；增氧健身法的 同义词:oxybiotic The slime layer consists of aerobic and one anaerobic sublayer .粘膜层由好气分层和厌气分层所组成。
n. 航空学；飞行术 同义词:aviation, airmanship Resin matrix composites are significant structural materials in the fields of astronautics and aeronautics .树脂基复合材料是航空、航天领域中的新型重要结构材料。
n. [物化] 气溶胶；气雾剂；喷雾器；浮质 adj. 喷雾的；喷雾器的 同义词:atomizer, nebulizer, sprayed This year , the scientists are measuring the heaviest aerosol pollution on Earth .今年，科学家们将研究地球上最严重的空气悬浮微粒污染问题。
n. 密切关系；吸引力；姻亲关系；类同 同义词:appeal, charm He soon developed an affinity for certain stamps and countries .他不久就渐渐地被某些国家的邮票所吸引。
vt. 折磨；使痛苦；使苦恼 同义词:harry, worry, trouble, tear, devil She has been much afflicted by this sad news.她为此不幸的消息感到很难过。
n. 富裕；丰富；流入；汇聚 同义词:abundance, plenty, pregnancy, amplitude, richness Is this wave of affluence a chimera or does it have solid underpinnings?这波富裕的浪潮纯粹是海市蜃楼还是会奔流不息呢？
adv. 冲撞着，纠缠着 adj. 纠缠的，冲撞的 同义词:tangled, matted The cowboy tried to throw a lasso but the rope afoul of a branch .这放牛娃想甩绳索，可绳子缠到一根树枝上了。
n. 后果；余波 同义词:sequel, backwash In the immediate aftermath , the United States showed signs of what makes it great .直接的后果是美国表现出了是什么让它拥有伟大气质的原因。
n. 议程；日常工作事项 This is a sensible agenda .这是一项明智的议程。
vt. 加重；使恶化；激怒 同义词:anger, complicate The bad weather aggravated his illness.坏天气加重了他的病情。
n. [地质][数] 聚合，聚集；聚集体，集合体 同义词:collection, polymerization, clustering, gather The main reason of aggregation is caused by the biology of the lady beetle .聚集的原因主要是由其自身习性所致。
adj. 土地的；耕地的；有关土地的 同义词:ground, earth's This roughly tracks the passage from poverty to middle - income status and from an agrarian society to a modern one.这基本可以显示一个从贫穷到中等收入发展的一个过程和从农业社会到现代社会的发展过程。
n. 小病；不安 同义词:tension, unrest He got timely treatment for his ailment .他的病得到了及时治疗。
n. 麦芽酒 同义词:yill Lead cups were used to drink ale or whiskey .铅制的杯子用来喝麦芽酒或威士忌。
n. [作物] 苜蓿；紫花苜蓿 同义词:lucerne, medick In this enlargement , barley , alfalfa , and sugar beets can be differentiated .在这张放大的照片上，大麦，苜蓿和甜菜都能被区分开。
n. [植] 藻类；[植] 海藻 同义词:seaweed, varech The existing projects , though , are looking at freshwater algae .虽然现在的计划正着眼于淡水藻类。
n. 代数学 These skills are needed for algebra .这个知识是代数所必需的。
vt. 使疏远，离间；让与 同义词:release, convey Her behavior alienated her friends.她的行为使自己跟朋友们疏远了。
adj. 碱性的，碱的 At the moment , seawater is alkaline — but it is becoming less so all the time.此刻，海水本是碱性的——但一直以来碱性正变得越来越弱。
n. 效忠，忠诚；忠贞 同义词:loyalty, devotion For as long as the world economy was growing fast , financial markets commanded grudging allegiance .在世界经济发展迅速的时候，金融市场得到了勉强的忠诚。
n. 过敏症；反感；厌恶 同义词:hate, hypersensitivity Avoiding whatever causes an allergy may not always be easy .避免任何一种过敏原因都不太容易。
vt. 减轻，缓和 同义词:moderate, relax to alleviate postoperation pain减轻手术后的疼痛
n. 短吻鳄（产于美国及中国）；短吻鳄皮革；鳄口式工具 vi. 皱裂；裂开 adj. 鳄鱼般的；鳄鱼皮革的；鳄鱼皮纹的 同义词:gator, aligator, gap, seam They said , uh , " See ya later, alligator ".他们说，啊，“一会见，小鳄鱼”
vt. 允许；给予；认可 vi. 容许；考虑 同义词:afford, let, have, deal, extend, think of, think about They allowed the children to go to the park.他们让孩子们到公园去。
n. 津贴，零用钱；允许；限额 vt. 定量供应 同义词:permission, quota, pension, subsidy, ration to allowance a pound of meat定量配给一磅肉

n. 公立救济院；私立济贫院或养老院 Public general hospital originated in the almshouse infirmaries established as early as colonial times by local governments to care for the poor .公立医院脱胎于殖民地初期救济院的医务所，这些机构是地方政府为穷人修建的。

adj. 供选择的；选择性的；交替的 n. 二中择一；供替代的选择 同义词:selective, vicissitudinary An alternative to the all red bouquet is to buy some white roses and insert one red one in the center of the bunch.一种花束与所有都是红色花朵的花束不一样是，去购买一些白色的玫瑰穿插在红色的玫瑰花束中。
n. 高地；高度；[数] 顶垂线；（等级和地位等的）高级 同义词:height, raise, elevation, rise Helicopters perform poorly in hot weather and at high altitude .直升机在天气炎热和海拔较高时表现不佳。
n. 女低音；男声最高音；中音乐器 adj. 中音部的 同义词:contralto, countertenor Alto boasted 36 percent more men than women .帕洛阿尔托一度吹嘘其男性人口超出女性人口36％。
n. 男校友；男毕业生（alumnus的复数） Some have set up networks to help place students with firms run by alumni .有些，建立人际关系网，将毕业生安插在校友经营的公司里。
n. [材] 汞合金，[化工] 汞齐；混合物 同义词:mixture, hybrid, mix, compound Objective : To analyze the clinical observations about amalgam post and core of molar .目的：对银汞桩核用于磨牙修复进行临床观察和分析。
vt. 积聚，积累 同义词:pile up, store up She amassed her papers for her memoirs.她把文件汇集起来准备写回忆录。

n. 爱好者；业余爱好者；外行 adj. 业余的；外行的 同义词:lover, fan, strange, leisure, lay Martinez of the University of Texas Health Science Center at San Antonio, using amateur tango dancers as subjects .合作，邀请业馀探戈舞者为研究对象，进行了第一个舞蹈动作的脑造影研究。
n. 含糊；不明确；暧昧；模棱两可的话 同义词:vagueness, opacity But it may also be an ambiguity of convenience.但也可能是因用语习惯而造成的模糊。
n. [心理] 矛盾情绪；正反感情并存 But lately ambivalence is turning into out -and- out royalism .但是近来，这种矛盾的情绪逐渐转变成彻底的君权思想。
adj. 矛盾的；好恶相克的 同义词:contradictory, conflictive Are you contradictory/ ambivalent now ?你现在是不是很矛盾？
vt. 修改；改善，改进 vi. 改正，改善；改过自新 同义词:modify, to make better, go straight, straighten up It's time you amended your ways.是你改过自新的时候了。
adj. 和蔼可亲的，亲切的 同义词:pleasant, friendly, sweet, benign Amiable Style : Human Resources Manager . Very people- focused .和蔼型：人力资源部经理、非常以人为本。
adj. 氨基的 n. [化学] 氨基 同义词:amido, amidogen These sites include , carboxyl , epoxy , amino and the like .这些部位包括羧基、羰基、环氧基和氨基等。
n. 健忘症，[内科] 记忆缺失 Amnesia is a loss of memory .健忘是一种记忆的丢失。
n. 苯丙胺，安非他明（解除忧郁、疲劳的药） 同义词:Benzedrine Amphetamine is a drug that stimulates the central nervous system .安非他命是一种会刺激中枢神经系统的毒品。
adj. 丰富的；足够的；宽敞的 同义词:abundant, sufficient, competent, full, plenty He had ample opportunity to reaffirm his basic ideological commitment .他曾多次有机会重申他的基本思想信念。
art. 一（在元音字母前） to bake an apple pie烤一个苹果馅饼
n. 时代错误；不合潮流的人或物 Contemporary monarchy is anachronism .英国是君主政体。
adj. [微] 厌氧的，[微] 厌气的；没有气而能生活的 同义词:anerobic Segregation of fatty material is a serious problem in anaerobic sludge digestion units .厌氧污泥消化单元中脂肪物质的分离是个难题。
n. 止痛剂；[药] 镇痛剂 adj. 止痛的 同义词:paregoric, anodyne, painkilling, antalgic OBJECTIVE To observe the anti- inflammatory and analgesic effects of diclofenac potassium spray .目的观察双氯芬酸钾喷雾剂的抗炎镇痛作用。
n. 解剖；解剖学；剖析；骨骼 同义词:cadre, dissection Is it harassment if a man stares at a woman 's anatomy , or tells an off- color joke ?如果一个男人瞪着眼睛看一个女人的生理部位，或说“黄色”笑话，这是不是性骚扰？
n. 始祖，祖先；被继承人 同义词:father, root, grandfather Our grandfathers ancestored some of the well-known families in Beijing.我们的祖父辈是北京几家望族的祖先。
adj. 轶事的；轶事一样的；多轶事的 She said the figure anecdotal because no formal survey of dealers had been conducted.她说这个数字有些不经，因为并未对销售商们有正式的调研。
n. 贫血；贫血症 同义词:anaemia, sickle cell disease The doctors analyzed the blood sample for anemia .医生们分析了贫血的血样。
adj. 麻醉的；感觉缺失的 n. 麻醉剂，麻药 同义词:anaesthetic, detoxicant, detoxicator, hasheesh Sir , I cannot do a procedure like this without anesthetic .先生，如果没有麻醉剂，我没法动这个手术。

n. 麻醉药；麻醉剂（anesthetic的复数） 同义词:narcotics Evers , whose team at Washington University has also been involved in searching for novel steroids to use as anesthetics .华盛顿大学麻醉学教授艾佛斯说，「我很惊讶，神经类固醇麻醉剂居然还没有出现。」
vi. 钓鱼；谋取 n. 角度，角 同义词:fish, figure for, hao, jiao Jack angled himself out of the car.杰克弓身下车。
vt. 使有生气；使活泼；鼓舞；推动 adj. 有生命的 同义词:stimulate, lift, spirit, force, drive, lived, zoetic The soul animates the body.灵魂使肉体有生命。

n. 年金，养老金；年金保险；年金享受权 同义词:rente, old-age pension Building enterprise annuity is to receive the share that capture expends him employee not only , also be to achieve earnings .建立企业年金不仅是为了领取员工自己缴费的部分，也是为了获得收益。

adj. 匿名的，无名的；无个性特征的 同义词:faceless, innominate At some point in Italy between 1268 and 1289 someone came up with the idea , but the actual inventor anonymous .在1268-1289之间的某一时刻，意大利的某个人有了发明眼镜的想法，但实际的发明者却不得而知。
n. 疟蚊 同义词:malaria mosquito Carried by the female anopheles mosquito , malaria is a disease of the poor .疟疾由雌性疟蚊传播，是穷人的疾病。

n. 对抗，敌对；对立；敌意 同义词:opposition, war, confrontation In spite of the fighting talk in India , the relationship between India and China holds much more potential than antagonism .尽管印度充斥着好战言论，但中印关系蕴含的潜力远远多过对抗。
adj. （美国南北）战争前的 A city of central Kentucky south of Louisville . It has many antebellum houses . Population , 18, 167.美国路易斯维尔以南肯塔基中部一城市，当地有许多战前的房子。人口18，167。
vt. 先于；前于 n. 比实际提前的日期 to antedate a check倒填支票的日期
adj. 前面的；先前的 同义词:front, foregoing The ciliary body is anterior dilation of the choroid at the level of the lens .晶状体是脉络膜石晶状体平面上向前扩大的部分。
n. （诗、文、曲、画等的）选集 同义词:selection, selected works He edited that anthology of poems.那本诗集由他主编。
adj. 人类学的；人类学上的 Since photography have all the anthropological illusion , it loses its anthropological attributes by going into from the end of beauty .摄影虽然有着人类学的幻觉，但如果从美这一头进入，它的人类学特点就失去了。
n. 抗生素；抗生学 同义词:microbiotic Antibiotics can cause disorders of water and salt metabolism .抗菌素能引起水、盐代谢的紊乱。
n. [免疫] 抗体 Our end product is an anti-cancer antibody .我们的最终产品是一种抗癌抗体。
adj. 虎头蛇尾的；突降法的；突减的 The vote itself anticlimactic , coming three weeks after the close of my defense .在我的辩护结束后三周才投票，这本身就令人觉得没劲。
n. [药] 解毒剂；解药；矫正方法 They kept whiskey to antidote themselves against snake bike.他们保存威士忌酒以便在被蛇咬时用以解毒。
n. [助剂] 防冻剂 同义词:deicing agent They think the genes for antifreeze proteins jumped from one species to another .他们猜想抗冻蛋白的基因可从一个物种跳跃到另一个物种。
n. [免疫] 抗原 He found that YF17D lets them live and continue to fulfill their antigen - presenting function .莱斯发现YF17D可以让树突细胞继续存活，并继续执行它们呈现抗原的功能。
n. 正相反的事物；[有化] 对映体 同义词:enantiomer The antipode of love is hatred .爱的反面是恨。
adj. 治疗精神病的，抗精神病的 n. 安定药 同义词:psychotropic, trank, neuroleptic Haloperidol , an antipsychotic drug , works by blocking dopamine receptors .氟哌啶醇是一种阻挠多巴胺信使的抗精神病药，效果显著。
n. 高龄；古物；古代的遗物 同义词:eld, advanced age His tastes addict him to the study of antiquity .嗜好使他沉迷于研究古代的事物。
n. 对立面；对照；对仗 同义词:comparison, opposite The antithesis of life is death .生的反面是死。
adj. [经] 反垄断的；[经] 反托拉斯的 But these typically are the creation of a legislative process or operate under close antitrust scrutiny .但这些通常是法律程序创建的，或在密切的反垄断监督下运作的。
n. [脊椎] 猿；傻瓜；模仿者 vt. 模仿；抢台词 adj. 狂热的 同义词:stupid, fool, simulate, pattern, imitate, crazy, wild, enthusiastic, fanatical to ape another's style of writing模仿别人的文体
adj. 不定期的；非周期性的 同义词:nonscheduled But article Aperiodic ticket in quantitative analysis is few .但是目前关于这方面定量分析的论文很少。
adj. 不关心政治的；无政治意义的 Mr Khoja remains ever the optimist , though perhaps not entirely apolitical .库拉的乐观一如既往，尽管完全不问政治或许不大可能。
n. 辩护者；护教论者；辨惑学专家（等于apologete） 同义词:defender, justifier a shameless imposter ; an unblushing apologist for fascism .无耻的骗子；为法西斯主义作出的无耻辩护。
n. 药剂师；药师；药材商 同义词:pharmacist, dispenser Does anyone even know what an apothecary is ?有谁知道药师是什么?。
n. 装置，设备；仪器；器官 同义词:device, equipment, installation, furniture, facility, unit, organ That magazine covers all kinds of heating apparatus .那本杂志谈及各种暖气装置。
n. 服装；衣服 vt. 给…穿衣 同义词:clothes, garment, array, wear, thread, dress, clothe He is gorgeously appareled.他穿着华丽。
n. 器具；器械；装置 同义词:device, apparatus, installation, unit, tool a fully applianced bedroom设备齐全的卧室
adj. 可适用的；可应用的；合适的 同义词:becoming, shaped, likely, possible, meet These principles are applicable to all minority nationality areas .这两条对所有少数民族地区都是适用的。
vt. 分配，分派；分摊 同义词:portion, part, proportion to apportion expenses among the three men.在3人之中分摊费用
vt. 理解；逮捕；忧虑 vi. 理解；担心 同义词:see, absorb, read, seize, worry, cotton on The police apprehended the burglars.警察逮捕了那些窃贼。
n. 学徒；生手 vt. 使…当学徒 vi. 当学徒 同义词:freshman, fresh hand His father apprenticed him to a barber.他父亲送他去当理发师的徒弟。
n. 认可；赞许；批准 同义词:confirmation, authorization, endorsement Father smiled his approval [ approbation ].爸爸笑了笑表示同意[满意]。

n. 拨款；挪用 同义词:grant, embezzlement The large-scale appropriation of farmland in recent years for housing and factory construction has rendered millions of farmers landless .近些年大规模占用耕地建住宅与厂房，已致使数百万农民无地可耕。

adj. 水生的；水栖的；在水中或水面进行的 n. 水上运动；水生植物或动物 同义词:acquatic, aquicolous The major bones in human knees , backs and wrists arose in aquatic creatures hundreds of millions of years ago .人类的膝盖、背部及手腕的主要骨骼发展，在数亿年前的水生动物阶段便已经定型。
adj. 适于耕种的；可开垦的 n. 耕地 同义词:tillable, cultivated land, tilth It is on the arable " construction " land that the latest policy offers something new .在用作建筑的非耕地方面，最新的政策倒是有些新的内容。
adj. [数] 任意的；武断的；专制的 同义词:artificial, random, absolute But the subtext of that old saw , that beauty is arbitrary , is wrong .可是这句古老格言”美丽是主观臆断的“的潜台词是错误的。
n. 公断人，仲裁人 同义词:moderator, daysman The judgment of an arbitrator or arbiter.仲裁者或公断人的判决。
adj. 神秘的；晦涩难解的；秘传的 同义词:mysterious, uncanny That Tony Blair was willing to risk his future over the arcane details of university finance was indeed gratifying .托尼'布莱尔愿意在这项不可思议的大学融资措施上以他的前途冒险，这确实令人欣慰。
n. 考古学家 Hawass, a famed archaeologist and Egyptologist , said the man 's name is Imhesy .哈瓦斯是著名的考古学家和埃及古物学家，他说这名男子叫伊米艾斯。
n. 主要敌人，大敌；撒旦，魔王 同义词:Satan, devil Her archenemy and final target is Onigen , the leader of the demons.她的主要敌人和最终目标是邪恶之首魅源。
n. 档案，档案室；案卷（archive的复数） v. 把…收集归档；把…存档（archive的三单形式） 同义词:records, portfolios to vote on archiving the city's historic documents对收集归档的该市有历史意义的文件进行投票表决
adj. 热情的；热心的；激烈的；燃烧般的 同义词:intense, acute, warm, eager, tropical I believe the Olympic Games must be ardent in this year .我相信今年的奥运会一定会开的红红火火！
n. 区域，地区；面积；范围 同义词:district, region, extent, boundary, spectrum, territory The area was perfectly round .那区域完全是圆形的。
adj. 干旱的；不毛的，[农] 荒芜的 同义词:hungry, waste, desert These plants will not root in such arid soil .这种植物在这种贫瘠的土地上不会生根。
n. 算术，算法 同义词:algorithm, number At each step , some arithmetic or logical operation is performed on some data .每个步骤中，一些算术和逻辑操作作用在一些数据中。

n. 数组，阵列；排列，列阵；大批，一系列；衣服 vt. 排列，部署；打扮 同义词:series of, clothes, thread, garment, ranging, dress oneself, rank, form Napoleon arrayed his troops for battle.拿破仑部署他的军队以便作战。
n. 动脉；干道；主流 同义词:mainstream, backbone road Roads and railways artery every province.公路和铁路遍布各省。
n. 人工制品；手工艺品 同义词:artefact, handicraft works S. officials handed over the apparently artifact to Egypt 's chief of antiquities .此时美国官员将这具明显的走私品移交给了埃及的文物局长。
n. 工匠，技工 同义词:workman, craftsman Every man is the artisan of his own fortune .每个人都是制造其自身命运的工匠。
vt. 归因于；归咎于 同义词:blame, put down to The alphabet is usually ascribed to the phoenicians.通常把字母表归因于腓尼基人。
n. 中伤，诽谤；洒水 同义词:calumniation, scandal Suddenly , who is knowing in aspersion , be spilled on my foot completely .忽然，不知是谁在洒水，全泼在我脚上了。
n. 窒息 同义词:apnea, suffocation Officials said the three died of asphyxiation .官员们说，三人因窒息而死亡。
vi. 渴望；立志；追求 同义词:rare, long for He aspired to become a lawyer.他渴望成为一名律师。
n. 暗杀，行刺 同义词:thuggism Then , it was a Palestinian assassination attempt on an Israeli diplomat in London .当时是一名巴勒斯坦人企图暗杀以色列驻伦敦的一位外交官。
n. 装配；集会，集合 同义词:concentration, convergence, fishing, set, gathering Shall we start with the assembly line ?咱们从装配线开始看好吗？

n. [天] 小行星；[无脊椎] 海盘车；小游星 adj. 星状的 同义词:planetoid, sunstar, stellated, astroid The good news is that , thanks to more precise measurements , the asteroid is no longer deemed a serious threat .好消息则是多亏了更为精确的测算，这颗小行星不再是确凿无疑的严重威胁了。
n. [内科][中医] 哮喘，气喘 同义词:wheezing Or doctors may misdiagnose it as asthma or another infection .或者医生会误诊为哮喘或者其他传染病。
adj. 机敏的；狡猾的，诡计多端的 同义词:designing, knowing, subtle One is that non- US companies have become more astute about achieving global scale .其一是，非美国公司在实现全球规模方面已经变得更加精明。
adv. 化为碎片地；分离地 adj. 分成碎片的；分离的 同义词:separately, disjunctively, apart, isolated They were violently to be torn asunder at a coming signal .一个既将出现的信号会把他们强行分离得天各一方。

n. 律师；代理人 同义词:lawyer, deputy, agent, factor, secondary Then call attorney .然后就叫律师。

n. 摩擦；磨损；消耗 同义词:friction, consumption Peasants were the pawns in this war of attrition .农夫们成为这场消耗战的被人利用的棋子。
vt. 拍卖；竞卖 n. 拍卖 同义词:be on sale, public sale, vendue It was sad to see all grandfather’s lovely things being auctioned off.看到祖父所有心爱之物在拍卖是令人伤心的。
vi. 审计；[审计] 查帐 n. 审计；[审计] 查帐 vt. （美）旁听 同义词:examine and verify, sit in on The accountants audited the company’s books at the end of the fiscal year.财政年度结束时，会计师们审查公司的账册。

n. 光环；气氛；（中风等的）预兆；气味 同义词:atmosphere, mood, warning, smell, wind Usually the aura precedes the headache , but it may start after the pain begins and persist through it .预兆期症状一般出现在头痛之前，但也可能与头痛同时发生，并持续整个发作期间。
n. [地物] 极光；曙光 同义词:polar lights It was the Great Aurora of 1859 itself that ushered in a new paradigm.实际上，正是1859年这次「大极光事件」确立了新的学说。
adj. 严峻的；简朴的；苦行的；无装饰的 同义词:severe, naked His way of life is rather austere .他的生活方式相当简朴。
adj. 真正的，真实的；可信的 同义词:actual, sincere, genuine, true, real Last - and hardest of all - they need to convey empathy , " in a way that is authentic to them ".最后（也是最难的），他们必须“以一种对他们来说自然而又真诚的方式”，传递出同情心。

n. 自动化；自动操作 同义词:robotization, automatic operation Semantic descriptions of device capabilities and functionality will let us achieve such automation with minimal human intervention.以语意描述设备的性能和功能，将会让我们获得最高的自动化结果。

n. 平均；平均数；海损 adj. 平均的；普通的 vt. 算出…的平均数；将…平均分配；使…平衡 vi. 平均为；呈中间色 同义词:evenness, typical value, mean, ordinary, general to average as expected如所预料平均为

n. 障碍；错误 vt. 阻止；推诿；错过 vi. 犹豫；突然止步不前 同义词:error, mistake, obstacle, let, bar, stem, block, dispute, lose, prohibit, daiker, hang back He balked at making the suggestion.他畏缩不肯提建议。
n. 歌谣，民谣；叙事歌谣；流行抒情歌曲 同义词:derry, volkslied He declared it was like ballad , that he would do his best to help me .他说这真象是一首山歌，说他愿意竭尽全力地帮助我。
adj. 弹道的；射击的 同义词:gunshot With some tweaking , say experts , the ground -based interceptors for shooting down ballistic missiles could be used against satellites .专家们说，只要做些修改，用于击落弹道导弹的地基拦截器就能用来对付卫星。
n. 破产 同义词:failure, insolvency, improverishment The other extreme is declaring bankruptcy .另一个极端是宣布破产。

n. 条，棒；酒吧；障碍 vt. 禁止；阻拦 prep. 除……外 同义词:rod, staff, obstacle, dam, let, inhibit, forbid You should bar the door before retiring for the night.你晚上睡前应闩上门。
n. 交易；契约；特价商品 vi. 讨价还价；成交 vt. 讨价还价；拿…做交易 同义词:trade, special, truck, compact, bar tack, make a deal, bar tack We refuse to bargain over the price.我们拒绝在价格上讨价还价。
n. 男中音；男中音歌手 adj. 男中音的 同义词:barytone intermediate between alto and baritone or bass .（指乐器）介于次高音和中音（或者低音）之间。

adj. 巴洛克式的；结构复杂的，形式怪样的 n. 巴洛克风格；巴洛克艺术 Festivals , attended by aristocrats and the public, were a feature of the baroque courts .节假日期间，贵族和平民同时到访已经成为巴洛克展厅的一大特点。
vt. 把……装入桶内 n. 桶；枪管，炮管 vi. 快速移动 同义词:bucket, pail, skirr They planned to barrel the beer next Monday.他们打算下星期一把啤酒装桶。
n. 基础；底部；垒 adj. 卑鄙的；低劣的 vt. 以…作基础 同义词:basis, elements, foundation, bed, bottom, poor, mean, dirty The U.S. squadron was based on the carrier.美国空军中队以这艘航空母舰为基地。
n. 篮子编织技艺；篮筐 Sculptures , Basketry , Masks , Stools , Baskets , and Statues.采购产品雕刻，篮细工，面具，凳子，篮子。
n. 营，军营；军队，部队 同义词:army, unit, force A battalion of about 500 men typically produces about a tonne of waste every day .一个营大约500人，通常情况下每天产生一吨废物。
prep. 在，存在；是 同义词:at Caesar is no more.恺撒已不复存在了。
adj. 幸福的；祝福的；快乐的 同义词:happy, blessed, festival My world was a beatific pleasure ground in your hand . Nobody could put up the shutters except you .这个世界是你手中的幸福游乐场，除了你，谁都不能叫它打烊。
n. 命令；邀请；请求 同义词:instruction, order, bidding, asking, request But some people close to him say key appointments are made and unmade behest .但据内塔尼亚胡的亲信透露，一些关键的任命都是由萨拉决定的。
n. 恩人；捐助者；施主 同义词:contributor, doner Scrooge later became Tiny Tim 's benefactor .斯克路基后来成了蒂尼·蒂姆的保护人。

n. 背叛；辜负；暴露 同义词:reveal, defection She left because of hatred . All women hate betrayal .她离开了因为怨恨。所有的女人都憎恨背叛。
n. 长辈；较好者；打赌的人（等于bettor） adv. 更好的；更多的；较大程度地 adj. 较好的 vt. 改善；胜过 vi. 变得较好 同义词:elder, seniority, improve, overcome, exceed, cap They have bettered last month's production record.他们已超过上月生产记录。
n. 饮料 同义词:drink, belly-wash, bevvy Drinking a glass of water after every alcoholic beverage helps stave off drunkenness .每次喝完酒精饮品后再喝杯水，这样就不容易醉了。

vt. 迷住，迷惑 同义词:possess, spell The children were captivated by his thrilling story.孩子们听他讲惊险故事听得入了迷。

vt. 俘获；夺得 n. 捕获；战利品，俘虏 同义词:snatch, taking, prize, acquiring They captured more than ten thousand prisoners and large quantities of arms in that campaign.他们在那次战役中俘获了一万多战俘和大量武器。
n. [有化] 碳水化合物；[有化] 糖类 同义词:glucide, saccharide Don't eat so much carbohydrate !别吃太多碳水化合物！
n. 致癌物质 Colgate-Palmolive 's toothpaste was said to contain a carcinogen .高露洁的牙膏也被说含有致癌物质。
n. 强心剂；强胃剂 adj. 心脏的；心脏病的；（胃的）喷门 同义词:metrazol, cordis But the size of those cardiac patches has been limited .但是那些心脏修补的大小是受限制的。
adj. 心肺的；与心肺有关的 Cardiopulmonary resuscitation , or CPR , is help for a stopped heart .心肺复苏或者CPR对停止的心脏有所帮助。
adj. [解剖] 心血管的 These are used to measure the presence and development of cardiovascular disease .它们被用来估量心血管疾病的存在和发展。
n. 货物，船货 同义词:commodity, freight, merchandise This boat was cargoed with bananas and oranges.这只船装载着香蕉和橘子。
n. 漫画；讽刺画；漫画手法 vt. 画成漫画讽刺 Her smiling face has often been caricatured on the front covers of magazines.她的笑脸常在杂志的封面上被画成漫画。
n. [口腔] 龋齿；骨疡；骨溃疡 同义词:decayed tooth, saprodontia Could you point out a single picture from the book and tell the story it caries ?你能不能指出一个单一的图片，并从书中讲述它龋？
vi. 欢乐地歌唱；唱耶诞颂歌 n. 颂歌，赞美诗；欢乐之歌 vt. 欢唱；歌颂 同义词:epithalamion, canticle, praise, pay a tribute to They often went carolling at Christmas.他们在圣诞节时常去挨门挨户地唱圣诞颂歌。
n. 腕骨 adj. 腕骨的 Lucky , I don't suffer from carpal tunnel syndrome , but I've had some stress issues with my wrists .幸运地是，我没有得腕管综合症，不过，对手腕还有哟一些压迫问题。
n. 卡特尔；企业联合；垄断联盟；俘虏交换条约 同义词:kartell The IEA even warned of the possible formation of a cartel for natural gas .国际能源机构甚至警告称，可能会形成一个天然气垄断组织。
n. 制图师；地图制作者 同义词:mapmaker Cartographer is a simple , efficient object relational mapper engine.这是个简单、效的对象-关系映射工具。
n. 层叠；小瀑布；喷流 vi. 像瀑布般冲下或倾泻 v. 使瀑布似地落下 同义词:stack-up The price of a television set cascaded to 320 pounds last week.电视机价格上周暴跌到每台320镑。
n. 现款，现金 vt. 将…兑现；支付现款 同义词:ready, real money The bank will cash your cheque.银行会把你的支票兑成现金。
n. 意外事故；伤亡人员；急诊室 同义词:contretemps, fortuity Free the nose and mouth of a casualty from dust and grit to ease breathing .替伤员清理一下鼻子和嘴里的尘土、沙砾，使其呼吸顺畅些。
n. [图情][计] 目录；登记 vt. 登记；为…编目录 vi. 编目录；按确定价格收入目录（等于catalogue） 同义词:registration, directory, entry, content, list, register, book in So every book catalog has a title card .这么说，目录柜中每本书都有一张书名卡。
n. 目录；（美）大学情况一览 vt. 把…编入目录 同义词:directory, content, list He catalogued all the insects in his collection.他将所收集的昆虫编成目录。
n. [物化] 催化剂；刺激因素 同义词:fuel, activator But a catalyst to shift a generation ?但是这能不能促使一代人转变？
n. 大灾难；大祸；惨败 同义词:fiasco, smashup Third , once the risks of financial catastrophe have passed , rapid easing can be mirrored by equally rapid tightening .第三，一旦金融危机的风险过去，快速的放松可以通过同样快速的收紧反映出来。
n. 种类，分类；[数] 范畴 同义词:variety, classification, kind, manner, sort, nature " Middle- class " describes an income category but also a set of attitudes .“中产阶级”描述的不仅是一种收入分类，亦是一套看法。
vt. 投合，迎合；满足需要；提供饮食及服务 同义词:humor, meet the demand He has a small hotel and also caters for weddings and funerals.他开了一家小旅馆，并承办红白喜事的酒席。
n. [无脊椎] 毛虫；履带车 adj. 有履带装置的 同义词:palmerworm, eruca Then take the caterpillar to the fire place , and say ' Come out fire ! ', then the fire will come out .然后拿毛毛虫放在煮饭的地方，说『火出来，』火就会出来。
n. 大教堂 同义词:minster, duomo His most famous creation is the unfinished cathedral known as the Sagrada Familia .他最出名的作品就是尚未完工的神圣家族大教堂。
n. 警告；中止诉讼手续的申请；货物出门概不退换；停止支付的广告 同义词:warning, admonition Another caveat : all numbers are subject to revision , perhaps years later .另一个告诫：或许几年过后，所有数据都要修订。
n. 鱼子酱 I don't live for caviar .我可不是为了吃鱼子酱才活着。
n. 雪松；香柏；西洋杉木 同义词:cedrus The drawer - bottom was cedar of Lebanon , for the smell .抽屉底用的是黎巴嫩杉木，是为了取其气味。
n. 名人；名声 同义词:personality, lion, fame " Law firms are trawling their celebrity client base, " he says .“律所正拖网打捞他们的名人客户”，他说道。
adj. 天上的，天空的 n. 神仙，天堂里的居民 同义词:heavenly, ethereal, jinnee, djinni The angular distance of celestial body below the horizon .在地平线以下消失；指太阳和月亮等天体。
vt. 责难，责备 n. 责难 vi. 谴责，责备 同义词:impugn, decry, decrial, dyslogy, accuse of, blame for The traffic policeman censured the driver but didn't fine him.交通警察严厉地批评了这位汽车司机，但对他没有进行罚款。
vt. 实施统计调查 n. 人口普查，人口调查 同义词:lustrum, nose-count Census Bureau says an immigrant enters the country every 31 seconds .人口普查局称每31秒就有一个移民进入美国。
n. 中心，中央；中锋；中心点 vi. 居中，被置于中心 vt. 集中，使聚集在一点；定中心 adj. 中央的，位在正中的 同义词:focus, hub, middle, mediate, concentrate, localise, mid, ental Is this right subway to the Rockefeller Center ?这就是去洛克菲勒中心的地铁吗？

adj. [力] 离心的；远中的 n. 离心机；转筒 同义词:acentric, exodic, revolving drum, rotating drum Centrifugal casting , compact structure , free from pinhole porosity and slag , smooth surface and even wall thickness .高速离心铸造，组织致密，无砂眼、夹渣，表面光滑、壁厚均匀。
adj. 陶瓷的；陶器的；制陶艺术的 n. 陶瓷；陶瓷制品 同义词:keramic, vitrified, cer, pottery and porcelain Why have I described somebody 's real ceramic elephant sitting on the mantel -piece ?为什么我要如实地描写某人安放在壁炉台上的那只陶瓷大象呢？
n. 谷类，谷物；谷类食品；谷类植物 adj. 谷类的；谷类制成的 同义词:corn, grain, corny In Canada , we eat cereal for breakfast .在加拿大，我们早饭吃麦片粥。
adj. 仪式的；正式的，礼仪的 n. 仪式，礼节 同义词:formal, official, state, service, etiquette We should wear formal dress on ceremonial occasion .在正式场合，我们应穿着正式。
n. 停止；中止；中断 同义词:stop, break, stay, hang, stand The crisis led to a cessation of the hallmarks of Indus elite culture .这项危机导致印度河菁英阶层文化特徵的中断。
n. 一种轻马车（通常有车蓬，尤指单马双轮者） And her agitated hand waved to them from a chaise window , and she was gone .她从车窗里向他们挥动着激动的手，走了。
n. 杯；圣餐杯；酒杯 同义词:calix, grail The leadership of North Korea could be a poisoned chalice .朝鲜领导层有点像一只被下毒的圣杯。
n. （身体或器官内的）室，膛；房间；会所 adj. 室内的；私人的，秘密的 vt. 把…关在室内；装填（弹药等） 同义词:apartment, room, indoor, private, secret, underground, inside, load He was chambered in a narrow basement.他被关进一个狭窄的地下室里。
n. 变色龙；善变的人；轻浮的人 同义词:anole, Zelig The chameleon on a mirror riddle is best kept in idealized form as a thought experiment .这个镜子上的变色龙的谜语作为一个思想实验，最好是保持在它思考的形式里。

vi. 烧焦；打杂 n. 炭；家庭杂务 vt. 把…烧成炭 同义词:air burn, fetch and carry, chore, coal They are charring wood in a kiln.他们正在窑内将木头烧成木炭。
n. 费用；电荷；掌管；控告；命令；负载 vt. 使充电；使承担；指责；装载；对…索费；向…冲去 vi. 充电；控告；索价；向前冲；记在账上 同义词:fee, instruction, cost, bidding, word, electrify, inflict on, law, sue for The cart was charged to the full.大马车上装得满满的。

vt. 特许；包租；发给特许执照 n. 宪章；执照；特许状 同义词:license, license, patent, permit a chartered accountant持证会计师
n. 沙文主义；盲目的爱国心 同义词:jingoism, kultur We resolutely oppose great power chauvinism .我们坚决反对大国沙文主义。

n. [脊椎] 猎豹 The cheetah is the fleetest of animals .陆地上跑得最快的动物是印度豹。
n. 厨师，大师傅 同义词:cook, kitchener The French Chef was America 's first television cooking show .《法国厨师》是美国第一个电视烹饪节目。
n. 用明暗对照法绘制的图画；明暗的配合 Master Au combines elements of traditional Chinese painting with western perspective , chiaroscuro , and color schemes .欧大师将中国传统的绘画技法与西方的透视法、明暗对照法和颜色组合融为一体。
vt. 雕，刻；凿；欺骗 vi. 雕，刻；凿；欺骗 n. 凿子 同义词:chip, sell, character, kid, pull a fast one, firmer It is a bust chiseled from a rock.那是一座石雕半身像。
n. 含氯氟烃；氯氟化碳（chlorofluorocarbon的复数） She also got some of the first chemical measurements that showed chlorofluorocarbons caused the hole.她还掌握一些先进的化学测量方法来说明臭氧洞是由人造含氯氟烃造成的。
n. [生化] 胆固醇 Heretofore , doctors have tried low fat diets to reduce the cholesterol in the blood .迄今，医生一直试用低脂肪饮食来降低血液中的胆固醇。

n. 弦；和弦 同义词:hypothenuse, quadrature Sometimes when you play , you hit a note or chord , and your facial and body expressions contort to match the audio expression .有时当你演奏时，你击出一个音符或和弦，你的面部和身体表情会扭曲以配合听觉的表达。
adj. [动] 脊索动物的；具有脊索的 n. 脊索动物 chordate marine animal of the subphylum Urochordata; a tunicate.包含真正的脊椎动物和脊索动物。
n. 编舞；舞蹈艺术；舞艺 The proposed choreography is intricate .被提出的安排是错综复杂的。

n. [染料][遗][细胞] 染色体（形容词chromosomal，副词chromosomally） 同义词:monosomy, karyosome A more complicated particle called the chromosome is apparently the fundamental unit of assembly .一个更复杂的微粒，称为染色质体，显然是包装的基本单位。
adj. 慢性的；长期的；习惯性的 同义词:long time, standing, extended Chronic poisoning may lead to death from inanition .慢性中毒也可能由虚弱导致死亡。
n. 编年史，年代记；记录 vt. 记录；把…载入编年史 同义词:page, register, register, to record They chronicled all the remarkable happenings of the Second World War.他们把第二次世界大战中所有的重大事件都载入编年史中。
n. 年表；年代学 同义词:Fasti I didn't want there to be a chronology in wiki .我不希望在维基中出现一个时间轴。
vi. 搅拌；搅动 vt. 搅拌；搅动 n. 搅乳器 同义词:mix round, stir up, mill, mix round to churn cream搅拌牛奶以制奶油
n. 煤渣；灰烬 vt. 用煤渣等铺 vi. 用煤渣等铺路面 同义词:ash, ember But he took off his sweater and they began jogging slowly around cinder track .不过，他还是脱了厚毛衣，两人开始沿煤渣跑道慢慢地晃着跑起来。
adj. 生理节奏的（指与地球二十四小时运转联系的新陈代谢、内分泌作用及睡眠等节奏有关的）；以24小时为周期的 These so-called circadian rhythms affect allergy and asthma , too .这所谓的睡眠节律也会影响过敏和气喘。
n. 循环，周期；圆；圈子；圆形物 vi. 盘旋，旋转；环行 vt. 画圆圈；环绕…移动 同义词:cycle, revolution, rotation, round, recurrence, wheel, orbit, spin The stock farm was circled with a fence.饲养场四周围着栅栏。

n. 圆周；周长；胸围 同义词:periphery, chest/bust One way is by making muscles larger in circumference and hence heavier in mass.一个方法是依靠增加肌肉的周长在整体上增强力量。
vt. 限制；在…周围画线 同义词:block, set a limit to Please circumscribe the words which are wrongly spelled.请将拼错的词圈出来。
adj. 细心的，周到的；慎重的 同义词:measured, scrupulous Firms that had been willing and ( despite the crunch ) able to borrow for investment now seem more circumspect .过去愿意并且能够借钱用于投资（尽管有信贷紧缩）的企业如今也变得更加慎重了。
vt. 包围；陷害；绕行 同义词:case, invest, frame to circumvent the lake围绕该湖
adj. 市的；公民的，市民的 同义词:municipal Researchers say school names can show civic values and also shape them.研究者们认为校名可以显示和影响市民的价值观。
adj. 公民的；民间的；文职的；有礼貌的；根据民法的 同义词:folk, polite Yes . and every citizen enjoys the capacity for civil rights from birth to death .是的。每个公民从出生起到死亡止都享有民事权利能力。
vi. 提出要求 vt. 要求；声称；需要；认领 n. 要求；声称；索赔；断言；值得 同义词:exact, say, lack, desire, call for, requirement, do, assurance, need, desire Every citizen may claim the protection of the law.每个公民都可以要求受到法律的保护。
vi. 捞蛤 n. 蛤；沉默寡言的人；钳子 同义词:tong, few words How can a clam cram in a clean cream can ?一个蛤蜊怎么能够填满一个干净的奶酪罐子呢？
n. 宗族；部落；集团 同义词:nationality, collective, tribe The Wagner clan , he writes, inherited " a glorious but poisoned legacy ".他形容瓦格纳家族“一部充满辉煌和毒药的遗产”。

adj. 秘密的，私下的；偷偷摸摸的 同义词:secret, private, underground, chamber, inside The THG episode fuels speculation that a network of clandestine laboratories exists that develops and produces illegal steroids .THG事件也不禁令人揣测，非法从事类固醇开发与制造的地下实验室网络，并非空穴来风。
vt. 澄清；阐明 vi. 得到澄清；变得明晰；得到净化 同义词:illustrate, elucidate Can you clarify this long sentence?你能把这个长句子解释清楚吗?
adj. 书记的；牧师的；办事员的 n. 牧师 同义词:secretarial, ministerial, minister, priest, preacher Newspapers demanded to know if the pope would meet victims of clerical sex abuse .报纸想知道教皇是否会会见教士性虐待案的受害者。
n. 陈腔滥调 同义词:stereotype As with most cliches , there is some truth in it .尽管这其中大多是陈词滥调。
n. 客户；诉讼委托人 同义词:correspondent, client server software This isn't the type of clientele any restaurant wants to attract .对于任何一个餐厅，这不是他们想招揽的顾客。
n. 气候学家 Climatologist George J . Kukla of Columbia University in Time Magazine 's June 24th , 1975 article Another Ice Age ?——气候学家乔治J库克拉，哥伦比亚大学，世代杂志1975年6月24日，文章名为《另一个冰河世纪》。
vi. 坚持，墨守；紧贴；附着 同义词:stay, stand on He clung to the rope with both hands.他双手紧紧攥住绳子。
n. 剪裁，剪断；剪报，剪辑；剪下物，剪下的东西 adj. 头等的，第一流的；极好的，恰好的 同义词:cutting, tailoring, wonderful, excellent, famous, super, classical Her plait has been clipped last week.她的辫子在上周被剪掉了。
adv. 顺时针方向地 adj. 顺时针方向的 同义词:deasil If it's morning , you 'll find south about halfway between the hour hand and twelve o'clock , clockwise .如果是早上，按顺时针方向转过去，时针和十二点位置的中间差不多就是南边。
v. 阻塞；障碍 n. 障碍；木底鞋 同义词:choke with, plug up, obstacle, let, bar, dam, stop The expressway was clogged with automobiles.这条高速公路被汽车堵塞了。

n. 克隆；无性系；无性繁殖；靠营养生殖而由母体分离繁殖的植物 vt. 无性繁殖，复制 同义词:klon, asexual propagation, repeat, to duplicate Or if she discovers how people can clone themselves so their cells will live forever ?或者如果她发现了人类如何克隆自己，因此他们的细胞永远存活。
adj. 闭路式的 Now that they have installed closed-circuit TV I can't help thinking that Big Brother is watching me all the time.由于他们安装了闭路电视，我不禁想起了专制组织老是在监视我。
n. 晒衣绳 Tighten the clothesline so it does not drop .把晾衣绳拉紧，别让它垂下来。
adj. 笨拙的 同义词:awkward, inept But it was a clumsy one.但这是一个笨拙的内阁。
n. 群；簇；丛；串 vi. 群聚；丛生 vt. 使聚集；聚集在某人的周围 同义词:gang, bunch, qun, bush, converge The students clustered their tents together.学生们把帐篷集中搭在一起。
vi. 合并；结合；联合 vt. 使…联合；使…合并 同义词:bond, couple, combine, become one, band, unite The edges of the cut coalesced.伤口愈合了。
n. 联合；结合，合并 同义词:combination, alliance, combined with, unity, union, association, marriage The coalition could break down before the five years expire .此次联合可能在五年期限结束之前就破裂。
vt. 修，拙劣地修补；铺鹅卵石，用圆石铺面 n. 鹅卵石，圆石 同义词:roundstone She cobbled together an essay in half an hour.她用半小时胡乱拼凑了一篇文章。
n. [药] 可卡因 同义词:coke, Bernie Powder cocaine meets with about as much disapproval as steroids .粉状可卡因受到的待遇和类固醇差不多。
n. 可可粉；可可豆；可可饮料；深褐色 同义词:cacao powder, cacao bean Cocoa is Ghana 's biggest export after gold .可可是加纳仅次于黄金的第二大出口商品。
n. 结尾部分；终结句；尾声；终曲 同义词:outro, concluding paragraph Repeats , first and second endings, DS/DC al Coda symbols and more.增加了乐谱标记，比如反复、第一段、第二段、跳跃、尾奏等标记。
n. 代码，密码；编码；法典 vt. 编码；制成法典 vi. 指定遗传密码 同义词:password, cryptogram, encode to code a telegram将电报译成密码
vt. 编纂；将...编成法典；编成法典 Codify a Senior Level Health IT Leader within the Administration to oversee a national health IT strategy .在内阁中任命一个高级别的医疗IT领导人来监督全国医疗IT策略。
adj. 认知的，认识的 同义词:recognitive, epistemic This cognitive deficits are generally considered part of the definition of ADHD .这些认知上的缺陷通常被认为是ADHD定义的一部分。
adj. 连贯的，一致的；明了的；清晰的；凝聚性的；互相偶合的；粘在一起的 同义词:united, consistent, connected, corresponding, matching The government lacks a coherent economic policy .政府缺乏协调的经济政策。
n. 造币；[金融] 货币制度；新造的字及其语等 同义词:monetary system, mintage The silver coinage was repeatedly debased with copper vellon .银币一再用铜币维隆来替代，实行贬值。
n. 凉拌卷心菜（等于coldslaw） We 're making a sloppy Joe with a jicama - apple coleslaw .我们正在做炒牛肉酱，用豆薯、苹果凉拌卷心菜。
vi. 合作；勾结，通敌 同义词:team, work together Two authors collaborated on this novel.两位作者合著了这部小说。

adj. 并行的；旁系的；附属的 n. 抵押品；[法] 担保品；旁系亲属 同义词:subsidiary, paralleled, security, guarantee Farmers often use cows and other livestock as collateral for government loans and subsidies .农民经常用奶牛或其他家畜作为政府贷款或补助的抵押品。
vt. 反对；与…战斗 vi. 战斗；搏斗 n. 战斗；争论 adj. 战斗的；为…斗争的 同义词:sit down on, to oppose, fight, conflict, action, fight, controversy, fighting The ship combatted with the wind and waves.这艘轮船与风浪搏斗。
n. 结合；组合；联合；[化学] 化合 同义词:combined with, alliance, unity, union, association On its face , that seems an odd combination .表面上，这似乎是个古怪的结合。
n. 燃烧，氧化；骚动 同义词:burning, inflammation The most common type of reaction studied calorimetrically is combustion .量热研究中最常见的反应类型是燃烧反应。
n. 喜剧演员；滑稽人物 同义词:funny, banana That comedian always cracks me up.那个喜剧演员总是让我发笑。
n. [天] 彗星 The Great Comet of2007 reached its brightest as it rounded the Sun well inside the orbit of Mercury .当这颗2007年的大彗星运行到比水星轨道更接近太阳时，它的亮度达到最大值。
adj. 商业的；营利的；靠广告收入的 n. 商业广告 同义词:merchant The outlines of such a commercial software are pretty clear .这样一个商业软件的轮廓是相当清晰的。
n. 委员会；佣金；犯；委任；委任状 vt. 委任；使服役；委托制作 同义词:council, soviet, brokerage, authorization, depute, authorise They commissioned an architect to design the new library.他们委托一位建筑师设计这座新图书馆。
adj. 共同的；普通的；一般的；通常的 n. 普通；平民；公有地 同义词:mutual, corporate, usual, ordinary, collective, ordinary, populace Even a common indoor plant can improve the feeling of a room .即便一种普普通通的室内植物也能提高室内感觉。
n. 老生常谈；司空见惯的事；普通的东西 adj. 平凡的；陈腐的 同义词:truism, ordinary, stock Travel by air is now a commonplace .现在坐飞机旅行是平常的事。
n. 合同，契约；小粉盒 adj. 紧凑的，紧密的；简洁的 vt. 使简洁；使紧密结合 同义词:stipulation, covenant, close, brief The snow on the pavement was compacted and has turned to ice.人行便道上的雪被踩实并结成了冰。
n. 简洁；紧密；密实度；紧密度 同义词:sententiousness, brevity The snow on the pavement was compacted and has turned to ice.人行便道上的雪被踩实并结成了冰。
adj. 伙伴的，同伴的；友爱的，友好的 同义词:friendly, fellow Companionate love consists of intimacy and commitment .伴侣关系由亲密和承诺构成。
adj. 兼容的；能共处的；可并立的 We return again to the search for a compatible element .我们回过头来再去寻找相容的元素。
vi. 补偿，赔偿；抵消 vt. 补偿，赔偿；付报酬 同义词:make good, to make up for, make good, to make up for The factory will compensate their workers if they are hurt at work.工人在工作中受伤，工厂得给予受伤补助。
n. 补偿；报酬；赔偿金 同义词:payment, consideration, insurance, reward, offset As a first step , compensation committees and risk - management committees should be merged .第一步，薪酬委员会和风险管理委员会应合并在一起。
vt. 编译；编制；编辑；[图情] 汇编 同义词:to edit, copy-edit It often takes five or six years of hard work to compile a good dictionary.编一部好的词典常常需要苦干五六年。
n. 自满；满足；自鸣得意 同义词:satisfaction, content, fill The answer seems to be an abundance of cheap money , which lured investors complacency .答案似乎是丰盈的低息贷款让投资者于诱惑下变得扬扬自得。
n. 补语；余角；补足物 vt. 补足，补助 同义词:make up a loss, make sth up This year 's report will use the Alkire - Foster approach to complement its own Human Development Index .今年的报告还将采用阿尔凯尔-福斯特方法，作为其人类发展指数的补充。
adj. 补足的，补充的 同义词:supplementary, adscititious Secondly , on the basis of complementary advantages to promote pragmatic cooperation .第二，在优势互补的基础上推动务实合作。

adj. 复杂的；合成的 n. 复合体；综合设施 同义词:sophisticated, involved, synthetic, detailed, intricate Predictions about a mechanism as complex as the climate cannot be made with any certainty .对某种机制的预测就像不能作出任何肯定的气候预测一样复杂。
n. 顺从，服从；承诺 同义词:commitment, obedience Many are also beefing up back-office operations , such as risk management and compliance .很多对冲基金还加强后台运作，例如风险管理和法规遵从。
vi. 遵守；顺从，遵从；答应 同义词:engage, abide by/obey/observe Visitors to the mine must comply with the rules.到矿上参观的人必须遵守规章。
adj. 组成的，构成的 n. 成分；组件；[电子] 元件 同义词:constituent, module, element, constituent Cannot perform this operation on a component without a site .如果没有站点，将不能在组件上执行此操作。
n. 复合材料；合成物；菊科 adj. 复合的；合成的；菊科的 vt. 使合成；使混合 同义词:synthetic, complex material, synthetic, mulriple, babelize English is a composite of many languages .英语是多种语言混合而成的。

vt. 合成；混合；和解妥协；搀合 vi. 和解；妥协 n. [化学] 化合物；混合物；复合词 adj. 复合的；混合的 同义词:synthetise, mix together, make it up, make peace with someone, mixture, hybrid, mix, mixed, hybrid He compounded water, sand and soil and formed bricks.他将水、沙和土掺和一起做成砖。
vt. 理解；包含；由…组成 同义词:involve, see, contain, absorb, read The child read the story but did not comprehend its meaning.这个孩子读了这篇故事，但不能理解它的意思。
vt. 妥协；危害 vi. 妥协；让步 n. 妥协，和解；折衷 同义词:harm, meet someone halfway, meet someone halfway, come to terms with, accommodation, reconciliation He refused to compromise his principles.他对他的原则寸步不让。
adj. 义务的；必修的；被强制的 n. （花样滑冰、竞技体操等的）规定动作 同义词:required, obligatory, required routine Synopsis : At present , our country implements nine-year compulsory education .内容提要：目前，我国实行九年义务教育。
vt. 隐藏；隐瞒 同义词:lock, pocket, to hide He concealed the key inside his tie.他把钥匙藏在领带里面。
vi. 集中；浓缩；全神贯注；聚集 vt. 集中；浓缩 n. 浓缩，精选；浓缩液 同义词:focus, collect, mass, crowd, centre, localise, compression, solidification You must concentrate all your energies on the study of English.你必须集中全力学习英语。
adj. 同轴的；同中心的 同义词:co-axial, in-line We have in the photos concentric rings just as Plato described .我们照片里的同心环，正与柏拉图描述的一样。
vt. 涉及，关系到；使担心 n. 关系；关心；关心的事 同义词:deal with, to relate to, relationship, connection, attention, consideration, bearing This matter concerns all of us.这件事与我们每个人都有关系。

n. 音乐会；一致；和谐 vt. 使协调；协同安排 vi. 协调；协力 adj. 音乐会用的；在音乐会上演出的 同义词:accordance, unity, agreement, identity, keeping, coordinate with, attune, cooperate, sort They were able to concert their difference.他们能商议调解他们之间的分歧。
n. 协奏曲 Well, it 's a Chinese violin concerto called Butterfly Lovers .这是一首中国的小提琴协奏曲，叫《梁祝》。
n. 让步；特许（权）；承认；退位 同义词:recognition, license It is some concession .这已是一些让步了。
adj. 混凝土的；实在的，具体的；有形的 vi. 凝结 vt. 使凝固；用混凝土修筑 n. 具体物；凝结物 同义词:honest, effective, real, to freeze, clot, coagulation The workmen are still busy concreting the road.工人们仍忙着用混凝土铺路。
adj. 并发的；一致的；同时发生的 n. [数] 共点；同时发生的事件 同义词:united, consistent, corresponding, matching, uniform, common point The judge sentenced Mr Gallant concurrent life sentences .法官判处格兰特数次终身监禁，同期执行。
vi. 浓缩；凝结 vt. 使浓缩；使压缩 同义词:concentrate, to freeze, dewater, inspissate If steam touches cold surfaces, it is condensed into water.蒸气接触到冷的表面就凝结成水。
adj. 谦逊的；故意屈尊的；有优越感的 v. 屈尊（condescend的ing形式） 同义词:modest, unassuming Archer 's laugh lingered on his lips in a condescending smile .阿切尔的大笑长时间挂在嘴边，变成一抹屈尊的的微笑。
n. 秃鹫，秃鹰 同义词:vulture North American condor ; chiefly dull black ; almost extinct .北美秃鹫；主要是暗黑色；几乎灭绝。
n. 圆锥体，圆锥形；[植] 球果 vt. 使成锥形 同义词:conoid, strobilus, taper I think I'll go for a triple scoop of chocolate surprise in a waffle cone .我会要三个里面有着让人赞不绝口的蛋奶饼的巧克力味冰淇淋。
n. 配置；结构；外形 同义词:allocation, mechanics, framework, profile, texture Cannot open Help for the System Configuration Editor .不能为该系统配置编辑器打开帮助。

n. 限制；监禁；分娩 同义词:limitation, delivery, restriction, qualification, prison He spent six years in jail , mostly in solitary confinement , until his conviction was overturned .六年监狱生活，安瓦尔大部分都是被单独关押，直到冤案平反。
vi. 符合；遵照；适应环境 vt. 使遵守；使一致；使顺从 adj. 一致的；顺从的 同义词:accord, meet with, accord, reconcile, united, consistent, matching, uniform, corresponding All students must conform to the rules.所有的学生都必须遵守校规。
vt. 面对；遭遇；比较 同义词:front, compare The next big issue confronting the workers is the question of wages.摆在工人面前的第二大问题是工资问题。
adj. 意气相投的；性格相似的；适意的；一致的 同义词:united, consistent, corresponding, solid, matching It was easy to see , from his beaming face, that he had congenial companions .从他愉快的笑容里不难看出，他已经交上了志趣相投的朋友。
n. 拥挤；拥塞；充血 同义词:injection, crowding Department stores are often congested before Christmas.圣诞节前百货商店里常常很拥挤。
vi. 凝聚成团 n. [岩] 砾岩；企业集团；聚合物 adj. 成团的；砾岩性的 vt. 使聚结；凝聚成团 同义词:enterprise group, keiretsu, volumed A large number of people conglomerated round her.在她周围聚集了一大群人。
n. 集会；集合；圣会 同义词:assembly, concentration, convergence, meet, gathering The whole congregation got baptized that day .那天，所有的教众都得到了洗礼。

adj. 适合的，一致的；全等的；合谐的 同义词:adaptive, united, consistent, calculated, corresponding Having faces that are congruent regular polygons congruent polyhedral angles . Used of polyhedrons.各面都是正多边形且多面体的角都相等的立体。
vi. 共谋；纵容；默许 同义词:conspire, collude Some government officials connive at graft.有些政府官员对贪污受贿视而不见。
adj. 连贯的；连续不断的 同义词:connected, coherent China staged dramatic rallies for a second consecutive session .中国股市连续第二个交易日大幅上涨。
n. 一致；舆论；合意 同义词:accordance, unity, agreement, identity, keeping Very well , gentlemen . It seems we have a consensus .很好，先生们。看来我们的意见是一致的。

n. 联盟；合作；公会 同义词:alliance, union, collaboration, association, league It could be overseen by public organizations , by private organizations , or by public - private consortia .对它的监督可以是公共组织、或私人组织、或公共-私人联合体。
n. 阴谋；共谋；阴谋集团 同义词:designing, plot Like most conspiracy stories , " 13 Bankers " contains a kernel of truth .与多数阴谋故事一样，《13位银行家》也蕴含真相。

n. [天] 星座；星群；荟萃；兴奋丛 同义词:zodiac sign, asterism In Constellation rejected a bid for all its operations from EDF, agreeing instead to be bought by a unit of Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway .在九月，美国联合能源公司拒绝了同一公司的出价，且表示愿意被巴菲特伯克希尔哈撒韦公司旗下的一间公司收购。
n. [数] 约束；局促，态度不自然；强制 同义词:enforcement, restriction That suggests the need for an institutional constraint .这说明英国需要一个制度上的约束。
adj. 感染性的；会蔓延的 They also say that a positive or negative attitude contagious .他们经常说一种积极或者消极态度都是会传染的。

n. 污染物；致污物 同义词:pollutant, fomite But carbon dioxide is not a contaminant —it is the inevitable by-product of carbon in the coal reacting w it h oxygen in the air .但是，二氧化碳并不是污染物质——它是煤炭和氧气在空气中反应后产生的不可避免的副产品。
vt. 沉思；注视；思忖；预期 vi. 冥思苦想；深思熟虑 同义词:watch, behold, puzzle He stood there contemplating the stars in the sky.他站在那里凝视着天上的星星。
n. 同时代的人；同时期的东西 adj. 当代的；同时代的；属于同一时期的 同义词:coeval, modern-day, cotemporary This play is the image of contemporary urban life .这个剧本是当代城市生活的生动写照。
adj. 轻蔑的；侮辱的 同义词:scornful, sniffish A contemptuous smile flitted across Injun Joe 's face .印江·乔埃脸上飞快地闪过一阵鄙视的微笑。
adj. 诉讼的；有异议的，引起争论的；爱争论的 同义词:objectionable, litigant But it is still contentious one .但这还是一个颇具争议的做法。
n. 环境；上下文；来龙去脉 同义词:circumstance, setting, surrounding, condition Field above a hidden context field can not be a custom group field .在一个隐藏的相关字段上面不能是一个自定义分组字段。
adj. 连续的；邻近的；接触的 同义词:adjacent, straight, endless, running, serial Only China , the Soviet Union and Canada surpass Brazil in contiguous land area .只有中国、苏联及加拿大的毗邻大陆面积大于巴西。
n. 偶然性；[安全] 意外事故；可能性；[审计] 意外开支 同义词:possibility, probability, feasibility, potential, chance Now they are falling back on a Plan C , contingency .现在他们又回落到C计划，以防意外事情发生。

adj. 因情况而异的；不一定的；偶然发生的 n. 分遣队；偶然事件；分得部分 同义词:occurrent, chancy, happenchance, detachment Contingent valuation is based on surveys of the " disutility " of death at different ages .条件价值评估是基于不同年龄段的“负效用”死亡的数项调查。
n. 女低音，女低音歌唱家 同义词:alto She sings contralto .她唱女低音。

n. 控制；管理；抑制；操纵装置 vt. 控制；管理；抑制 同义词:governance, administration, management, supervision, checking, possess, manage, regulate, bottle, conduct The pressure of steam in the engine is controlled by this button.发动机中蒸汽的压力由这个按钮控制。
n. 恢复期，康复期；逐渐康复 同义词:recovery phase, decubation Another apparent sign of convalescence is more ambiguous .另一个经济恢复的表面信号更为模糊。

n. 转换；变换；[金融] 兑换；改变信仰 同义词:transformation, reforming, switching, exchange, changing Oregon has one of the best wave climates for wave energy conversion anywhere in the world .俄勒冈拥有可以媲美世界上任何地方、并能转变称能源的海浪气候。
vt. 使转变；转换…；使…改变信仰 vi. 转变，变换；皈依；改变信仰 n. 皈依者；改变宗教信仰者 同义词:transform, shift, idolater, proselytizer Water is converted into steam if it is boiled.水沸腾时转化为蒸汽。
n. 定罪；确信；证明有罪 同义词:assurance, damningness This was her third conviction .这是她第三次定罪。

adj. 复杂的；费解的；旋绕的 v. 盘绕；缠绕（convolute的过去分词） 同义词:complicated, sophisticated, involved, detailed, intricate Miners , after all , concede the need for reform of Australia 's convoluted mining tax regime .毕竟，矿商承认，改革让人摸不着头脑的澳大利亚采矿税制是必要的。
n. 坐标；同等的人或物 adj. 并列的；同等的 vt. 调整；整合 vi. 协调 同义词:paratactic, tantamount, adjust, restructure, sort, concert You must coordinate the movements of your arms and legs when swimming.游泳时你必须使臂和腿的动作相协调。
n. 胡荽（等于Chinese parsley或cilantro） Add coriander . Cover pot. Splash wine over. Serve in pot .加入芫荽，再盖好，赞绍酒，原锅上桌。
n. 基础；柱石；地基 同义词:elements, basis, bed, radical, sole Yet in Tokyo she hailed the security alliance with Japan as a cornerstone of American foreign policy .希拉里在东京将美日安全合作关系誉为美国外交政策的基石。
n. 玉米秆；谷类的秆 同义词:maize straw The result shows that adding 1.5% treated cornstalk fi bers will enhance the bending and compressive strength …结果表明，用先掺法加入1.5%处理后的玉米秸秆纤维，制品的抗折、抗压强度均有一定程度的提高。
adj. 谷类的；粗野的；陈腐的；乡下味的 同义词:robust, gross, rough, country, bush It may sound corny , but it has worked for me , every time .可能听起来很过时，但实际上对于我来说，这每次都凑效。
adj. 冠的；冠状的；花冠的 同义词:cristated How HDL can protect the coronary circulation is not as yet firmly established.HDL究竟如何保护冠状循环，迄今还没有肯定的解答。

n. 走廊 同义词:hall, passage, gallery, verandah, slype Jack listens and exits out the corridor .杰克只好从命，离开了走廊。

n. [解剖] 皮质；树皮；果皮 同义词:skinniness, pericarp Within the epidermis develops a ring of parenchyma cells , the cortex .在表皮细胞内有一个质壁细胞环，即皮层。

adj. 宇宙的（等于cosmical） 同义词:universal, mundane If the satellite has a tilted orbit , the result is a series of vertical bending waves , an out - of - plane corrugation —small ripples in a cosmic carpet .如果卫星的轨道是倾斜的，就会有一连串垂直的弯曲波，也就是突出平面的皱纹，好似宇宙地毯的涟漪。
n. 哥萨克；哥萨克人 " What are you feeding that chicken ?" asks the Cossack .骑兵问道：「你拿什麽东西给那只小鸡吃？」
vt. 花费；使付出；使花许多钱 n. 费用，代价，成本；损失 vi. 花费 同义词:invested, spend, expend, fee, charge, expense, price, losing It must cost a good deal to live here.住在这里一定要花很多钱的。
adj. 反时针方向的 adv. 反时针方向 同义词:contraclockwise The first moment is clockwise and the second is counterclockwise .第一个力矩为顺时针方向，第二个力矩为反时针方向。
vt. 伪造，仿造；假装，伪装 vi. 仿造；假装 n. 赝品；冒牌货；伪造品 adj. 假冒的，伪造的；虚伪的 同义词:simulate, doctor, come, act, put on, stumour, shoddy, artificial, false It is a crime to counterfeit money.伪造钱币是犯罪行为。

vt. 抵销；补偿；对抗 vi. 抵销；对抗 同义词:pay, make good, compete, war, balance Restrain growth when season network game and advertisement service battalion , partial countervail of gross profit embellish glide .当季网络游戏及广告服务营收增长，部分抵销了毛利润的下滑。
n. 息票；赠券；联票；[经] 配给券 同义词:Oakley, annie oakley Can I use this coupon ?我能用这张优惠券吗？
n. 导游；情报员，通讯员；送快信的人 同义词:ciceroni, gaid It is no longer possible to create courier contracts with a duration of0 days .现在不能再创建一个有效时间为0天的快递合同。

adj. 腼腆的；忸怩作态的；怕羞的 vi. 忸怩作态 vt. 爱抚 同义词:bashful, cutesy, daut, dawt Mr Pawlenty is coy about his ambitions , but he is plainly looking beyond Minnesota 's borders .普兰提先生羞于展现他的野心，但是很显然他的目光已经越过了明尼苏达州的边界。
n. 一种产于北美大草原的小狼；引外国人从墨西哥偷渡进入美国的不法分子 Any self- evolver must be coyote trickster .所有自进化者必须是像土狼一样高明的魔术师。

vt. 使破裂；打开；变声 vi. 破裂；爆裂 n. 裂缝；声变；噼啪声 adj. 最好的；高明的 同义词:fracture, open up, fracture, come apart at the seams, split, crevice, greatest, best, perfect, prime Don't pour hot water into the glass or it will crack.不要把热水倒入玻璃杯里，否则杯子会破裂。

adj. 狭窄的；难懂的；难辨的 v. 用夹钳夹；约束（cramp的过去分词） 同义词:complicated, narrow, confined, strait, obliged Once the fish lurched suddenly , pulling Santiago forward on his face and cutting his cheek . By dawn his left hand was stiff and cramped .有一次那条鱼突然一个侧身，把桑提亚哥拉得脸朝下地跌了一跤，老人的颊部也给划破了。黎明时分，他的左手变得僵硬并抽起筋来了。
adj. 愚钝的；粗鲁的；非常的 同义词:intense, robust, crude, dense, rude Yes , it was a very good subject , said Crass , with a sneer .“是啊，这是一个非常精彩的题目”，克拉斯冷笑着说。
n. 火山口；弹坑 vt. 在…上形成坑；取消；毁坏 vi. 形成坑；消亡 同义词:volcanic vent, dead hole, destroy, damage, recall His car cratered yesterday.他的汽车昨天坏了。

n. 信任；凭证；祭器台（等于credence table，credenza） 同义词:faith, trust, confidence, dependence But once again science gives at least partial credence to something that was once considered only a myth .但是科学至少再一次给了那些曾经被认为只是神话的东西一部分的信任。
n. 信用，信誉；[金融] 贷款；学分；信任；声望 vt. 相信，信任；把…归给，归功于；赞颂 同义词:faith, reputation, honor, loan, confidence, put faith in, believe in I didn't credit that absurd tale.我不相信那个荒谬绝伦的故事。
n. 信条，教义 同义词:belief, teaching, doctrine, creed, tenet Yet their credo of anti - nationalism carries risks too .但是，他们反民族主义也给他们带来了风险。
n. [物] 波峰；冠；山顶；顶饰 vi. 到达绝顶；形成浪峰 同义词:wavecrest, mountaintop a golden-crested parrot头顶有金黄色羽毛的鹦鹉
n. 犯罪学；刑事学 She was my T. A. Sophomore year. I promised her if she helped me pass criminology .她是我大二时的助教我答应她。要是她能帮我通过犯罪学考试。
n. 标准，条件（criterion的复数） 同义词:standards, conditions, indexes People who meet these criteria often have multiple cases of alcoholism in their families .符合这些准则的人，通常在其家族中也有多起酒瘾的例子。
n. 批评；评论文章 vt. 批判；评论 同义词:comment, animadversion, observe on, to comment on Zhang is known more as a critique of the education system .比起老师，更多人知道张鸣是位教育系统的批评家。
adj. 重要的；决定性的；定局的；决断的 同义词:important, considerable, material, critical, big One man can be a crucial ingredient on a team , but one man cannot make a team .一个人可以是一个团队的关键要素，但一个人永远不能成为一个团队。
vt. 弄皱；使一蹶不振 vi. 起皱；倒坍；一蹶不振 n. 皱纹；褶皱 同义词:crush, rumple, wrinkle, plication, rugosity He crumpled the contract into a ball.他把合同揉成一团。
n. 咬碎，咬碎声；扎扎地踏 vt. 压碎；嘎扎嘎扎的咬嚼；扎扎地踏过 vi. 嘎吱作响地咀嚼；嘎吱嘎吱地踏过 同义词:craunch, crush The dog was crunching a bone.那只狗正在嘎吱嘎吱地啃骨头。
n. 改革运动；十字军东侵 vi. 加入十字军；从事改革运动 No longer simply a business speculation , it became a patriotic crusade .其不再仅是一个商业投机者，更是爱国主义的十字军。
n. 土窖，地下室；腺窝 同义词:basement, undercroft ECC is a new field in cryptography , this crypt system has many advantages of fast speed and high security.基于椭圆曲线的公钥密码体制是密码学研究的一个新课题，这种密码体制具有速度快、全性高的优点。
adj. 神秘的；隐藏的；含义模糊的 同义词:hidden, mysterious, latent It is a cryptical concept , can be perceived through the service quality of enterprise .顾客满意是一个宽泛的概念，通过顾客对企业服务质量的感知而体现出来。
n. 立方；立方体；骰子 vt. 使成立方形；使自乘二次；量…的体积 同义词:solid, die Cube the apples before putting them in the pan.把苹果切成方块再放在盘子里。
n. 提示，暗示；线索 vt. 给…暗示 同义词:connotation, implication, reminder Will you cue me on my lines?你愿意在我的台词方面给我提示吗?
vi. 到绝顶；达到高潮；达到顶点 vt. 使结束；使达到高潮 同义词:top, fulfill, bring to an end The Christmas party culminated in the distribution of presents.圣诞晚会在分发礼物时达到最高潮。
n. 可责；有过失；有罪 同义词:criminality, sinfulness " The members who voted no will have some culpability , " he said .“投反对票的议员要承担一些罪责，”他说。
n. 祭仪（尤其指宗教上的）；礼拜；狂热信徒 adj. 狂热崇拜的 同义词:church, exercise, worship THE birth of the cult of fine wine can be dated precisely .对名酒佳酿的狂热，可以精确地追溯其诞生的日期。
n. 培养；耕作；耕种；教化；文雅 同义词:education, training, farming, enlightenment They also emphasise the cultivation of independent thinking .他们也注意培养独立的思考的能力。
adj. 笨重的；累赘的；难处理的 同义词:problem, hulking This arrangement cumbersome to manage .如此安排繁琐得难以管理。
n. 贪心，贪婪 同义词:greed, covetousness There was a glimmer of cupidity in those small , cunning eyes of his .他狡猾的小眼睛里露出了一丝贪婪的神情。
n. 抑制；路边；勒马绳 vt. 控制；勒住 同义词:checking, control, restraint, suppression, inhibition, possess, contain, regulate, bit, bottle I could not curb my anger.我按捺不住我的愤怒。
n. 万灵药 同义词:heal-all, catholicon Dietary fibre is tout as the latest cure-all , cuts down weight and promotes good health .食物纤维素被吹捧成最新的万灵仙丹，既可减轻体重，又有益健康。
n. 课程 A curriculum -building tool helps educators create lesson plans on the site .课程编写工具帮助教学者在网站上创建课程计划。
vt. 缩减；剪短；剥夺…特权等 同义词:crop, to cut back He curtailed his speech.他缩短了他的演说词。
