adj. 愤世嫉俗的；冷嘲的 From Russia 's standpoint , the pact seemed at first a brilliant coup in the cynical game of power politics .从俄国的立场看，这个条约在开始似乎是这场可耻的政治游戏中的一个非常成功的策略。
n. [生化] 细胞分裂素；[生化] 细胞激动素 同义词:kinin Spraying cytokinin on waterlogged plants may stop the decrease of chlorophyl content and delay senescence .用细胞分裂素喷施受湿害的植物，可抑制植株叶片的叶绿素含量下降，延缓衰老。
n. 细胞学 Tere were s tical differences among sensitivity , accuracy , and negative likelihood ratio between BTA test and cytology (? P ? < 0 05 ).BTA测定的敏感度、准确度、阴性似然比与尿脱落细胞学检查指标比较存在显著性差异（P＜0?05）；
n. [细胞] 细胞质 同义词:protoplasm Some maize with S cytoplasm can revert to the fertile condition .有些具有S细胞质的玉米植株可以逆转为可育状态。
v. 织补，缝补 n. 织补 同义词:stitch up, knit up, dern to darn the holes in an old socks织补旧袜子上的破洞
n. 白天；日光；黎明；公开 同义词:morning, sunlight, publicity, open Let daylight dry your tears .让白天带走你的泪水。
vt. 降低；使…贬值；掺杂 同义词:lower down, bring down They debased the value of the dollar.他们使美元贬值。
n. （英）[金融] 公司债券；[税收] 退税证明书 同义词:corporation bond If an applicant meets the school 's standards , debenture places him at the head of the queue .符合学校标准的申请学生，如持有债券就可优先考虑。
vt. 使衰弱；使虚弱 同义词:devitalize, enfeeble The siege of pneumonia debilitated him completely.肺炎的长期折磨，使他变得很虚弱。
n. 碎片，残骸 同义词:remain, chip He brushed away the debris of leaves and pine needles , webs , cocoons and insect corpses .他掸掉了一大堆枯叶、松针、蜘蛛网、虫茧和昆虫的尸体混成的垃圾。
n. 初次登台；开张 vi. 初次登台 He decided to debut with several other violinists.他决定与其他几名小提琴手一起首次登台演出。

n. [数] 十角形；[数] 十边形 Take 10 golden triangles , arrange them with their sharp points touching , and you have a golden decagon , fitting perfectly within the iris of the eye, vertices neatly touching the rim .画10个金三角，把它们的顶点挨着排好，然后你就得出一个金十边形，与瞳孔中的虹膜完美地一致，十边形的最早点正好在眼眶。
vi. 衰退，[核] 衰减；腐烂，腐朽 n. 衰退，[核] 衰减；腐烂，腐朽 vt. 使腐烂，使腐败；使衰退，使衰落 同义词:fail, flag, recession, downturn, decline, decomposition, corrupt, septicize vegetation that was decaying腐烂中的草本

adj. 正派的；得体的；相当好的 同义词:proper, goodish The best argument is that , having committed to building a decent state in Afghanistan , the west has a moral obligation to keep going.最有说服力的论据是，既然承诺在阿富汗建立一个像样的国家，西方就背负着信守承诺的道德义务。
adj. 小数的；十进位的 n. 小数 同义词:fractional, small number, haet When were the decimal coins put into circulation ?十进位的硬币是什么时候发行的?。
n. 密电译文 vt. 解释（过去式deciphered，过去分词deciphered，现在分词deciphering，第三人称单数deciphers，名词decipherer，形容词decipherable）；译解 to decipher a hastily scribbled note辨认一张草草写成的便条
n. 减少，减小；减少量 vi. 减少，减小 vt. 减少，减小 同义词:reduction, loss, to cut down, fall off, shorten, weaken Water consumption decreased during the winter.冬季期间水消耗量减少。
vt. 推论，推断；演绎出 同义词:understand, reason, conclude From the evidence the detective deduced that the servant had done it.根据证据侦探推断是佣人所为。
vt. 扣除，减去；演绎 同义词:net of, substract Once you deduct your expenses,there is nothing left.一旦扣除你的费用，就什么也没有了。
adj. 辩护的；为自己辩护的 n. 被告 同义词:justificatory, vindicative, accused person, indictee And even though defendant was exonerated , he was ultimately victimized by the charges .即使被告被宣告没有过失，他最终还是因诉讼受到了损害。
adj. 恭敬的；惯于顺从的 同义词:respectful, reverent She is always deferential to anyone in authority .她对任何权威人士总是必恭必敬。
n. 赤字；不足额 同义词:red ink Even if the US were to do so, it would not change the size of the US trade deficit , only its composition .就算是美国愿意这么做，也无助于改变美国贸易赤字规模，而只会改变其构成情况。

vt. 使变形；使成畸形 vi. 变形；变畸形 adj. 畸形的；丑陋的 同义词:transfigure, warp, to morph, be out of shape, ugly, thrawn In cases where the drug was taken during pregnancy,its effects deformed the infants.在怀孕期间如果吸毒，其后果会使婴儿成畸形。
vt. 除霜 vi. 解冻 同义词:thaw out to defrost a refrigerator给冰箱除霜
adj. 灵巧的；机敏的；敏捷熟练的 同义词:neat, dexterous So both nations are deft at playing with numbers .这两个国家对玩弄数字游戏都很有研究。

vt. 使退化；恶化 vi. 退化；堕落 adj. 退化的；堕落的 n. 堕落的人 同义词:go ill, exasperate, go to seed, retrogress, fallen, degraded, lost souls The morale of the enemy soldiers degenerated, and they were unable to fight.敌军士气低落，所以他们不能战斗。
adj. 有毒的，有害的 同义词:harmful, toxic, evil, poisonous Month after month , reports mount of the deleterious effects of rising carbon levels.月复一月，一篇篇关于碳元素增加、有害环境的报告不断累积。
adj. 故意的；深思熟虑的；从容的 vt. 仔细考虑；商议 同义词:intended, studied, designed, contained, conscious, negotiate, mull over to deliberate a question思考问题
adj. 微妙的；精美的，雅致的；柔和的；易碎的；纤弱的；清淡可口的 同义词:subtle, female, refined, fine, fragile What a delicate work of art !多精美的一件艺术品啊！
vt. 描绘；描写；画…的轮廓 同义词:represent, trace, picture, figure The teacher delineated China on the blackboard with a coloured chalk.老师用彩色粉笔在黑板上勾勒出中国的边界。
n. （河流的）三角洲；德耳塔（希腊字母的第四个字） But good jobs are hard to come by in the Delta .但是在三角洲地区，想找一份好工作还是很困难。
n. 洪水；泛滥；暴雨 vt. 使泛滥；压倒 同义词:flood, fresh, flow, inundation, overwhelm, snow under The spring thaw caused the river to deluge the region.春天冰雪融化，使河水泛滥淹没了那地区。
n. 迷惑，欺骗；错觉；幻想 同义词:fraud, befuddlement The disappointment of manhood succeeds to the delusion of youth .壮年期的失望接替青年期的幻想。

n. 死亡，终止；转让；传位 vt. 遗赠；禅让 同义词:death, negotiation, end, dying, termination, will, bequeath " Often when I became a consultant to a federal agency , that precipitated its demise , " he admitted .“当我成为一家联邦机构的顾问时，常常就促成了它的没落，”他承认。
n. 复员；遣散（demobilize的名词） 同义词:disbandment to demobilize troops or an army遣散军队
adj. 人口统计学的；人口学的 同义词:larithmic Demographic factors . Gender , age , family size , and so on.人口统计因素：性别，年龄、家庭规模等等。
n. 拆除（等于demolishment）；破坏；毁坏 同义词:destruction, breaking, blasting Croft and a sergeant from the pioneer and demolition platoon stepped up .克洛夫特和工兵爆破排的一个士官走了出来。
adj. 可论证的；显而易见的 同义词:gross, noticeable No cavity is demonstrable ( planigrams are usually required).共振腔通常是抽空的。
vi. 反对；抗辩；提出异议 n. 异议；反对 同义词:represent, sit down on, opposition, exception The classmates wanted to make her the monitor,but she demurred.同班同学想推选她当班长，可是她不愿意。
n. 剥夺国籍；剥夺公民权利；非国有化 同义词:destatization The textile industry was denationalized.纺织业恢复为私营。
vt. 诋毁；使变黑；玷污 同义词:black, cloud to denigrate someone's character诋毁某人的品德
n. [数] 分母；命名者 同义词:namer, nomenclator A denominator of many low- stress jobs is tangible results .许多低压力的工作都有个共同点那就是其效果切实可见。
vt. 表示，指示 同义词:bid, bespeak The flashing lights denote dangerous roads ahead.闪光表示前方道路危险。
n. 结局；终场 同义词:conclusion, outcome, ending I know the story of the play well, still I was deeply moved by the denouement of the play .我熟悉这出戏的故事情节，但是戏的结局仍然使我深受感动。
n. 齿列；生齿；[脊椎] 齿系 A general examination of the dentition can yield useful medical information .全面检查齿系能够获得有用的内科的资料。
adj. 指责的；攻击的；非难的 同义词:offensive, reprobative Denunciatory or abusive language ; vituperation .辱骂谴责的或谩骂的语言；
vi. 离开；出发，起程；违反；去世 adj. 逝世的 同义词:leave, split, vary, quit, get out The train departs at 8：30 AM.列车于上午8点30分开出。
vt. 描述；描画 同义词:bewrite, describe v. say what is like The artist depicted them strolling through a park.艺术家画他们在公园里散步。
vt. 耗尽，用尽；使衰竭，使空虚 同义词:spend, exhaust The fire had depleted the game in the forest.那场大火使森林里的鸟兽濒临绝迹。
n. 消耗；损耗；放血 同义词:consumption, waste, wear Ozone -layer depletion above the Arctic is not as extensive as expected because of unusually warm weather .因为不正常的暖气候，北极上空臭氧层消耗的范围并不像我们预期的那么大。
vt. 配置；展开；使疏开 vi. 部署；展开 n. 部署 同义词:station, configurate, expand, spread out, disposition to deploy troops展开部队
n. 折旧；贬值 同义词:disvalue It takes no account of the depreciation of capital goods , and so overstates the value of production .这种做法丝毫没有考虑资本货物的贬值，而将生产创造的价值无限夸大。
vt. 压低；使沮丧；使萧条 同义词:drive down, weigh down His sad news depressed us all day.他的不幸消息令我们整天难过。
vt. 嘲笑；嘲弄 同义词:guy, jeer at They derided the new music.他们嘲笑新乐曲。
n. 嘲笑；嘲笑的对象 同义词:sarcasm, laughingstock Back then , the only people subject to derision on Wall Street were those who dissented .当时，华尔街上唯一一直受到嘲讽的正是那些不同意这种看法的人。
n. [化学] 衍生物，派生物 adj. 派生的；引出的 同义词:ramification, offshoot, extracted, descendent Are there other hidden derivative deals out there?是否存在其他秘密的衍生品交易？
vt. 源于；得自 vi. 起源 同义词:to originate He derives great satisfaction from his stamp collection.他从集邮中得到极大的满足。
adj. 贬损的 同义词:uncomplimentary It was a derogatory word after the revolution .在革命后那是一个贬义词。
vi. 下降；下去；下来；遗传；屈尊 vt. 下去；沿…向下 同义词:decline, go down They descended from the mountaintop.他们从山顶下来。

n. 废止种族歧视 More than a century after the Civil War and 16 years after the Supreme Court's school - desegregation ruling , the American black has not achieved justice or equality .内战结束有一百多年了，最高法院关于学校种族隔离的裁决也有16年了，美国黑人仍不能享有公平与正义。
n. 桌面；台式机 同义词:tabletop, table tops Since almost everyone uses a computer in the office or at school , the need for the desktop model at home is vanishing .无论在办公室还是学校，几乎人手一台电脑，所以人们对家用台式机的需求正逐渐消失。
vt. 轻视，鄙视 同义词:slight, set light by I despise anyone who is cruel to animals.我鄙视那些虐待动物的人。

adj. 分离的，分开的；超然的 v. 分离 同义词:apart, divided, isolated, separate, keep apart, draw apart Levittown was the original suburbia : a place of identical detached single - family houses with white picket fences.莱维敦是郊区的原型：一栋栋由白色尖桩篱栅分开的完全一样的个体家庭的房子。
n. 侦查，探测；发觉，发现；察觉 同义词:exploration, discovery, occurrence, find The main function of the computer fetal monitoring device is fetal heart rate detection .胎心率的自动检测和监护是电脑胎儿监护仪的主要功能。
n. 清洁剂；去垢剂 同义词:cleaner, cleaning media Not only this do we need to know but also why they do or why they don't use our detergent .不仅是要知道这一点，而且我们要搞明白他们为什么用或不用这种洗涤剂。

n. 恶化；退化；堕落 同义词:corruption, regression, degradation The conversion trigger would be activated relatively late in the deterioration of a bank 's health , when the value of common equity is minimal .当一家银行健康状况恶化时，激活转换触发机制的时机应该相对较晚，须等到普通股价值降到最低。
adj. 遏制的，威慑的；制止的 n. 威慑；妨碍物；挽留的事物 同义词:restraining, suppressing, preventer Hizbullah retorts that it needed all these weapons as a deterrent of its own .真主党反驳说它需要这些武器来作为自己的威慑力。
n. 贬低者；诽谤者 同义词:slanderer, traducer My son , fear the Lord and the king: and have nothing to do with detractor .我儿，上主和君王，你都要敬畏；对他们二者，皆不可触怒；
adj. 不利的；有害的 n. 有害的人（或物）；不受欢迎的求婚者 同义词:harmful, adverse, against, evil, disadvantageous However , raising such taxes can have detrimental effects on economic activity .不过，增加这些税赋，可能对经济活动产生不利影响。
vt. 毁灭；毁坏 同义词:destroy, damage The invader de-vastated the whole town.入侵者蹂躏了整个城镇。
n. 糖尿病；多尿症 同义词:polyuria Now , a large study has linked it to diabetes and heart disease .现在，一个大型研究将其与糖尿病，心脏病联系在一起。
adj. 斜的；对角线的；斜纹的 n. 对角线；斜线 同义词:off-angle, pitched, solidus Emre makes a diagonal run, takes the ball past two then crosses at the near post . Calderoni collects.在左翼埃姆雷做了一个交叉跑动，连过两人后传到近角，卡尔德罗尼得到。
n. 方言，土话；同源语；行话；个人用语特征 adj. 方言的 同义词:patois, provincialism The actress speaks in a Beijing dialect in the opera rather than rhyming lines.他说起话来有一点京味儿，又有一点港味儿。
n. 直径 We must gauge the diameter of wire first .我们必须先测量电线的直径。
n. 尿布 vt. 给孩子换尿布 同义词:didy, nappy The mother diapered her baby.母亲给婴儿衬尿布。
n. [地质] 底辟；挤入构造 For the exploration of gas hydrates , it is of great significance to study such geological structures as mud diapir and mud volcano .在天然气水合物勘探中，海底的泥底辟和泥火山构造是重要的研究对象。
n. 二分法；两分；分裂；双歧分枝 同义词:disruption, fragmentation If this dichotomy is maintained what happens to the rate of interest ?如果保持这种二分法，利率会怎样呢？
adj. 说教的；教诲的 同义词:homiletic, moralistic My next- door neighbor is a didactic old lady .我的隔壁邻居是个爱训人的老太太。
vi. 死亡；凋零；熄灭 vt. 死，死于… n. 冲模，钢模；骰子 同义词:go out, angel of death, join the majority, end one's days, former block, cutting block How many people died in the war?在这次战争中有多少人死亡?
n. 柴油机；柴油；（俚）健康的身体 adj. 内燃机传动的；供内燃机用的 同义词:derv, oil engine Emergency diesel generators cannot make up for the loss of the grid , and cannot operate indefinitely .备用的柴油发电机不足以弥补电网的损失，并且不能无限期地运行。
n. 差异；不同；争执 同义词:diversity, conflict, disparity, deviations Every country has something that differences it from another.每个国家自有与别国不同之处。
adj. 数字的；手指的 n. 数字；键 同义词:numerical, figure, key, number Or some other digital black - magic box ?或其他一些数字黑色魔术匣？
n. 稀释，冲淡；稀释法；冲淡物 同义词:thinning, fluxing Both hygiene and proper dilution are difficult to ensure .奶粉的卫生和恰当稀释很难得到保证。
vt. 使减少；使变小 vi. 减少，缩小；变小 同义词:micrify, minify, to cut down, fall off The dry spell quickly diminished our water suply.干旱期使我们的水供应锐减。
vi. 进餐，用餐 vt. 宴请 同义词:have a dinner, have meals, banquet, feast We'll dine with our friends tonight at about seven.今晚7时左右我们将和朋友们进正餐。
n. 恐龙；过时、落伍的人或事物 You are my only dinosaur patient !你是我唯一的恐龙病人！
n. 二氧化物 Carbon monoxide , chlorine , and dioxide are examples of these gases .一氧化碳、氯气、二氧化硫就是这些气体的代表。
vt. 浸，泡，蘸；舀取；把伸入 vi. 浸；下降，下沉；倾斜；舀，掏 n. 下沉，下降；倾斜；浸渍，蘸湿 同义词:steep, dunk, decline, pitch, slope, swim, reduction, decline, slope, fall, subsidence He dipped the brush into the paint bucket.他拿画笔蘸颜料桶中的颜料。
n. [内科] 白喉 同义词:diptheria Of course diphtheria still presents a threat and will probably always do so.当然，白喉仍然并且可能长期是一种威胁。
n. 毕业证书，学位证书；公文，文书；奖状 vt. 发给…毕业文凭 同义词:graduation certificate, leaving certificate The master diplomaed him a high school diploma.校长发给他中学毕业证书。

n. 指示；指令 adj. 指导的；管理的 同义词:instruction, pointing, indication, prescription, commands, administrative, regulatory, managing A new directive on returns, criticised by some developing - country governments , may ensure that more are sent back .一些发展中国家的政府评论道，根据一项新的遣返指示，更多的人可能会送回国。
vt. 解除武装；裁军；缓和 vi. 放下武器；裁减军备 同义词:relax, demilitarize Japan was disarmed in 1945.1945年日本被解除了武装。
vt. 否认，否定；抵赖；拒绝对…的责任 同义词:negative, deny The manager disavowed any knowledge of my actions.经理否认知道我的所作所为。
vt. 识别；领悟，认识 vi. 看清楚，辨别 同义词:recognize, identify, see clearly, tell from We discerned a sail on the horizon.我们看见了地平线上的一张帆。
vt. 解雇；卸下；放出；免除 vi. 排放；卸货；流出 n. 排放；卸货；解雇 同义词:issue, forgive, issue, shed, firing, dismissal The dockers discharged a ship.码头工人卸下了船上的货物。
n. 折扣；贴现率 vi. 贴现；打折扣出售商品 vt. 打折扣；将…贴现；贬损；低估；忽视 同义词:agio, rabato, water sth. down, preach down The store promised to discount prices at 10%.该店承诺所有商品打10%的折扣。
n. 论述；谈话；演讲 vi. 演说；谈论；讲述 vt. 说出；演奏出 同义词:speech, talk, address, lecture, treatise, orate, speechify, come out with, give voice to They discoursed at the gate for a while.他们在大门口交谈了一会儿。
adj. 离散的，不连续的 n. 分立元件；独立部件 同义词:uncontinuous, incontinuous How about time that comes in discrete steps , as for computers , instead of being continuous ?或者时间并不连续，而是一步步离散分立的，就像电脑一样？
adj. 任意的；自由决定的 同义词:random, arbitrary Courts have little competence to evaluate the rationality of discretionary choices such as these ?法院几乎没有评估诸如这些裁量权限的合理性的能力。
n. 歧视；区别，辨别；识别力 同义词:distinction, differentiation The latter studies also implied that exposure to carbon monoxide altered time discrimination and estimation .研究还指出，对一氧化碳的暴露，改变了对时间的区别和估计。
vt. 剥夺…的公民权（等于disfranchise） To deprive of a privilege , an immunity , or a right of citizenship , especially the right to vote; disenfranchise .剥夺权利剥夺…的特权、豁免权或公民权，尤指选举权；
vt. 掩饰；假装；隐瞒 n. 伪装；假装；用作伪装的东西 同义词:simulate, come, simulation, acting The president was disguised as a peasant.总统假扮成农民。
n. 不感兴趣；厌恶；不起劲 同义词:aversion, allergy How can I conquer my disinclination to meet people ?我怎样才能克服不愿与人交往呢?
vt. 逐出，驱逐；使……移动；用力移动 vi. 驱逐，逐出；离开原位 同义词:cast out, evict, cast out, chase sb./sth. out They needed a bulldozer to dislodge the rock.他们需要一台推土机来挖出岩石。
adj. 凄凉的，忧郁的；阴沉的，沉闷的；可怕的 n. 低落的情绪 同义词:dark, blue, terrible, heavy The last dramatic meeting of the X club was held on a dismal rainy night .爱克斯社最近有声有色的会议是在一个凄凉的雨夜举行的。
vt. 拆除；取消；解散；除掉…的覆盖物 vi. 可拆卸 同义词:recall, demolish to dismantle a fortress拆除防御工事
vt. 肢解，割断手足；分割，瓜分 同义词:segment, chainsaw The murderer dismembered the corpse.谋杀犯肢解了尸体。
n. 混乱；骚乱 vt. 使失调；扰乱 同义词:chaos, confusion, disturbance, turmoil, involvement, upset, disarrange The room was disordered when they arrived at the scene of the burglary.当他们到达夜盗现场时房间被弄得乱七八糟。
vt. 使…迷惑；使…失去方向感 同义词:bemaze I felt like I was on the Disorient Express for good this time .我感觉我这次就要永远这么晕下去了。
adj. 毁谤的；轻蔑的 v. 蔑视（disparage的ing形式） 同义词:scornful, contemptuous You should not disparage good manners.你不应该轻视好的风度。
adj. 不同的；不相干的；全异的 n. 无法相比的东西 同义词:different, diverse, unlike, varying, another There are disparate features that tie the books together in my mind .我印象中有两点特殊性，可以将这两本书维系在一起。
n. 不同；不一致；不等 同义词:difference, inequality, variance Then the question arises . Is this one disparity sufficient to operate as a bar to such a marriage ?那么，问题就来了，只有一点不相称，难道就能作为这么一桩婚姻的障碍吗？
adj. 不带感情的；平心静气的；公平的 同义词:fair, just Has anyone tried approaching the company with a dispassionate attitude ?没人试着以客观冷静的态度与公司交涉吗？
vt. 取代；置换；转移；把…免职；排水 同义词:shift, replace by Please don't displace my dictionaries.请别动我的词典。
vt. 处理；处置；安排 vi. 处理；安排；（能够）决定 n. 处置；性情 同义词:schedule, budget, settle, place in, cope with, manage, place in, cope with, make, temperament He disposed his money in charity.他将自己的钱用于慈善事业。
n. 宣传；散播；传染（病毒） 同义词:advertisement, publicity, infection, propaganda to disseminate seeds播种
n. 持异议者；反对者 同义词:anti, opponent In this way , Galileo is a force for democracy , becomes Galileo the " dissenter . ""这样，作为民主力量的伽利略，便成了“持不同政见者”伽利略。
vt. 浪费；使…消散 vi. 驱散；放荡 同义词:lose, spend, to break up, sow one's wild oats The sun dissipated the mist.阳光驱散了薄雾。
vt. 提取；蒸馏；使滴下 vi. 蒸馏；滴下；作为精华产生（等于distil） 同义词:extract, abstract, still, still, drip down Whiskey is distill , distil )ed from malt .威士忌是以麦芽蒸馏而成的。
adj. 明显的；独特的；清楚的；有区别的 同义词:obvious, visible, unique, evident, individual In the medium term , a sharp rise in inflation is a distinct possibility .在中期，通货膨胀的急剧上升是一次明显的可能。
vt. 扭曲；使失真；曲解 vi. 扭曲；变形 同义词:contort, misinterpret, become deformed, to morph Arthritis had distorted her fingers.关节炎使她手指变形了。
n. 注意力分散；消遣；心烦意乱 同义词:entertainment, occupation, recreation, relaxation But attacking it is a bit of a distraction .但是对它的攻击也只是分散注意力。
n. 分布；分配 同义词:allocation, assignment The general question of size distribution and its representation was briefly discussed .谱分布及其表示法的一般问题已简单地讨论过了。
n. 歌剧中的首席女主角 Let 's give it up for pop diva Coco Lee!让我们用热烈的掌声欢迎流行天后李玟！
n. 分歧 同义词:variance, bifurcation, gulf The task of typography is to determine the degree of divergence .字体编排设计的任务同时也是决定分歧的程度。

adj. 相异的，分歧的；散开的 同义词:alien, dissimilative If you are now idly imagining dozens of uses for a brick or the novelties of a sleepless world , then you are probably a divergent thinker .如果现在你在随意想象出一块砖头的多种用途或一个没人睡觉的新奇世界，那么你大概就是一位“发散性“思考者。

adj. 不同的；多种多样的；变化多的 同义词:different, unlike, varying, another, dissimilar They then proceed to use this analytical framework to explore subjects as diverse as cancer , pregnancy , mate choice , literature and religion .于是，他们着手利用这一分析框架，探讨癌症、怀孕、择偶、文学和宗教等多种多样的主题。
vt. 使多样化，使变化；增加产品种类以扩大 同义词:vary, variegate to diversify the services使服务多样化
vt. 剥夺；使脱去，迫使放弃 同义词:shear, strip of She divested herself of her coat and sat down.她脱去外套并坐下来。
n. 脱衣；剥夺（财产）；转让部分投资 同义词:deprivation, despoilment The latest is a boomlet in state laws requiring divestment from Iran .要求从伊朗撤资的各州议案正成为关注的新亮点。

adj. 分裂的；分开的；有分歧的 v. 分开（divide的过去分词）；分离 同义词:separate, partite, uncoupled The teacher divided the class and took one section to the library and left the other to write an article.老师把该班分开，把一组领去图书馆，留下其余的人写作文。
n. 股息；[数] 被除数；奖金 同义词:bonus, stake Dividend swaps allow investors to separate the income from the capital return of equities .股息掉期使得投资者能够将收益从股票资金回流中分离出来。

adj. 神圣的；非凡的；天赐的；极好的 vt. 占卜；预言；用占卜勘探 vi. 占卜；预言；使用占卜勘探矿 n. 牧师；神学家 同义词:remarkable, extraordinary, wonderful, excellent, famous, predict, prognosticate, soothsay, minister, priest, preacher At last I divined the truth.最后我发现了事情的真相。
adj. 可分的；可分割的 同义词:partible, dissectible The integer 1 is divisible only by itself ; it is not a prime .整数1只能被它本身整除，所以不是素数。
n. 除法；部门；分割；师（军队）；[体]赛区 同义词:ministry, department, sector, segmentation, dom Religion is not the only source of division .宗教问题并不是分裂的唯一来源。
n. 除数；因子 同义词:facient At division, it presented the resolvent when divisor being zero .除法运算中给出了除数为零的解决方案；
vt. 泄露；暴露 同义词:reveal, ooze out The boy promised not to divulge the whereabouts of the hiding place.那男孩许诺不泄露隐藏地的所在。
adj. 温顺的，驯服的；容易教的 同义词:quiet, meek But plummeting stock prices are spurring normally docile shareholders to rebel .但股价暴跌正促使平常温顺的股东开始反抗。
n. 主义；学说；教义；信条 同义词:principle, theory, belief, teaching Businessmen he lectures to do not even know the rudiments of doctrine .他传教的那些实业家们甚至不懂教条的基础知识。
n. 教条，教理；武断的意见 同义词:credendum This is a time to put dogma and politics to one side and concentrate on pragmatic answers .因此现在必须将教条和政治放在一边，全力关注使用的解决方案。
n. 山茱萸 adj. 山茱萸科植物的；淡黄褐色的 同义词:cornus, common macrocarpium fruit, fawn-coloured dogwood bud , pale green is inlaid with russet markings.山茱萸的蓓蕾，淡绿清雅，点缀着褐色斑痕。
n. 捐赠者；供者；赠送人 adj. 捐献的；经人工授精出生的 同义词:donator Objective To summarize the nursing experience in donor kidney transplantation .目的总结亲属活体肾移植的手术配合要点。
n. 厄运；死亡；判决；世界末日 vt. 注定；判决；使失败 同义词:death, sentence, end, award, fate, determine She was doomed to unemployment by her ill health.她因身体不好而注定要失业。
n. [生化] 多巴胺（一种治脑神经病的药物） Dopamine controls feelings of pleasure and reward .多巴胺控制快乐感及奖励感。
n. 笨蛋；麻醉药物；涂料 vt. 上涂料；服药 vi. 吸毒；吸毒成瘾 （俚）酷毙了 同义词:simple, turkey, put, take medicine, take drugs, hit the pipe They had doped(up) the patient heavily before the operation.他们在手术前已给病人深度麻醉。
n. 剂量；一剂，一服 vi. 服药 vt. 给药；给…服药 同义词:dosage, potion, take medicine, physic Feverish patients were dosed with quinine.给发高烧病人服用了奎宁。
vi. 溺爱；昏聩 vt. 溺爱 同义词:overindulge, overprotect, spoil She dotes on her youngest daughter.她溺爱她最小的女儿。

adv. 无疑地；确定地；大概，多半 adj. 无疑的；确定的 同义词:easily, no doubt, probably, clearly, possibly, established, fixed, defined, certain, positive Even after final rulings are made, doubtless be interminable hearings on how to implement them.甚至在终审裁定后，无疑将会是对如何执行裁定举行无止尽的听证会。
n. 降低密度区划 v. 降低密度区划（downzone的现在分词）
adj. 单调的；土褐色的 n. 浅褐色；无生气；邋遢；小额 vt. 使无生气 vi. 嫖妓 同义词:flat, blank, monotonous, sandy beige, cafe au lait, lethargize Within Cuba life had settled into a drab routine .在古巴国内，生活已变成一套干巴巴的公式。
vi. 排水；流干 vt. 喝光，耗尽；使流出；排掉水 n. 排水；下水道，排水管；消耗 同义词:discharge of water, exhaust, use out, consumption, sewage to drain oil from a crankcase把曲轴箱里的油排干
adj. 激烈的；猛烈的 n. 烈性泻药 同义词:fierce, acute, violent, hard, furious Such drastic outcomes may never come to pass.这些极端的结果也许永远不会出现。
vt. 画；拉；吸引 vi. 拉；拖 n. 平局；抽签 同义词:picture, absorb, pull, attract, engage, pull, lot, tie A horse draws the cart along.马沿路拉车。
vi. 下毛毛雨 vt. 下毛毛雨 n. 细雨，毛毛雨 同义词:mizzle, drow It drizzled off and on all day.毛毛雨已经时停时续地下了一整天。
n. 中途退学；辍学学生 He called the dropout rate " staggering ".他称这一辍学率是惊人的。
adj. 可疑的；暧昧的；无把握的；半信半疑的 同义词:suspicious, doubtful, questionable We are dubious that customers really want all the things that people are imagining that they want .萨林说到“我们怀疑消费者是否真的想要人们想象他们想要得那些东西。”
adj. 柔软的；易教导的；易延展的 同义词:soft, tender "The valve body material shall be shock resistant ductile iron with extended neck for 2 " of insulation .阀体材料是抗冲击的球墨铸铁，可在密封状态下将阀颈延长2英寸。
adj. 虚拟的；假的 n. 傀儡；哑巴；仿制品 同义词:virtual, spurious, fantoccini, figure-head The designer dummied up the book so that they could study the format.设计师设计制作了空白样本，这样他们便能研究开本(或版式)。
vt. 倾倒；倾卸 vi. 倒垃圾 n. 垃圾场 同义词:pour in, empty the trash Dump the topsoil here.把表土倒在这里。

vt. 复制；使加倍 n. 副本；复制品 adj. 复制的；二重的 vi. 复制；重复 同义词:repeat, double, repeat, reproduction, counterpart, reproductive, copied, print off, to copy He duplicated a few copies of her letter and handed her the original.他复印了几封她的信，把原信交给她。
n. 耐久性；坚固；耐用年限 同义词:steel, wear Yet there are other explanations durability of the one- party state.不过，对中国一党制政府能够持续多久还存在其它解释。
n. 住处；寓所 v. 居住（dwell的现在分词） 同义词:residence, accommodation, living She dwells in the country during most of the year.一年中的大部分时间她居住在乡下。
vi. 减少；变小 vt. 使缩小，使减少 同义词:to cut down, fall off, shrink, astrict Their vast fortune has dwindled away.他们的大笔财产已逐渐减少。
n. 动力学，力学 同义词:mechanics, kinetics Dynamics , functional relationships , and control mechanisms are key words in an evolutionary ecology .动态，功能关系和调节机制是进化生态学中三个关键字眼。

n. 功能紊乱；机能障碍；官能不良 vi. 功能失调；出现机能障碍；垮掉 同义词:lesion, disfunction, crumble to dust If one area dysfunction or damage , another can step in like an understudy and play the role.要是一个区域失去功能或受损，另一个就会上场，取而代之，就像是替补演员。
n. [医] 运动障碍 People with dyskinesia (dyspraxia) may even have trouble speaking .患有运动障碍的患者甚至可能存在说话困难。
n. 梯形；梯次编队；梯阵；阶层 vi. 形成梯队 vt. 排成梯队 同义词:degree, layer, strata The army was echeloned along the river.部队沿河排成梯队。
adj. 生态的，生态学的 The ecological damage , and the cries for compensation from sick civilians and soldiers , continue to this day .生态的受损，因之患病的平民和士兵的赔偿请求一直延续至今。
n. 生态学；社会生态学 同义词:oecology, bionomics I harbor personal doubts about the ability of biospherians to steer the emergent ecology of 3, 800 species .我个人对生物圈人是否有能力操控拥有3，800个物种的生态系统存在疑虑。
adj. 经济的，经济上的；经济学的 How could genuine economic freedom and equality of opportunity exist in such circumstances ?在这种环境下，怎么能有真正的经济自由和机会均等呢？
adj. 经济的；节约的；合算的 同义词:managing, paying, saving Engineers are forever seeking more economical methods of solving old problems .工程师们常常探索解决老问题的更加经济的办法。
n. 经济；节约；理财 同义词:saving, thrift The real economy ?真实的经济？
n. 生态系统 同义词:ecological constellation, ecological systems The Amazon River is one of the great rivers of the world and a complex and exotic ecosystem .亚马逊河是世界上伟大的河流之一，是一个复杂的奇异的生态系统。
n. 边缘；优势；刀刃；锋利 vt. 使锐利；将…开刃；给…加上边 vi. 缓缓移动；侧着移动 同义词:margin, superiority, advantage, brink, suburb to edge a knife给刀开刃，磨刀
n. 雕像，肖像 同义词:image, statue, portrait, icon A message to progressives : By all means , hang Senator Joe Lieberman in effigy .给进步人士提个醒：利用各种手段搞臭参议员乔·利伯曼。
n. 污水；流出物；废气 adj. 流出的，发出的 同义词:wastewater, drainage, effusive, excurrent Dangerous effluent from some chemical plants is being poured into the river through the town .几家化学工厂排出的有害废水正流入通过我们市镇的河里。
n. 平等主义，[经] 平均主义 同义词:equalitarianism But this deeply held egalitarianism also makes the Nordic model difficult to export .而这种根深蒂固的平等主义也使北欧模式的输出遭遇困境。
n. 蛋酒 Or curling up with a cup of eggnog .或是为了蜷缩着喝一杯蛋葡萄酒。
adj. 惊人的；过分的；恶名昭彰的 同义词:tremendous, excessive, ultra, tall, incredible Shares of the most egregious mortgage lenders have plunged and dozens have gone bust .最惊人的抵押贷款贷方股票已经下降，还有数十家已经破产。
adj. 精心制作的；详尽的；煞费苦心的 vt. 精心制作；详细阐述；从简单成分合成（复杂有机物） vi. 详细描述；变复杂 同义词:detailed, full, tailor-make, thicken to elaborate his plans for a new engine精心设计一种新机器
adj. 选修的；选举的；选任的 n. 选修课程 同义词:constituent, optional course In college , English is a required course and psychology is elective course .在大学里，英语是必修课而心理学是选修课。
n. 选民；选区 同义词:constituent, precinct Mr Zapatero knows , too , that a successful terrorist attack can provoke a sharp change of mood in the electorate .萨帕特罗也深有体会，一次成功的恐怖袭击能够导致选民心情的急剧变化。
n. 电子 同义词:elektron Much greater magnification can be obtained with the electron microscope .用电子显微镜能获得大得多的放大倍数。
vt. 提升；举起；振奋情绪等；提升…的职位 同义词:promote, upgrade, prefer to elevate a bucket by a rope用绳子吊起水桶
vt. 抽出，引出；引起 同义词:premise, attract, produce, cause, operate to elicit the truth推导出真理(或：探得真情)

adj. 合格的，合适的；符合条件的；有资格当选的 n. 合格者；适任者；有资格者 同义词:qualified, applicable, becoming, shaped, likely, acceptee For instance , to obtain additional federal assistance for unemployment insurance , states must make more workers eligible for benefits , in particular part-time workers .比如为了获得联邦额外的失业保险救助，州政府必须让更多工人——特别是兼职工人——获得更多的救济金。
vt. 消除；排除 同义词:avoid, exclude to eliminate hunger消灭饥饿现象
n. 精英；精华；中坚分子 同义词:essence, flower, regular, prime, distillation But its greedy elite will still try to manipulate the scheme .不过，该国贪婪的精英们仍将试图操控这一计划。
adj. 椭圆的；省略的 同义词:oval, omissive The sun disturbs the elliptical motion of the moon around the earth .月球绕地球的椭圆运动受到太阳的干扰。
vt. 拉长；使延长；使伸长 vi. 拉长；延长；伸长 adj. 伸长的；延长的 同义词:pad out, outstretch, pad out, draw oneselg up, prolonged, stretched-out That painting doesn't look like him.The face is too elongated.那幅画不像他，脸太长了。
n. 伸长；伸长率；延伸率；延长 同义词:extension, stretching Mercury reaches its greatest elongation , 22 degrees to the east of the Sun , on May 14 .水星在五月14日会到达它最大的距角--位于太阳以东22度。

adj. 意味深长的；雄辩的，有口才的；有说服力的；动人的 同义词:meaningful, affecting, significant, moving, speaking It is a succinct and eloquent defense of the basic philosophical principles of liberalism .它还用简明、流畅的笔触阐述了自由主义的基本哲学观点。
vt. 逃避，躲避 同义词:escape, avoid, get out of to elude capture逃避逮捕
adj. 难懂的；易忘的；逃避的；难捉摸的 同义词:complicated, abstruse Excessive worrying about an elusive public image was the order of the day .过分为一个朝生暮死的公众形象担心就是今天的风尚。
vt. 放射（过去式emanated，过去分词emanated，现在分词emanating，第三人称单数emanates，形容词emanative）；发散 vi. 发出；散发；发源 同义词:to send out, give off Great sadness emanated from her song.她的歌曲流露出巨大的忧伤之情。
n. 解放；释放 同义词:liberation, release, enfranchisement He dedicated his life to the emancipation of all mankind .他献身于全人类的解放。
vt. 铭记于心；使不朽；防腐；使充满香气 同义词:immortalise, eternalize His deeds are embalmed in the hearts of the people.他的行为被铭记于人民心中。
vi. 从事，着手；上船或飞机 vt. 使从事；使上船 同义词:wage, occupy in, imbark The ship embarked passengers and cargo at New York port.船在纽约港载客装货。
vt. 修饰；装饰；润色 vi. 装饰起来；加以润色 同义词:paint, hang, modify The leather cover of the new dictionary was embellished with gold letters.这部新词典皮革封面上装饰着金字。
vt. 体现，使具体化；具体表达 同义词:objectify, reify to embody a spirit体现一种精神
vt. 拥抱；信奉，皈依；包含 vi. 拥抱 n. 拥抱 同义词:involve, contain, hug, cuddle, hug He embraced his daughter tenderly.他温柔地拥抱女儿。
vt. 刺绣；装饰；镶边 vi. 绣花；刺绣 同义词:paint, hang a dress embroidered with flowers in silk thread用丝线绣花的连衣裙
n. [胚] 胚胎；胚芽；初期 adj. 胚胎的；初期的 同义词:morning, prime, earlier, young These substances are slowly depleted as the embryo commences to grow .随着胚开始生长，这些物质也慢慢用尽了。
n. 绿宝石，翡翠；[宝] 祖母绿；翠绿色 adj. 翡翠的；翠绿色的 同义词:jade, beryl, virid The pendant was set with pearls surrounding emerald .这耳坠中间是一块翡翠，四周镶着珍珠。
n. （光、热等的）发射，散发；喷射；发行 同义词:shot, sending, launch, jet, projection Another important source of cadmium emission is the production of artificial phosphate fertilizers .另一个释放镉的主要途径是人工磷酸盐化肥的生产。
adj. 经验主义的，完全根据经验的 Thorndyke, on the other hand, is interested mainly , as the title of his volume indicates , in the beginnings of empirical science .在另一方面，正如在其著作的标题中所指明的，桑代克主要对实验科学的发端感兴趣。
vt. 仿真；模仿；尽力赶上；同…竞争 n. 仿真；仿效 同义词:simulate, pattern, imitate, simulation, stylization to emulate one's father as a concert violinist作为一名能在音乐会上演奏的小提琴手胜过某人的父亲
vt. 压缩；将…装入胶囊；将…封进内部 vi. 形成胶囊 同义词:to compress, telescope to encapsulate drugs用胶囊装药
n. [内科] 脑炎 同义词:cephalitis, phrenitis Herbs for the prevention of encephalitis can be found everywhere in this area .预防脑炎的草药在这一地区俯拾皆是。
vt. [计] 编码，译码 同义词:to code, to decode to encode a message把一份电文译成电码(或密码)
vt. 包含；包围，环绕；完成 同义词:involve, contain, carry out, accomplish, achieve They built a moat to encompass the castle.他们在城堡周围修了一条护城河。
vt. 遭遇，邂逅；遇到 n. 遭遇，偶然碰见 vi. 遭遇；偶然相遇 同义词:confront, bring up against, fell in with, lit on, bring up against, run into She encountered an old friend on the road.她在路上偶然碰到一位老朋友。
vi. 侵占；蚕食；侵蚀 vt. 侵犯 同义词:eat into, to erode, to infringe on, infringe upon She has no right to encroach on my time.她没有权利占用我的时间。

n. 努力；尽力（等于endeavour） vi. 努力；尽力（等于endeavour） vt. 努力；尽力（等于endeavour） 同义词:effort, pain, struggle, trial, try, apply oneself, struggle, labor, strain, try one's best, apply oneself, try one's best You must endeavor to improve your work .你必须努力改进自己的工作。
adj. 地方性的；风土的 n. 地方病 同义词:provincial, local Fraud may well be rare among bank people, but endemic in its projects .世界银行内部很少有欺诈行为，但在其项目中很普遍。
n. 脑内啡 Exercise can be a great way to relieve stress endorphin which will improve your mood .体育锻炼可是一种减轻压力的好方法，它会让你心情变好。
vt. 背书；认可；签署；赞同；在背面签名 同义词:ink, allow, back, sign to endorse a cheque (或 bill)背书支票(或票据)

n. 认可，支持；背书；签注（文件） 同义词:approval, holding, support, authorization, adhesion ICBC will not be the only Chinese bank to think that an American regulatory endorsement could be a step towards bigger things.美国的规范认可为中国银行的发展打开了新的希望，显然不是只有工商银行一家这样想。
adj. [热] 吸热的；温血的 同义词:homeothermic, homoeothermic At very high temperatures , more endothermic reactions play a role .在很高的温度下，更多的吸热反应起作用。
n. 捐赠；捐助；捐款；天资 同义词:talent, donation An endowment is cash or property given to the school .对学校的捐赠之物可以是金钱或者实物。
n. 衰弱；虚弱；削弱；神经无力 同义词:breakdown, debility She was enervated from (或 with) dissipation.她由于生活放荡不羁而气虚体亏。
vt. 使产生；造成 vi. 产生；引起 同义词:create, inflict, result, breed Pity engendered love.怜悯产生爱。
vt. 雕刻；铭记 同义词:brand, heart, grave She engraved the ring in a floral pattern.她把戒指刻成花卉图案。
vt. 吞没；吞食，狼吞虎咽 同义词:gulf, devour The overflowing river has engulfed many towns and villages along its banks.泛滥成灾的河水已把其沿岸一带的许多城乡给淹没了。
vt. 提高；加强；增加 同义词:raise, cement, boost, muscle, gain The candlelight enhanced her beauty.烛光使她显得更美。
vi. 支持；从军；应募；赞助 vt. 使入伍；征募；谋取…的赞助或帮助 同义词:support of, stand up for sb, recruit He decided to enlist in the Marines.他决定入伍当美国海军陆战队士兵。
adj. 庞大的，巨大的；凶暴的，极恶的 同义词:huge, tremendous, massive, macro, vast " It was an enormous culture shock , " she says.她说：“那是一种巨大的文化冲击。
vt. 使充实；使肥沃；使富足 同义词:fertilize Commerce enriches a nation.商业使一国富足。
vt. 束缚；征服；使某人成为奴隶 同义词:chain, bound, master Someone was enslaved to her.有人做了她的奴隶。
vi. 跟着发生，接着发生；继起 vt. 追求 同义词:follow on, succeed to, ambition, pursue / pursuit As the days ensued, she recovered her strength.随着时日的推移，她逐渐恢复了体力。
vt. 必需，使承担；限定继承 n. 限定继承，限定继承权；限定继承的财产 同义词:charge, inflict on a loss entailing no regret不需惋惜的损失
n. 企业；事业；进取心；事业心 同义词:career, cause, undertaking, project, push The new labor unions spelled the end of free enterprise .新的工会的成立意味着自由企业的终结。
vt. 诱使；怂恿 同义词:encourage, egg on They were enticed westward by dreams of gold.他们被黄金梦引诱到西部。
n. 实体；存在；本质 同义词:presence, existence, essence, principle, texture With bees one always talks about the colony as a single entity .总是将蜜蜂这个群体作为一个单独的整体来谈论。
n. 进入者；新会员；参加竞赛者；新工作者 同义词:new member A single member country can veto a new entrant .一个成员国可以否决掉一个新加入者。
n. （美）主菜；（法）入场许可 同义词:main dish, main courses S: Would you like a baked potato or mashed potatoes with your entree ?您想要烤马铃薯还是马铃薯泥来搭配您的主菜呢?。
n. 企业家；承包人；主办者 同义词:contractor, enterpriser The original French word entrepreneur refers to someone who undertakes , who does something .企业家这个词来源于法语，原意是指承担任务和做事情的人。
n. 列举；[数] 计算；细目 同义词:calculation, computation, valuation, count It makes COLOR the name of an enumeration , that is , a new type .使color成为一个枚举量的名，也就是说，一个新的类型。
n. 信封，封皮；包膜；[天] 包层；包迹 同义词:cover, involucrum Yes , you can . Please put your articles in this envelope and seal it .是的，可以。请把您的物品放在这纸袋中封起来。
adj. 羡慕的；嫉妒的 同义词:admiring, green-eyed " I was very envious that she had her own chicken manure , " she recalls.我对于她能够拥有自己的鸡肥料感到非常的嫉妒。
vt. 想象；预想 同义词:vision, image to envision a bright future展望一个光明的未来
n. [生化] 酶 同义词:zyme The worm has a protective enzyme .血吸虫有一种保护性的酶。

adj. 史诗的，叙事诗的 n. 史诗；叙事诗；史诗般的作品 同义词:rhapsodical, epos, heroic I hesitate to call this work definitive , as that was how the same authors' epic biography of Darwin was described in 1991 .把该书称为权威性著作我犹豫不决，因为那是同一作者于1991年怎样描写出来的史诗般的《达尔文传》。
n. 震中；中心 同义词:focus, hub The epicenter was near Haicheng , the area from which most of the animal reports had been received .震中在海城附近，那里正是接到大部分动物异常报告的地方。
adj. 流行的；传染性的 n. 传染病；流行病；风尚等的流行 同义词:popular, fashionable, going, ruling, pop, infection, infectious disease The village was smitten by epidemic .传染病突然侵袭了那个村庄。
n. 插曲；一段情节；插话；有趣的事件 同义词:incident, intermezzo I ask what the episode taught him .我问这段插曲给了他什么教训。
adj. 划时代的；新纪元的 Meanwhile , looming in the background are other epochal challenges , such as climate change and the rise of China .与此同时，其他跨时代的挑战正在隐约中逼近，诸如气候变化以及中国的崛起。
adj. 等边的；等面的 n. 等边形 同义词:isohedral Use your protractor to construct an equilateral triangle .用量角器作一个等边三角形。
n. 时代；年代；纪元 同义词:years, age, time, date It is a new era .现在是一个新时代。
vt. 根除，根绝；消灭 同义词:destroy, root out to eradicate smallpox throughout the world在全世界消灭天花
adj. 不稳定的；古怪的 n. 漂泊无定的人；古怪的人 同义词:unstable, odd, volatile, curious, fantastic, weirdo Field studies have shown erratic results and low virus removal in general .实地研究指出，病毒的去除量一般都很少，并且不稳定。
adj. 代用的；人造的；假的 n. 代用品；仿制品 同义词:artificial, synthetic, substitute, proxy Ersatz coffee made mostly of chicory .代用咖啡主要是用菊苣做成的。
n. 博学；学识 同义词:wisdom, scholarship His erudition exasperated the average reader , and was sometimes queried by the expert .他的博学使一般读者气结，有时也被专家提出质疑。
vt. 避免；避开；远避 同义词:escape, shun to eschew evil避开邪恶
n. 间谍；间谍活动；刺探 同义词:illegal, secret agent And it leaves the dangers of online crime and espionage .网络上的犯罪行为和间谍活动同样也是漏网之鱼，危险万分。

vt. 支持；嫁娶；赞成；信奉 同义词:encourage, second, back, agree, carry Don't tell off-color jokes , reveal company secrets , gossip about co-workers or espouse your views on race , religion or the boss' personality .不要讲低俗的笑话、泄露公司机密、讲同事的闲话，也不要宣扬你关于种族、宗教的观点或对你老板性格的看法。
vt. 使疏远；离间 同义词:alienate from, disaffect Their quarrel estranged the two friends.他们的争吵使两个朋友失和。
conj. （拉丁语）和（等于and） 同义词:and A newspaper of Germany said someone found a live baby of ET .前几天德国一家报纸报道人们发现了活着的外星人宝宝。
adj. 永恒的；不朽的 同义词:permanent, lasting, everlasting, undying, timeless Do you think that you can find eternal love through the Internet ?你认为你可以通过互联网到永久的爱情吗？
n. 种族划分 The whole idea of ethnicity is a spurious hangover from the past anyway .无论怎么说，整个种族划分思想都是过去的荒谬残留。
adj. 种族优越感的；民族中心主义的 A civilization that leaves behind forever the ethnocentric , tribal mentality .一个永远抛弃种族中心主义心态，部落心态的文化。
adj. 人种志的；民族志学的 Ethnographic study in Russia , foreign goods blocked at the gate .学习俄国民族志，洋货挡在大门口。

n. 民族学者，人种学者 Helmreich, Stefan. " Trees and Seas of Information : Alien Kinship and the Biopolitics of Gene Transfer in Marine Biology and Biotechnology . " American Ethnologist 30 , no. 3 ( 2003 ): 341 - 359 .信息的树木和海洋：海洋生物学和生物科技的外缘关系和基因转移的生物政治〉《美洲民族学家》2003年第30期3卷，第341-359页。
n. 人种音乐学 It is no doubt that the field works in 20 century have been set up a very stable foundation for the ethnomusicology in China.笔者毫不怀疑，20世纪的“实地考察”，已成为建立民族音乐学的一个牢固的基石。
n. 乙烯 同义词:ethene, dimethylene Such reactions to ethylene are consistent with ancient reports .这些乙烯导致的反应和古人的报告一致。
n. 语源，[语] 语源学 The hippies etymology is contentious .关于嬉皮士的语源是有争议的。
adj. 真核的，真核生物的 Objective :To understand the characteristic of expression of HCV E1 gene in eukaryotic cell .目的：了解丙型肝炎病毒（HCV）E1基因在真核细胞中的表达情况。
n. 精神欢快，[临床] 欣快；兴高采烈；欣快症；幸福愉快感 同义词:elation, gaiety Like alcohol , a debt boom tends to induce euphoria .债务潮正如酒精，往往催生愉悦。
n. 疏散；撤离；排泄 同义词:decentralization, excretion Contact local authorities about emergency and evacuation plans .联系当地的权威部门了解紧急撤离计划。
vt. 使……蒸发；使……脱水；使……消失 vi. 蒸发，挥发；消失，失踪 同义词:vapor, disappear, blank The puddle evaporated rapidly in the sun.水坑在阳光下迅速蒸发。

adj. [数] 偶数的；平坦的；相等的 adv. 甚至；即使；还；实际上 vt. 使平坦；使相等 vi. 变平；变得可比较；成为相等 同义词:flat, equivalent, equal, level, actually, really, too, effectively, yet, equate with, flatten out an even worse mistake一个更为严重的错误
vt. 驱逐；逐出 同义词:cast out, expel The family were evicted from their house for failing to pay the rent.这家人因没付房租而被赶出了家。
vt. 使加剧；使恶化；激怒 同义词:anger, aggravate to exacerbate ill feeling使恶感加深

vt. 挖掘；开凿 vi. 发掘；细查 同义词:to dig, tap into The ground was excavated for a foundation.地面被挖空作为地基。
n. 摘录，引用 vt. 引用，摘录 vi. 摘录，引用 同义词:extract, citing, reference, extract, cite, reference, quote Today's reading is excerpted from the Bible.今天阅读的材料摘自《圣经》。
vt. 切除；收税 n. 消费税；货物税 同义词:resect, abscise, consumption tax, goods tax to excise a part of a book删去书的一部分
adj. 排他的 同义词:clannish exclusionary rule has progressive value in judicial practice and the history of evidence , manifests the respect for human being .非法证据排除规则在实践中和证据史上是有积极的进步意义，它体现了对人的尊重。
vt. 排泄；分泌 同义词:egest, secrete The function of the kidneys is to excrete waste products .肾脏的功能是排泄代谢废物。
vt. 使苦恼；施酷刑；折磨 同义词:harry, worry, trouble, tear The headache excruciated her.头疼折磨着她。
n. 偏移；远足；短程旅行；离题；游览圆 同义词:skewing, short trip But the point of an excursion is that you come home again .但是所谓旅行，那是终得归家来的。
n. 刽子手，死刑执行人 同义词:slaughterman, deathsman executioner put down his axe and stood quietly .刽子手放下了斧子，一言不发地站着。
vt. 免除；豁免 adj. 被免除的；被豁免的 n. 免税者；被免除义务者 同义词:discharge, forgive to exempt a student from an examination准一名学生免试
adj. 详尽的；彻底的；消耗的 同义词:thorough, complete, detailed, full, radical It is not , of course , exhaustive .当然这是不够详尽的。

n. 紧急；紧急事件 同义词:urgency, emergencies But the exigency of the case admitted of no alternatives .但情况紧急，别无其他良策。
n. 流放，充军；放逐，被放逐者；流犯 vt. 放逐，流放；使背井离乡 同义词:transportation, banishment, transport, banish She was exiled from her country.她被流放到国外。
n. 大批的离去 To date , there has been no mass accidents exodus of super delegates support away from Obama .到目前为止，尚没有大批超级代表离开支持奥巴马的阵营。
n. 免除；免罪 同义词:exemption, immunity Lyndon was exonerated from the accusation of cheating.林登被免受进行欺骗的指控。
adj. 异国的；外来的；异国情调的 同义词:outside, extraneous Dark matter may seem exotic , but cosmologists regard it as the essence of simplicity .暗物质可能看来奇特，但是宇宙学家将其视为简单的要素。
vt. 使移居国外；流放，放逐；使放弃国籍 vi. 移居国外；放弃原国籍 n. 被流放者；移居国外者 adj. 移居国外的；被流放的 同义词:transport, banish She was expatriated for some political reason.她因某种政治原因而被流放国外。
adj. 权宜的；方便的；有利的 n. 权宜之计；应急手段 同义词:convenient, favorable, beneficial, advantageous, quick fix, makeshift Einstein found it expedient to use in the creation of his theories .爱因斯坦发现这种本性在他理论的创建中是有用的。
vt. 加快；促进；发出 adj. 畅通的；迅速的；方便的 同义词:facilitate, promote, boost, further, convenient, rapid, fast, forward, ready to expedite shipments加速装运
n. 远征；探险队；迅速 同义词:velocity, speed He bound himself to pay half the cost of the expedition .他保证支付这次远足旅行费用的一半。
n. 专门知识；专门技术；专家的意见 同义词:special knowledge, professional knowledge The centre is itself an example of such expertise .该中心本身就是这种专门技能的一个实例。
adj. 明确的；清楚的；直率的；详述的 同义词:precise, decided, distinct, specific, express Bill Venners : What do you mean ? Could you be more explicit ?比尔：你的意思是什么？能更“明确”的解释一下吗？
vt. 解释；详细说明 vi. 解释；详细说明 同义词:specify, translate, account, to interpret to expound theories阐述理论

adv. 清楚地，明显地；特别地，专门地 同义词:definitely, obviously, specially, clearly, particularly It is available free of use for any person , and expressly permits modification for custom purposes .任何人均可自由使用，而且明确允许为定制目的所作的更改。

n. 驱逐；开除 同义词:ouster, exclusion After the expulsion of America 's ambassadors to Venezuela and Bolivia , Mr Correa hastened to say that he would not be following suit .美国驻委内瑞拉与玻利维亚的大使被逐出之后，科雷亚急忙地讲道，他不会步其后尘。
adj. 精致的；细腻的；优美的，高雅的；异常的；剧烈的 n. 服饰过于讲究的男子 同义词:elegant, severe, novel, sophisticated, pretty Ah , yes , the exquisite agony of heartbreak .啊，是的，爱情心碎带来的剧痛。
adj. 外部的；表面的；外在的 n. 外部；表面；外型；外貌 同义词:outer, outside, surface, facial, aspect, without, colour Urine may drain through one or more skin sinuses to the exterior .尿液可通过一个或几个皮肤窦而流到体外。
vt. 消灭；根除 同义词:destroy, kill off to exterminate insects消灭虫子
adj. 外部的；表面的；[药] 外用的；外国的；外面的 n. 外部；外观；外面 同义词:foreign, outer, outside, surface, out, outside, without, surface, face, garment Why should it depend for recovery on external demand ?其经济复苏为何要依赖于外部需求呢？
vt. 熄灭；压制；偿清 同义词:silence, go out to extinguish a candle熄灭蜡烛

adj. 外来的；没有关联的；来自体外的 同义词:outside, exotic Extraneous null statements are not always harmless .无关的空语句并非总是无害的。
n. [数] 外推法；推断 同义词:inference, sequitur Measuring static austenitic recrystallization by Back extrapolation method .采用后插法来测定静态再结晶分数。
adj. 地球外的 n. 天外来客 Methane may have extraterrestrial significance .甲烷具有星际意义。
vt. 使解脱；解救；使游离 同义词:save, ease of to extricate someone from a dangerous situation使某人摆脱险境
adj. 外在的；外来的；非固有的 同义词:outside, exterior The question extrinsic to our discussion .这个问题和我们的讨论无关。

n. 制造，建造；装配；伪造物 同义词:assembly, manufacture, machining, make, fishing It has portrayed the British charges as a politically fabrication aimed at undermining Russia 's reputation .俄认为英国的指控是有其政治动机，那就是要破坏俄国的国际声誉。
n. 正面；表面；外观 同义词:garment, right side The facade of stone drips , arcs , and blossoms as if it were vegetable .岩石滴水、圆拱和花朵的立面把它装点得如植物般花团锦簇。
n. 派别；内讧；小集团；纪实小说 同义词:wing, junta The progressive faction demanded a reserve system and currency supply owned and controlled by the government .进步派系要求建立由政府占有和控制的储备制度和货币供应。
n. 因素；要素；[物] 因数；代理人 vi. 做代理商 vt. 把…作为因素计入；代理经营；把…分解成 同义词:element, deputy, agent, basic, essential He factored his cousin's estate for five years.他经管他表兄弟的财产有五年之久。
n. 时尚；一时的爱好；一时流行的狂热 同义词:fashion, mode, style Research lurches from fad to fad — cancer viruses , immunology , genomics .研究方向变来变去--癌症病毒学、免疫学、基因学。
vi. 褪色；凋谢；逐渐消失 vt. 使褪色 adj. 平淡的；乏味的 n. [电影][电视] 淡出；[电影][电视] 淡入 同义词:peter, color fading, discolor, stupid, literal-minded The blue rug has faded over years.蓝色的地毯多年后已经褪色了。
n. 假货；骗子；[体]假动作 vt. 捏造；假装…的样子 vi. 假装；[体]做假动作 adj. 伪造的 He was arrested for faking some famous paintings.他由于伪造一些名画而被捕。
vi. 落下；变成；来临；减弱 n. 下降；秋天；瀑布 vt. 砍倒；击倒 adj. 秋天的 同义词:become, come, lower, reduction, decline, autumn, floor, cut sth down, autumn Apples fell from the tree.苹果从树上落下。
n. 谬论，谬误 同义词:idola, paralogism But Mr Carey pulls the pathetic fallacy out of the hat with panache .但是凯里用华丽的辞藻把可怜的假象展现在了眼前。
n. 原子尘；[核][环境] 放射性尘埃；原子尘微粒回降；附带结果 In the fallout from the Greek crisis , the market 's confidence about Ireland , Portugal and Spain was draining away .希腊危机的余波便是，对爱尔兰、葡萄牙和西班牙的市场信心被耗尽了。

adj. 休耕的；不活跃的 n. 休耕地；休耕 vt. 使（土地）休闲；潜伏 同义词:inactive, sleepy, lie low, to conceal The market is also crimped by a rule that no more than 20% of farmland in any county may lie fallow .市场还受到一条规则的束缚：任何县中休耕农田不得超过农田总数的20%。
vi. 支吾；蹒跚地走 vt. 支吾地说；结巴地讲出 n. 踌躇；支吾；颤抖 同义词:mouch, hesitancy, vacillation The boy faltered when the policeman demanded his name.在警察要求男孩说出他的姓名时，他支支吾吾。
n. 饥荒；饥饿，奇缺 同义词:hunger, fames Warnings of flood , famine , drought and mass extinction merge into an overwhelming sense of futility .洪水、饥荒、干旱和物种灭绝等征候，渐渐化作无法抑制的徒劳感。
n. 狂热入迷者；盲信者；盲信 adj. 狂热的；盲信的 同义词:bigot, crazy, wild, enthusiastic Strickland had the directness of the fanatic and the ferocity of the apostle .斯特里克兰德有着盲信者的直截了当和使徒的狂热不羁。
n. 吹牛，炫耀；喇叭或号角嘹亮的吹奏声 vt. 热热闹闹地宣布 同义词:display, blague For a world first, the announcement came with fanfare .作为一项世界先例，消息发布之低调令人吃惊。
adj. 深远的；广泛的；伸至远处的 同义词:extensive, widespread, comprehensive The applications will show that the rather dry considerations have far-reaching consequences .各种应用将表明，这些相当枯燥的考虑具有深远的后果。
n. 闹剧；胡闹；笑剧 同义词:slapstick comedy, dido to farce a play with old jokes用陈旧的笑话给戏剧增添趣味
vi. 经营；进展；遭遇；过活 n. 票价；费用；旅客；食物 同义词:round, advance, passenger, food, fee, charge, diet He usually fares sumptuously.他平常吃得很丰富。
adj. 致命的；重大的；毁灭性的；命中注定的 同义词:important, significant, great, fell, kill In drivers and workers it can lead to fatal accidents .这在司机或工人身上可能引发致命的事故。

n. 死亡；宿命；致命性；不幸；灾祸 同义词:death, disaster, end, evil, dying It generally cannot cause death , but if its complication dont be treated promptly , to result in 2.5% - 8.0% fatality rate .胃溃疡一般不会引起患者死亡，但其并发症（主要是出血、穿孔和癌变），若不及时处理，可导致2.5％-8.0％的病死率。
n. 故障；[地质] 断层；错误；缺点；毛病；（网球等）发球失误 vi. 弄错；产生断层 vt. （通常用于疑问句或否定句）挑剔 同义词:error, deficiency, defect, mistake, trouble, mistake, err in, carp at, trip up a performance which could not be faulted无可挑剔的演出
n. 动物群；[动] 动物区系 同义词:zoology By contrast , the extent to which the Gat threatens Australia 's fauna is not clear .相形之下，猫威胁澳大利亚动物群的程度现在还没有弄清楚。
n. 蚕豆（等于fava bean） 同义词:horsebean, broad beans A census taker once tried to test me . I ate his liver with some fava beans and a nice chianti.一次有个人口普查员想测试我，我用蚕豆和勤地酒佐餐，吃掉了他的肝。

n. 腺 He read of animals with prolonged pregnancies whose fetuses lacked a gland .他了解到妊娠过长的动物，它们的胎儿缺少脑垂体前叶。

n. [有化] 甘油；丙三醇 同义词:propanetriol The first step is hydrolysis , with the production of glycerol and fatty acids .第一步是水解，生成甘油和脂肪酸。
abbr. 国民生产总值（gross national product） GNP growth rate is the primary indicator of the status of the economy .它是衡量一个国家经济地位最主要的指标。
n. 大猩猩 The judge was an old gray gorilla .法官是一只年老的灰猩猩。

n. 政府；政体；管辖 同义词:regime, presidency We believe in our government .我们信赖自己的政府。

n. [数][物] 梯度；坡度；倾斜度 adj. 倾斜的；步行的 同义词:obliquity, lean, walking, raked Electro- osmosis drains the soil electrochemically by making the water move along an electric gradient in the clay.电渗透是用电化学方法使水沿泥土中的电梯度的方向运动，使土壤干燥。
adj. 逐渐的；平缓的 n. 弥撒升阶圣歌集 同义词:piecemeal The overall result is a gradual spiraling of matter toward the central star or black hole .整体的效果则是造成物质渐渐以螺旋状朝向中心恒星或黑洞移动。
adj. 夸张的；夸大的；大言不惭的 同义词:tall, exaggerative With the exception of Ron Paul , all the serious candidates waxed grandiloquent about their aims .除了罗恩·保罗（RonPaul），其余所有主要候选人都在往自己脸上贴金，大言不惭的鼓出自己的执政目标。
n. 宏伟；夸张 同义词:inflation, brilliance Wagner was a ruthless opportunist and an outspoken anti- Semite with an ego on par with grandiosity of his operas .瓦格纳是一个无情的机会主义者，也是一个直言不讳的反犹分子。他的自我主义和他的歌剧一样夸大。
adj. 颗粒的；粒状的 同义词:grainy Starch : Any of several white , granular organic compounds produced by all green plants .淀粉：数种由所有绿色植物制造的白色、粒状有机化合物的统称。
n. 坟墓边 At the graveside , his widow and daughters clung to his corpse .在墓旁，他的遗孀和女儿们依偎在他的遗体边。
vi. 受引力作用；被吸引 The earth gravitates towards the sun.地球受太阳吸引。

adj. 社交的；群居的 同义词:social Mike is a gregarious young man .迈克是个爱社交的年轻人。
n. 不满，不平；委屈；冤情 同义词:dissatisfaction, complaint White , in his new capacity, was anxious to exploit his grievance against Golconda .怀特有了新的职权，急于发泄他对戈尔康达的不满。
adj. 冷酷的；糟糕的；残忍的 同义词:frozen, cruel In Britain the situation was equally grim , but with one major difference .在英国，情况同样是严竣的，但有一个很大的区别。
n. 紧握；柄；支配；握拍方式；拍柄绷带 vt. 紧握；夹紧 vi. 抓住 同义词:governance, disposal, purchase, handle, ruling, squeeze, clamp, clutch at, take hold The frightened boy gripped his mother's hand.惊恐的男孩牢牢抓住妈妈的手。

n. 地面；土地；范围；战场 vt. 使接触地面；打基础；使搁浅 vi. 着陆；搁浅 adj. 土地的；地面上的；磨碎的；磨过的 v. 研磨（grind的过去分词）；压迫 同义词:extent, boundary, region, spectrum, territory, area, strand, beach, to land, agrarian, earth's, oppressed The boxer grounded his opponent.这名拳击手把对手打翻在地。
adj. 可怕的；阴森的 同义词:terrible, horrible, awesome, fearful, dire After the slaughter , the battlefield gruesome sight.经过这场斯杀，战场上一派触目惊心的惨状。
adj. 易受骗的；轻信的 同义词:naive, credulous That gullible ". For this is probably the most expensive green power in the world .因为这台电脑可能是世界上最贵的绿色能源了。
n. 体操运动员 Gymnast Paul Hamm won't be going to Beijing after all.体操运动员保罗·汉姆终将无缘本次北京奥运会。
n. 妇科医生 She is a gynecologist .她是个妇科医生。
n. 旋转，[力] 回转；螺层 同义词:revolution, rotation, rolling, turning In this case , a charged particle has a simple cyclotron gyration .在这种情况下，带电粒子有一个简单的回旋回转。
n. （美）男子服饰用品店；（英）杂货商店 We must all share the blame for haberdashery incident .我们在这次男子服饰经销店事件中都有责任。

n. 居住；住所 同义词:residence, place, occupancy The area fell out of habitation for lack of water.那地方因缺水已无人居住。
n. [高能] 强子（参与强相互作用的基本粒子） Its successor , CERN 's Large Hadron Collider, will also use protons .它的继任者，欧洲核子研究组织（CERN）的「大强子对撞机」，用的也是质子。
n. 冰雹；致敬；招呼；一阵 vt. 致敬；招呼；向...欢呼；猛发；使象下雹样落下（过去式hailed，过去分词hailed，现在分词hailing，第三人称单数hails） vi. 招呼；下雹 int. 万岁；欢迎 同义词:precipitation, blast, welcome, rah They hailed him as King.大家欢呼拥戴他为国王。
n. 特点；品质证明 vt. 给…盖上品质证明印记；使具有…标志 同义词:trait, distinguishing feature The necklace was hallmarked with Pt 999.那条白金项链上印有纯正优质标记。
vt. 妨碍；束缚；使困累 n. 食盒，食篮；阻碍物 同义词:let, chain, bound, hindrance, incumbrance A steady rain hampered the progress of the work.持续不停的大雨妨碍了工程的进展。
n. 仓鼠；仓鼠毛皮 同义词:cricetid Maria , have you got a pet ? Yes , hamster .玛丽亚，你养有宠物吗?有的，一只大颊鼠。
n. 障碍；不利条件，不利的因素 vt. 妨碍，阻碍；使不利 同义词:obstacle, let, bar, dam, disadvantage, let, slow He was handicapped by his height.他的身高妨碍了他的发展。

adj. 坚强的；勇敢的；能吃苦耐劳的；鲁莽的 n. 强壮的人；耐寒植物；方柄凿 同义词:strong, tough, game, brave, steel Sheep are hardy animals , needing little care , except at lambing and shearing time .羊是耐苦动物，除了养羔及剪毛时期，几乎不需要照料。

n. 港口；避难所，安息所 vt. 为……提供避难处；安置……于港中 同义词:port, home, harbor He havened his motorboat on a small harbour.他把摩托艇停泊在一个小港上。
n. 大破坏；浩劫；蹂躏 vt. 严重破坏 vi. 损毁 同义词:ravage, damage The furniture and fittings of my house were havocked by them.我屋中的家具和装置全让他们给损坏了。
adj. 有危险的；冒险的；碰运气的 同义词:risky, jeopardous But the conditions that create such devastating fires also make them hazardous to study .造成这种毁灭性大火的情况，也使得研究工作格外危险。
n. 刺猬 hedgehog often contracts its body into a ball .刺猬常常把它的身体收缩成一个圆球。

adj. 重的；肌肉发达的；异常大的 adv. 强有力地；非常 n. 体格健壮的人 同义词:weighty, muscular, strongly, extremely, badly, highly, greatly, too And it is the result of a quirk , due in part to small up ticks in production , exports and domestic sales following a year of hefty shortfalls .日本经济回暖仅仅是机缘巧合，部分得益于国内生产、出口和内销在经历了一年的大幅下跌后的小幅攀升。

n. 高地；高度；身高；顶点 同义词:altitude, raise, sky, summit, peak He dominates everyone else by his height .他个子比其他所有的人都高。

n. [化学] 氦（符号为He，2号元素） Most of commercial helium is recovered from natural gas through a cryogenic separation process .大多数商用氦是通过一种低温分离过程从天然气中回收的。
n. 边，边缘；摺边 vt. 包围；给...缝边 vi. 做褶边 同义词:margin, rim, case, invest Hem your shirt with lace.把你的衬衣镶上花边。
n. [生化] 血红蛋白（等于haemoglobin）；血红素 同义词:hematoglobin, haemoglobin The heme of the hemoglobin in blood cells gives them their characteristic red hue.例如血球细胞中的血红素，其独特的红色便是由血色素所造成。
n. 肝炎 People with hepatitis who work in restaurants often pass on the infection in the food .在餐馆工作的肝炎患者经常通过食物把这种病传染给他人。
n. [农药] 除草剂 同义词:weedicide Yes , only one herbicide is needed for all Roundup Ready crops .而且，所有的抗草甘磷作物只需要一种除草剂。
adj. 遗传的；世袭的；世代相传的 n. 遗传类 同义词:genetic, inherited The Home of Lords consists of hereditary peers , life peers , high churchmen and some judges .上议院由世袭的贵族、终身贵族、高级圣职人员和一些法官组成。
adj. 异端的；异教的 同义词:heterodox, unorthodox Cracking down , or at least discouraging , heretical beliefs is part of his job .打击，或者至少说是阻碍异教的信仰，是他的职责。
n. 遗产；传统；继承物；继承权 同义词:tradition, succession, inheritance, legacy Individuals who do get on often dump their Romani heritage , and the baggage that goes with it.一些融入社会的人往往已经抛弃了罗姆人的传统，抛弃了罗姆人的信仰。
n. 鲱（又称青鱼） A herring is a North Atlantic fish that can be eaten .鲱鱼是一种可食用的北大西洋海鱼。
n. [生物] 异质性；[化学] 不均匀性；[化学] 多相性 同义词:nonuniformity, ununiformity In heterogeneity is creation of the world .世界产生自异质性。

n. 六角形，六边形 adj. 成六角的；成六边的 同义词:sexangle After passing through the fifth hexagon , I paused and on a whim I reached out and dislodged a stiff green book from a cramped upper shelf .穿过第五个回廊之后，我稍作停留，一时兴起，伸手从一个塞满书的上层书架抽出一本绿色的硬皮书。
n. 层级；等级制度 In the hierarchy of the Soviet empire , Chechnya was a backwater .在苏维埃帝国的阶级制度，车臣就是一潭死水。
vt. 突出；强调；使显著；加亮 n. 最精彩的部分；最重要的事情；加亮区 同义词:emphasize, stress, first thing His remarks highlighted his own function.他的讲话突出了他个人的作用。
vi. 成为阻碍 vt. 阻碍；打扰 adj. 后面的 同义词:slow, impede, latter, back, rear I wouldn't hinder your work,I'm going swimming right now.我不会妨碍你工作，我这就去游泳。

n. 内地；穷乡僻壤；靠港口供应的内地贸易区 同义词:inland, outback The capital 's citizens , inured to fighting in hinterland , remain shocked by the speed with which the rebels reached them .首都的居民尽管已经习惯于乍得中心地区的战乱，他们仍然对叛军进攻的速度感动惊讶。

adv. 迄今；至今 同义词:hereunto, erenow Thanks to America , and only thanks to America , the world has enjoyed these past decades an age of hitherto unimagined freedom and opportunity .由于美国，并且也只是多亏了美国的存在，在过去几十年里世界才享有迄今无法想象的自由和机会。

adj. 整体的；全盘的 同义词:integral, wholistic This principle plays on the holistic nature of systems .这个原理利用的是系统的整体性。
n. 杀人；杀人犯 同义词:manslaughter Homicide by automobile is a special category of homicide recognized in some states .汽车肇事杀人罪是一些州所规定的特定类别的非预谋杀人罪。
n. 原始人类；人科动物 adj. 人类及其祖先的 同义词:homonid This research is yielding clues to how the self may have evolved in our hominid ancestors .也就是我们每个人都拥有的，自己是个独立个体的认知。

n. 磨刀石；想念；抱怨 vt. 用磨刀石磨 同义词:complaint, sharpening stone He was honing his razor although it's very sharp.尽管他的剃刀十分锋利了，可他还是不停地磨它。

adj. 可怕的；惊人的 同义词:terrible, tremendous, awesome, fearful, incredible "It 's a horrendous crime to make a Xerox of someone , " argues author and science critic Jeremy Rifkin.作家及科学评论家杰里米·里夫金认为：“复制某人是极其骇人的罪行。
adj. 热情友好的；（环境）舒适的 同义词:pleasant, comfortable, easy The current climate, however , is not hospitable to this idea .然而，目前的潮流却不太接受这个想法。
n. 敌意；战争行动 同义词:hatred, enmity Opposition to the war , he still thinks , explains much of the hostility to him .他仍然认为，对战争的反对可以解释对他的多数敌意。
adj. 家庭的；日常的；王室的 n. 家庭；一家人 同义词:domestic, family, daily, everyday, routine, family, race In India the starkest divisions are sometimes within the household .在印度，有时最明显的差别体现在家庭中。

n. 色彩；色度；叫声 同义词:cry, wow He turned of a deadly hue , and a sudden horror seemed to fall upon him .他的脸色变得死一般地惨白，仿佛陡然为一种恐怖所笼罩着。
vi. 发低哼声 vt. 用哼声表示 n. 嗡嗡声；哼声；杂声 int. 哼；嗯 同义词:groaning, zoom, uh-uh, um A bee hummed around flowers.一只蜜蜂围着花朵嗡嗡作响。
adj. 人道主义的；博爱的；基督凡人论的 n. 人道主义者；慈善家；博爱主义者；基督凡人论者 同义词:philanthropic, caritative, philanthropist, charitarian TO HIS local newspaper , he was " a great leader and humanitarian ".家乡的报纸称他是一位“伟大的领袖和人道主义者”。
n. [有化] 碳氢化合物 During incomplete combustion some of the hydrocarbon fuel is cracked .在不完全的燃烧中，一些烃燃料裂解。

n. 人工发热机 It could be equipped with Hypertherm plasma generator imported from America and plasma generator made in China as required by users ;可根据客户要求配备美国原装进口海宝等离子发生器和国产等离子发生器；
n. 施催眠术的人 This is what makes stage hypnotist shows so entertaining .这才让舞台催眠师的表演那么具有娱乐性。
n. 直角三角形的斜边 ratio of the hypotenuse to the adjacent side .直角三角形的斜边与一个角的邻边之比。
n. [解剖] 下丘脑 The posterior hypothalamus performs the function of defence against cold .下丘脑后部执行着抵御寒冷的功能。
n. 假设 同义词:tentative His hypothesis turned out to be correct .事实证明他的假设是正确的。

n. 布洛芬，异丁苯丙酸（抗炎，镇痛药） 同义词:brufen Increasing calcium intake has been shown to prevent or reduce cramps, which are Best treated with ibuprofen .增加钙的摄入量近期被证实可以防止或减少疼痛，可用伊布普洛芬来治疗。
n. 肖像研究；肖像学；图解 同义词:diagram, illustration According to the strict rules of Hindu iconography , Ganesha figures with only two hands are taboo .依照印度教肖像学的严格规则，甘尼萨只有二臂的外形是被禁止的。
adj. 同一的；完全相同的 n. 完全相同的事物 同义词:self, same Then he let the soup of identical bugs replicate and ferment .然后他令这些一模一样的菌虫复制并发酵。
vt. 确定；识别；使参与；把…看成一样 vi. 确定；认同；一致 同义词:confirm, recognize, ascertain, cotton, square He identified his baggage among hundreds of others.他在几百件行李中认出了自己的行李。
adj. 表意的；表意字构成的 同义词:token The kanji are a complex ideographic writing system stolen from China .汉字是从中国借鉴的复杂的表意字符书写体系。
n. 自语症；自我语法
n. 特质；气质；风格 同义词:mode, attribute, style, particularity, colour Eating no meat was Amy 's idiosyncrasy .不吃肉是艾美的习惯。
adj. 闲置的；懒惰的；停顿的 vi. 无所事事；虚度；空转 vt. 虚度；使空转 同义词:stopped, lazy, sit around, lie about, moon, dream away Don't idle away your time.别浪费光阴。
n. 点火，点燃；着火，燃烧；点火开关，点火装置 同义词:combustion, burning, fires, inflammation Insert the key in the ignition lock cylinder and turn ignition switch to the On position .将钥匙插入点火锁柱中，旋转点火开关到开启的位置。
n. 鬣蜥蜴 " Schuster told reporters " iguana as a result of the recent good , we must see this .舒斯特尔对记者说道，“伊瓜因最近状态很好，我们必须看到这一点。
adj. 文盲的；不识字的；没受教育的 n. 文盲 同义词:letterless, unlettered, unschooled, analphabetic Her powers had received no aid from education : she was ignorant and illiterate .她的才能没能得到教育的帮助，她蒙昧无知。
vt. 阐明，说明；照亮；使灿烂；用灯装饰 vi. 照亮 同义词:say, lamp, elucidate, clarify, light up, to shine In the countryside, houses are still illuminated by oil lamps.在农村，房屋仍然靠油灯照明。
adj. 错觉的，幻影的（等于illusional） 同义词:phantasmal Beyond the illusionary screen , summer heat is billowing .幻觉的屏风之外，夏天，热浪滚滚。
adj. 错觉的；幻影的；虚假的；产生幻觉的 同义词:phantasmal, mendacious As Mr Turner notes , the promise of securitisation has turned out to be partly illusory .正如特纳所指出的，资产证券化的许诺，结果证明有一部分是虚幻的。
adj. 非物质的；无形的；不重要的；非实质的 同义词:small, invisible, intangible The total -head tubes should be cut off square, and their length is immaterial .总压管端应加工平整，至于它们的长度则无关紧要。
adj. 立即的；直接的；最接近的 同义词:instant, direct, right Yet exit is merely the most immediate challenge .不过，退出仅仅是最直接的挑战。
adj. 即将来临的；迫近的 同义词:upcoming, forthcoming If he was not in imminent danger , they would not to take this sort of action .如果不是因为他随时会有生命危险，他们是不会采取这种行动的。
adj. 不道德的；邪恶的；淫荡的 同义词:evil, ill, black, ugly, wicked We believe that cloning should be banned because it is immoral .我们认为克隆应该被禁止因为它是不道德的。
adj. 免疫的；免于……的，免除的 n. 免疫者；免除者 同义词:exonerative Some research groups are hoping to train immune cells to recognize and go after cancer stem cells .有些研究团队希望能训练免疫细胞，使它们能辨识并追缉癌症干细胞；
adj. 免疫学的 Amongst these other species , birds have provided an invaluable model for investigating basic immunological mechanisms .在这些物种中，禽类是研究基础免疫机理的一个非常有价值的模型。
adj. 不变的；不可变的；不能变的 同义词:constant, permanent, steady We assume there is immutable about the school year 's rhythm .我们假定学年的节奏基本上保持不变。

vt. 影响；撞击；冲突；压紧 vi. 冲击；产生影响 n. 影响；效果；碰撞；冲击力 同义词:affect, influence, reach, work on, strike, charge at, effect, impression, influence, infection, affection The soldier impacted his sword into the ground.那个战士将他的剑紧紧插入地下。
vt. 给予（尤指抽象事物），传授；告知，透露 同义词:afford, allow, deal, reveal, extend The carpet imparted an air of elegance to the room.地毯使房间有了一种优雅的气氛。
n. 公正，公平；不偏不倚 同义词:equity, fairness, righteousness And impartiality does not always guarantee access .然而，公平并不总能保证可以畅通。
n. 僵局；死路 同义词:logjam, deadlock Congress is plainly in a protectionist mood , as the impasse over fast - track shows .如快速通道僵局所显示的，国会现正处于一种简单的贸易保护主义态度。
vt. 阻碍；妨碍；阻止 同义词:dispute, let, stem, slow Heavy rain impeded our journey.瓢泼大雨阻碍了我们的旅行。
n. 口吃；妨碍；阻止 同义词:prevention, intervention, violation, check He impediment in speech .那小女孩说话有点口吃。
adj. 必要的，势在必行的；命令的；紧急的 n. 需要；命令；祈使语气；规则 同义词:necessary, urgent, essential, emergency, instant, necessity, instruction, need, request, order But the economic imperative is clear .但是经济规则一目了然。
adj. 帝国的；皇帝的；至高无上的；威严的 n. 纸张尺寸；特等品 同义词:august, sovereign The dikes of imperial snobbery holdback a raging sea of color .势利的英帝国堤坝阻挡着狂怒的有色人种的海洋。
adj. 客观的；非个人的；没有人情味的；非人称的 n. 非人称动词；不具人格的事物 同义词:objective A safe topic of conversation between strangers in Britain is the weather -- unemotional and impersonal .在英国，陌生人之间的合适的话题是天气??因为这不涉及情感与个人隐私。
n. 动力；促进；冲力 同义词:momentum, promotion, acceleration The writer believes team work provides staff a stronger impetus for some part of works in their decision .团队工作给予成员们更强劲的动力，因为他们在决策中有自己出的一份力。
vi. 撞击；侵犯 vt. 撞击 同义词:knock against, to infringe on, impact, strike Rays of light impinge upon the water.光线射到水面上。
vt. 种植；灌输；嵌入 n. [医] 植入物；植入管 vi. 被移植 同义词:crop, plant, grow, bed deeply implanted hatred深深埋藏的仇恨
n. 含义；暗示；牵连，卷入 同义词:connotation, meaning, import, involvement, reminder But the other implication is not so easily proved .但是，相反的推断不是容易证明的。
adj. 含蓄的；暗示的；盲从的 同义词:suggested, undemonstrative Shear force is implicit in the development of bending moments .杆中的剪力在弯矩的推导中是不明显的。
n. 进口，进口货；输入；意思，含义；重要性 vt. 输入，进口；含…的意思 vi. 输入，进口 同义词:significance, stress, value, weight, meaning, to input, type in, to input, type in imported goods进口货
n. 征收；强加；欺骗；不公平的负担 同义词:collection, fraud, expropriation Some blame imposition of higher tuition fees , others computer chaos at UCAS itself.有人指责是高学费惹的祸，也有人认为是UCAS内部电脑故障的缘故。
vt. 使贫穷；使枯竭 同义词:pauperize, beggar a village impoverished by flood被洪灾弄得贫困的村庄
adj. 敏感的；易受影响的 同义词:sensitive, subtle It 's like when you raise children , they 're most impressionable at their youngest stages .这就像抚养下一代，他们在最年轻的那个时段最容易受到影响。
adj. 不正确的，错误的；不适当的；不合礼仪的 同义词:false, wrong, incorrect, unhappy, inadequate A secret committee had determined to rid the town of all improper persons .一个秘密委员会已经决定把镇上所有不正派的人都清除掉。

n. 不受惩罚；无患；[法] 免罚 If the months tick by with Iran demonstrating to all the world just how easy it is to break the treaty 's rules impunity , the NPT will finally be done for.如果过去的几个月是为着伊朗向全世界展示它如何能轻易地不受惩罚地违反条款，那么不扩散核武器条约将最终归于无用。

adv. 内部地 adj. 内部的 同义词:internally, internal, inner, inside Which helps explain how Melcarek solved a problem that stumped the in- house researchers at Colgate - Palmolive.这有助于解释为什么梅尔卡雷克解决了困扰高露洁内部研究人员的问题。
prep. 按照（表示方式）；从事于；在…之内 adv. 进入；当选；（服装等）时髦；在屋里 adj. 在里面的；时髦的 n. 执政者；门路；知情者 同义词:within, inside, modern, fashionable, tony in the room在房间里
adj. 疏忽的；不注意的（副词inadvertently）；无意中做的 同义词:inattentive, negligent His blunder was inadvertent , and we forgave it .他的错误是无意的，我们原谅它。
adj. 不可分割的；不可剥夺的；不能让与的 同义词:indissociable, inseparable Serbia has a new constitution stating that Kosovo is inalienable part of the country .塞尔维亚拥有了一部新宪法，其中规定科索沃是该国不可剥夺的一部分。
adj. 辉耀的；炽热的；发白热光的 同义词:molten, fervent Mary : Of course not . The incandescent lamp we use in daily life was invented by Edison .玛丽：当然没有。我们日常生活中用的白炽灯，是爱迪生发明的。

n. 动机；刺激 adj. 激励的；刺激的 同义词:motivation, stimulus, reason, excitement, needle, stimulative, hortatory On the one hand , a sale would lower the price and thus reduce the incentive to poach .允许出售象牙一方面能够将象牙的价格压低，从而降低偷猎的诱惑。
n. 焚化；烧成灰 to incinerate the dead body将尸体火化
adj. 初期的；初始的；起初的；发端的 同义词:earlier, young Beijing 's Olympics may themselves be a sign of this incipient democracy .可能北京奥运会本身就是这种初始民主的一个迹象。
adj. 深刻的；敏锐的；锋利的 同义词:acute, sharp, keen, cutting He combined curious qualities of naivete with incisive wit and worldly sophistication.他把天真质朴的奇怪品质同锐利的机智和老练的世故结合了起来。

adj. 不相容的；矛盾的；不能同时成立的 n. 互不相容的人或事物 同义词:antipathic, contradictory This program is linked to the missing export in the file . This machine may have an incompatible version of .该程序被链接到已不存在的出口（位于文件中）。这台机器可能有版本不兼容的。

n. 不协调；不一致；不适宜 同义词:variance, disparity When I point to the incongruity , Chen doesn't miss a beat: " That shows one thing — the assumption that people like money is correct ."当我指出室内外的不协调时，陈其一立刻回应：「这只证明了一件事──人们爱钱的假设是正确的。」
adj. 不重要的；不合理的；不合逻辑的 同义词:unreasonable, small, trivial, unimportant On the face of it , these comments were both obvious and inconsequential .从表面上看，这些言论说的都是明摆着的事，无足轻重。
vt. 包含，吸收；体现；把……合并 vi. 合并；混合；组成公司 adj. 合并的；一体化的；组成公司的 同义词:involve, contain, absorb, comprise, merge, mix together, amalgamative, pooled to be incorporated a member of the union被吸收为工会会员
n. 增加，增长；提高 vi. 增加，增大；繁殖 vt. 增加，加大 同义词:enhancement, growth, gain, raising, advance, improve, gain, accelerate, breed, make, enhance, boost, jack, mount, hot to increase speed增加速度
n. [数] 增量；增加；增额；盈余 同义词:enhancement, gain, surplus, rise The change from one value to another in a single increment and in negligible time .在可忽略不计的时间内，信号从一个值按单位增量跃变到另一个值。

n. 谆谆教诲；教授 同义词:professor, prefessor to inculcate an idea upon somebody向某人反复灌输某一思想

adj. 现任的；依靠的；负有职责的 n. 在职者；现任者；领圣俸者 同义词:dependent, anaclitic The independent candidate also is especially critical of incumbent President Roh Moo-hyun's engagement policy with North Korea .这位无党派候选人还尤其批评了现任总统卢武铉对北朝鲜的接触政策。
n. 入侵；侵犯 同义词:violence, invasion, infringement It was Russia's first big military incursion beyond its borders since it invaded Afghanistan in 1979 .这是俄罗斯自1979年入侵阿富汗之后首次在其境外进行军事入侵行动。
adj. 难忘的；擦不掉的 同义词:unforgettable, memorable The whole incident left one indelible impression .整个事件给人留下深刻的印象。
n. 契约；合同 vt. 以契约约束 同义词:compact, covenant She had to sign an indenture to sell herself, because she owed money to the landlord .由于欠地主家的钱，她不得已签了卖身契。
n. 目录（index的复数） 同义词:contents, directories to index a book给一本书编索引

adj. 本土的；土著的；国产的；固有的 同义词:native, inherent, mainland, intrinsic Furthermore , only nine countries — mostly in Europe — have enough indigenous capacity to supply their own people.而且只有九个国家，大部分在欧洲，可以为本国居民提供足够的疫苗。
adj. 贫困的；贫穷的（副词indigently） 同义词:poor, needy His single- mindedness was forged in indigent childhood .童年的贫苦生活养成了李明博坚定的性格。
n. 愤慨；愤怒；义愤 同义词:anger, wrath The manager expressed his indignation at being unfairly dismissed by the president .经理对他被总裁不公平解雇的一事愤愤不平。
adj. 任意的；无差别的；不分皂白的 同义词:random, arbitrary That is a decent start , but may be too indiscriminate .这是一个不错的开端，但或许有些恣意妄为。
n. [药] 消炎痛；茚甲新 Potential customer : Do you have indomethacin ?顾客：我想买两盒消炎痛，里有吗？
n. 诱因，刺激物 同义词:stimulus, irritation They have little inducement to work harder .他们没有什麽更加努力工作的好处。
vt. 满足；纵容；使高兴；使沉迷于… vi. 沉溺；满足；放任 同义词:meet, fulfill, fill, please, baby, luxuriate, to satisfy to indulge oneself in smoking纵情吸烟
adj. 笨拙的；不适当的 同义词:inadequate, unhappy, wrong, clumsy, awkward In fact , those people who were most inept were also the most likely to overestimate their abilities .事实上，这些不称职的员工正是最可能过高估计自身能力的人。
n. [力] 惯性；惰性，迟钝；不活动 同义词:nonreactivity, inaction The genes harbor their own wisdom and their own inertia .基因拥有自己的智慧和自己的惯性。
adj. 必然的，不可避免的 同义词:certain, necessary, automatic That does not mean a downgrade is inevitable , however .然而，这并不意味着降级是不可避免的。
adj. 无情的；不屈不挠的；不可阻挡的；无法改变的 同义词:tough, relentless, ruthless, unrelenting The economic logic is inexorable .经济规律是无情的。
adj. 费解的；无法说明的；不能解释的 同义词:unexplainable, incomprehensible Romance has seemed inexplicable as the beauty of a rainbow .浪漫被看做是跟彩虹一样无法说明的美。
adj. 逃脱不掉的；解不开的 My heart sunk again on viewing the inextricable complexity of this deception .看到这个骗局的错综复杂，我的心又沈了下来。
n. 初期；婴儿期；幼年 同义词:morning, prime Spain 's high-speed network is still in infancy .西班牙的高速铁路网络仍处在起步阶段。
adj. 传染的；传染性的；易传染的 同义词:catching, epidemic It calls for huge new investments in methods to prevent and treat infectious diseases .报告要求投入新的巨资来研究预防和治疗传染病的方法。
vt. 骚扰；寄生于；大批出没；大批滋生 同义词:harry, ply with places infested by snakes蛇大批出没的地方
