n. [动] 捕食者；[动] 食肉动物；掠夺者 同义词:carnivore, reiver Laws that bar sex offenders from living in so many places should be repealed , because there is no evidence that they protect anyone predator can always travel.应当废除给性犯罪者居住地设定诸多限制的法律，并没有证据表明这些法律保护了谁，因为性犯罪者可以随意搬迁。
n. 前任，前辈 同义词:father, grand old man The Obama administration has been more vigorous on this front than its predecessor .在这一阵线，奥巴马政府比它的前任者更加积极有活力。
n. 窘况，困境；状态 同义词:difficulty, status, corner, dilemma, fix It should also benefit the world economy in its present predicament .这也将有益于世界经济及其目前所处的困境。
vt. 断定为…；使…基于 vi. 断言，断定 n. 谓语，述语 adj. 谓语的；述语的 同义词:protest, conclude, adnex The government predicates that the market collapse was caused by Asian financial crisis.政府宣布市场不景气是由于亚洲金融危机而引起的。
n. 倾向；素质；易染病体质 同义词:tendency, liability, trend, preference, disposition A practicing forensic scientist has a built -in bias or predisposition toward the prosecution 's side.开业的法医学家对辩方有一种固有的偏爱或倾向。
n. 卓越；杰出 同义词:superexcellence, predominance Japan had no such confidence in its cultural preeminence or diplomatic skill .日本对本国文化的卓越程度和自己的外交手腕都缺乏这种信心。
n. 前言；引语 vt. 为…加序言；以…开始 vi. 作序 同义词:prolegomena, perface, begin with, open with He prefaced the diaries with a short account of how they were discovered.他给这本日记写了序言，简述日记发现的经过。
adj. 优先的；选择的；特惠的；先取的 同义词:prior, underlying If they were helped with preferential programmes , they ceased to strive .受到特惠计划照顾后，穷人将停止奋斗。
adj. 不利的；有害的；引起偏见的 同义词:harmful, adverse, against, evil, disadvantageous Too much smoking is prejudicial to health .吸烟过多对健康有损害。
adj. 早产的；不成熟的；比预期早的 n. 早产儿；过早发生的事物 同义词:raw, immature, pronatis The milk bank transports the milk to hospitals to premature or sick babies .母乳银行再将这些母乳运送到医院来救助早产儿或生病的婴儿。
n. 保险费，额外费用；奖金 同义词:bonus, dividend He would create a premium ice cream using only the finest ingredients .他会打造出一种优质冰淇淋，只用最上等的材料。
adj. 全神贯注的；心事重重的；被先占的 v. 抢先占有；使…全神贯注（preoccupy的过去式） 同义词:concentrated, rapt Something seems to be preoccupying her at the moment.她此刻若有所思。
n. 优势；多数；占优势 同义词:majority, superiority, advantage, edge, dominance A second problem is the preponderance of family -controlled firms .另一个问题是家族企业占多数。
n. 先决条件 adj. 首要必备的 同义词:prior condition, pre-condition A second prerequisite is that uranium 235 must be present in sufficient abundance .第二个必要条件是，铀235的含量必须够充足。

n. 防腐剂；预防法；防护层 adj. 防腐的；有保存力的；有保护性的 同义词:antiseptic agent, conserving agent, antirot, rotproof Historically , formaldehyde was first used as a biological preservative more than a century ago .历史上，甲醛曾首次作为生物防腐剂在一个多世纪前被应用。
n. 纸板；绝缘用合成纤维板；小熨烫板 同义词:boards, chipboard All research above can provide valuable help for measurement of trace moisture in transformer pressboard .通过以上研究可以为变压器绝缘纸板的微水分测量提供有利的帮助。
n. 威望，声望；声誉 同义词:reputation, credit But fighting in Afghanistan is not just about prestige .但是在阿富汗作战不仅仅是威望的问题。
n. 流行；普遍；广泛 同义词:popularity, rifeness To an outsider , the striking thing is the prevalence of assertion and the absence of facts .对局外人来说，引人注目的是断言的充斥和事实的缺乏。
adj. 以前的；早先的；过早的 adv. 在先；在…以前 同义词:ago, fore, antecedently Immigrant advocates counter that the current fee hike is far greater than previous increases .移民倡导者反驳说现在的收费上涨程度远远大于以前的增长。
vi. 捕食；掠夺；折磨 n. 捕食；牺牲者；被捕食的动物 同义词:grind down, lie on, victim, predation The villagers were preyed on by bandits from the hills.村民们受到山里强盗的抢劫。

n. 大主教；灵长类的动物；首领 adj. 灵长目动物的；首要的 同义词:leader, chief, captain, boss, principal, all-important Treetop delivery rooms are unusual for humans but not for other primate species .在树上生产对人类并不寻常，但是其他的灵长类就稀松平常了。
n. 黄金时段 NICK CLEGG confronts Gordon Brown and David Cameron on prime - time television , as British politics finally enters the 20th century .随着英国政治最终走入20世纪，尼克•克莱格常在黄金时段电视节目上与戈登•布朗和大卫•卡梅伦对峙。

adj. 主要的；最好的；基本的 adv. 极好地 n. 初期；青年；精华；全盛时期 vt. 使准备好；填装 vi. 作准备 同义词:greatest, major, elementary, central, main, excellently, famously, youth, morning, essence, elite, flower, ready, provide to prime an explosive device使爆炸装置准备起爆
n. 初级读本；识字课本；原始物 This is a Latin primer .这是拉丁文入门。
adj. 原始的，远古的；简单的，粗糙的 n. 原始人 同义词:original, simple, crude, plain, rough, Euroman This epic extolled the founder of this primitive tribe .这部史诗歌颂了这个原始部落的创始人。
n. 校长；委托人，当事人；资本；主犯 adj. 首要的；最重要的 同义词:president, client, party, headmaster, supreme, main, lead A school is only as good as its principal and teachers .一个学校实际上就是她的校长和老师。

adj. 优先的；在先的，在前的 adv. 在前，居先 同义词:preferred, underlying, before, antecedently The downside to such a policy is that it reinforces the structure of the economy that prevailed prior to the recession .而这样的政策也有负面发展的可能性，那就是它进一步强化了经济衰退之前的经济结构。
vt. [法] 遗嘱认证；处以缓刑；加以监护；在遗嘱认证法庭证明…精神失常 n. 遗嘱检验；经认证的遗嘱；遗嘱认证法院管辖范围内的一切事项 adj. [法] 遗嘱认证的 to have to be probated必须检验的
n. 探针；调查 vi. 调查；探测 vt. 探查；用探针探测 同义词:investigation, research, examine, explore, burrow into He probed the swelling anxiously with his finger.他用手指很担心地触摸肿处。
adj. 问题的；有疑问的；不确定的 同义词:indefinite, unsure This is the most problematic part of his thesis .这是他论题中最有争议的部分。
n. 收入，收益；实收款项 同义词:earning, yield, receipt In any other case alcohol formed as the reaction proceeds cannot be oxidized .在其它任何情况下，反应进行时所生成的醇，不能被氧化。
adj. 处理的，加工过的 v. 处理，加工（process的过去形式） 同义词:cope with, handle with to process leather to make it softer鞣制皮革使其变得柔软
n. 代理人；学监 vt. 监督 同义词:deputy, agent, factor, secondary, proxy, police, oversee, to monitor Torre said Proctor may have been too pumped up, trying to overthrow his pitches .老爹说天天p也许投高了，尝试把球投的太高了。
adj. 惊人的，异常的，奇妙的；巨大的 同义词:tremendous, wonderful, huge, enormous, massive This has helped to fuel China's prodigious growth .这帮助成就了中国巨大的经济增长。
n. 奇迹，奇事；奇才；奇观；预兆 同义词:phenomenon, wonder, miracle, warning Dressed in a ridiculous costume , he was presented at court as a prodigy of six .穿了一套可笑的服装，他被人以六岁神童的称号带到宫廷里去。
vt. 生产；引起；创作 n. 农产品，产品 vi. 生产，创作 同义词:attract, cause, operate, occasion, induce, manufacture, work, agricultural products, turn out, bring in The man produced a ticket from his pocket.那人从衣袋里掏出一张票。
n. 产品；结果；[数] 乘积；作品 同义词:outcome, event, result, manufacture, writing Only in respect of my own product .只是和我的产品有关的那些事。
adj. 熟练的，精通的 n. 精通；专家，能手 同义词:experienced, skilled, accomplished, perfect, clever, expert, specialist Mr. Barret is not proficient in diagnosis , let alone investigation .巴瑞特先生不擅长诊断，更不必提研究方面。
n. 侧面；轮廓；外形；剖面 同义词:configuration, side, shell, outline The huge trees were profiled against the night sky.在夜空的映衬下显出大树的轮廓。
n. 利润；利益 vi. 获利；有益 vt. 有益于 同义词:behalf, margin, benefit, gain, sake, advantage, gain, benefit, be good for It will profit you nothing to do that.你做那件事没有什么好处。
n. 赢利能力；收益性；利益率 同义词:rentability It is now being perceived as key to increased profitability .现在人们认为它是利润提升的重要条件。
adj. 深厚的；意义深远的；渊博的 同义词:encyclopedic, cyclopaedic This would be a profound tragedy , far more grievous than the tragedy of Vietnam itself .这当然会是一个深刻的悲剧，远比越南悲剧本身更加令人发愁。
adj. 进步的；先进的 n. 改革论者；进步分子 同义词:advanced, ascensive The country 's constitution , adopted in 1996 , is one of the most progressive in the world .南非在1996年颁布实施的国家宪法是世界上最进步的宪法之一。
adj. 禁止的，禁止性的；抑制的；（费用，价格等）过高的；类同禁止的 同义词:inhibitory, verboten The cost of education prohibitive to lower-income families .许多低收入家庭对教育经费不敢问津。

vi. 设计；计划；表达；投射 vt. 设计；计划；发射；放映 n. 工程；计划；事业 同义词:design, engineer, design, schedule, engineer, style, frame, engineering, career, enterprise, plan, scheme Our projected visit had to be cancelled.我们计划中的访问不得不取消。
adj. 投影的，投射 v. 投射（project的过去分词）；计划 同义词:designed Our projected visit had to be cancelled.我们计划中的访问不得不取消。
adj. 原核的 同义词:procaryotic, pronuclear Conclusion : prokaryotic expression vector with target gene was constructed successfully .结论：成功构建了带有目的基因的原核表达载体。
vi. 增殖；扩散；激增 vt. 使激增 同义词:surge, sharp rise, balloon proliferated ideas层出不穷的想法

adj. 突出的，显著的；杰出的；卓越的 同义词:obvious, excellent, remarkable, brilliant, marked A few weeks ago a prominent white rancher near the border was killed , possibly by a smuggler or illegal immigrant .几周前，一位著名的白人大农场主在边境附近被杀害，可能是走私者或非法移民所为。
vt. 公布；传播；发表 同义词:deliver, post, notify, transmit to promulgate regulation颁布规则
adj. 俯卧的；有…倾向的，易于…的 同义词:liable, apt In Britain , and now in Germany , some converts to Islam appear to be prone to extremism .在英国，以及现在的德国，一些皈依伊斯兰教的人似乎对极端主义思想情有独钟。
adj. 显著的；断然的；讲出来的 v. 发音；宣告；断言（pronounce的过去分词） 同义词:obvious, prominent, marked, noted, outstanding, professed The priest said, “I now pronounce you man and wife.”神父说：“我现在宣布你们两人结为夫妻。”

n. 传播；繁殖；增殖 同义词:circulation, breeding, diffusion, spread, reproduction Scares that thrive, such as the millennium bug and swine flu , have commercial interests that benefit from their propagation .对千年虫和猪流感等传播甚广的恐慌来说，有商业利益集团从恐慌传播中受益。

n. 倾向，习性；癖好，偏爱 同义词:tendency, liability, behaviour, trend, habit This is achieved in part by tapping into our natural propensity to believe in supernatural beings that can influence our fate .通过挖掘人们的相信影响我们命运超自然存在的自然倾向，宗教的主要功能就已经部分地达到了。

adj. 适当的；本身的；特有的；正派的 adv. 完全地 同义词:suitable, appropriate, adequate, typical, becoming, totally, entirely, completely, absolutely, thoroughly, strictly, fully Proper weight alone doesn't show whether a diet is lacking in vitamins and minerals .仅仅适当的体重并不能说明饮食中是否缺乏维生素和矿物质。
n. 性质，性能；财产；所有权 同义词:performance, nature, ownership, estate, capability By appreciation , we make excellence in others our own property .欣赏能使别人的卓越成为我们自己的财富。
adj. 适合的；吉利的；顺利的 同义词:adaptive, calculated, smooth, benign The present moment was peculiarly propitious for rebellion .目前这一时刻对于叛变特别有利。
n. 比例；部分；面积；均衡 vt. 使成比例；使均衡；分摊 同义词:ratio, area, equilibrium, scale, part, apportion to proportion the width of a building to its height使建筑物的宽和高比例匀称
adv. 相称地，成比例地 同义词:appropriately, commensurately Drivers of cars with low resale values proportionately more likely to file fraudulent claims .若司机所有之汽车转售价值低，其诈骗保险的可能性就相对较高。
vt. 提出；提议；将…提供考虑 同义词:introduce, present, prefer, file, advance to propound a problem (或a theory)提出一个问题(一种理论)
n. 所有权；所有人 adj. 所有的；专利的；私人拥有的 同义词:ownership, holder, any, having, patent For years they have been using proprietary trading desks to take positions .他们花费好几年时间使用所有权交易专柜抢占位置。
adj. 平凡的，乏味的；散文体的 同义词:ordinary, stock, stupid At this grand moment Pug Henry 's thoughts were prosaic .在这个伟大的时刻，帕格?亨利的思想却毫无诗意。
n. 散文；单调 adj. 散文的；平凡的；乏味的 vi. 写散文；乏味地讲话 vt. 把…写成散文 同义词:essay, monotony, ordinary, stock, stupid prosing or versing写散文或作诗
n. 前途；预期；景色 vi. 勘探，找矿 vt. 勘探，勘察 同义词:scenery, future, picture, expectation, landscape, reconnoitre, make a survey to prospect a mine勘探矿藏
n. 内容说明书；样张；创办计划书 同义词:specimen page, specimen sheet Most had yet to plough through all of the financial information contained in the prospectus .他们中多数人尚未审议招股说明书中的所有财务信息。
vi. 繁荣，昌盛；成功 vt. 使……成功；使……昌盛；使……繁荣 同义词:arrive, flower, win, thrive May the gods prosper our city!愿神灵保佑我们的城市繁荣!
n. [生化] 前列腺素 DHA and EPA support brain , cardiovascular , immune and metabolic pathways involved in prostaglandin synthesis and response .DHA和EPA的支持脑，心血管，免疫及代谢中前列腺素的合成和反应有关的途径。
n. [泌尿] 前列腺切除术 AIM The cause of dysuria after suprapubic prostatectomy was analysed so as to provide evidence for prevention .目的探讨耻骨上前列腺切除术后排尿困难的原因，为预防提供依据。
adj. 假体的；非朊基的 An internal prosthetic replacement of the femoral head was advised .建议行人工股骨头内修复置换术。
n. 主角，主演；主要人物，领导者 同义词:leader, Moses In Macbeth , it is ambition that destroys the protagonist .在《麦克白》中，主题则是野心扼杀了主人公。
n. 门徒；被保护者 同义词:disciple, chela As the protege of the most powerful man in the country , his success is guarantee.他有该国最有势力的人作靠山，准能成功。
n. 蛋白质；朊 adj. 蛋白质的 同义词:albumose, glaireous The amount and quality of food provided must satisfy energy and protein requirements .供应的食物数量和质量必须能满足能量和蛋白质需求。

n. 协议；草案；礼仪 vt. 拟定 vi. 拟定 同义词:agreement, ceremony, understanding, treaty, accord, study out, study out Why would anyone need a new protocol to communicate management information over a network ?为什么人人都需要新协议，在网络上实现管理信息的交流？
n. [物] 质子 同义词:merron, uron For example , in nuclear physics one takes the mass , charge and spin of the proton as inputs .举个例子，在原子核物理中，质子的质量、电荷、自旋就得当成预设的参数。

n. 原生质；原浆；细胞质 同义词:bioplasm, plasmogen Shrinkage or contraction of the protoplasm away from the wall of a living plant or bacterial cell , caused by loss of water through osmosis .胞质皱缩通过渗透作用由于缺水引起的活植''。'细胞'。''或细菌的细胞质的皱缩或收缩，并与''。'细胞'。''壁''。'分离'。''。
n. 原型；标准，模范 同义词:criterion, standard, level, norms, type The company showed the prototype of the new model at the exhibition .公司在展览会上展示了这种新模型的原型。
n. 规定；条款；准备；[经] 供应品 vt. 供给…食物及必需品 同义词:item, preparation, arrangement, preliminary, do to provision a ship供应船只
adj. 刺激的，挑拨的；气人的 n. 刺激物，挑拨物；兴奋剂 同义词:incentive, stimulating, stimulus, irritation Meantime , the White House is calling the tests a " provocative act ".同时，白宫称这次测验是一次“挑衅行为”。
vi. 徘徊，潜行 vt. 在…搜寻；潜行于 n. 徘徊，潜行；悄悄踱步 同义词:hang about, wander about, spinning around a rough-looking man who prowled the streets after dark天黑之后在街上鬼鬼祟祟走动的一个粗汉
n. 亲近，接近；[数] 邻近 同义词:approach, neighborhood We will be starting with proximity talks next week .我们将会在下星期开始‘间接’谈判。
adj. 谨慎的；精明的；节俭的 同义词:cautious, wary, provident Given the cost of government bail -outs, why chastise the only prudent investment bank ?考虑到救助成本，为何政府要惩戒唯一一家审慎的投行呢？
n. 假正经的行为；过分拘谨的言行 The " Eastern " Mark Twain can be delicate to the point of prudery .“东部的”马克?吐温竟可以严谨到一本正经的程度。
vt. 撬动，撬开 vi. 刺探，探查 n. 窥探；杠杆 同义词:prize up, jimmy, burrow into, lever, heaver We use an iron bar to pry open the box.我们用铁棍撬开箱子。
n. 灵魂；心智 同义词:soul, ka Now, Aphrodite was very jealous goddess and she grew very angry about Psyche .阿芙洛狄特是位嫉妒心很强的女神，她对波西卡大为恼怒。
adj. 精神病学的；精神病治疗的 Much psychiatric medicine is undramatic stuff, involving the prescription of drugs to uncommunicative patients .许多精神病医学平淡无奇，包括给沉默寡言的患者开些处方药。
adj. 影响心理状态的；作用于精神的 For example , can a nonpsionic creature make use of a psychoactive skin ?例如，非灵能生物可以使用灵皮么？
adj. 心理的；心理学的；精神上的 同义词:moral, numinous One way is psychological reinforcement .一个方法是心理强化作用。
n. 精神病患者 同义词:mental, madman I mean he looked like a psychopath .我是说，他长得就像是个超级变态狂。
n. 精神病；精神错乱 同义词:mental illness, mental disease Psychosurgery : Treatment of psychosis or other mental disorders by means of Brain surgery .精神外科：用脑外科方法来治疗精神病或其它精神疾患的手术。
n. 心理疗法；精神疗法 Hypnosis can boost the effectiveness of psychotherapy for some conditions .在某些状况下，催眠可以提高心理疗法的效果。
n. 翼龙 Here was " like the ancient Yellow River ", " pterosaur Huanjiang" hometown .这里曾是“黄河古象”、“环江翼龙”的故乡。
n. 宣传，宣扬；公开；广告；注意 同义词:advertisement, propaganda, bill, regard, dissemination It was certainly effective as a publicity stunt .这的确是一个吸引公众的绝技。
vt. 拉；拔；拖 vi. 拉，拖；拔 n. 拉，拉绳；拉力，牵引力；拖 同义词:draw, snake, draw, tension, digging rope Sam and John are pulling the rope.山姆和约翰在拔河。
n. 纸浆；果肉；黏浆状物质 vt. 使…化成纸浆；除去…的果肉 vi. 变成纸浆；成为浆状 同义词:sarcocarp to pulp grapes把葡萄捣烂
n. 脉冲星 If the core magnetic field started with sufficient strength , this compression could explain pulsar magnetism .要是一开始的核心磁场够强，星体塌缩的确可以解释波霎的磁性。
n. 脉动，搏动；震动；悸动 同义词:shock, pumping It is a wave , a vibration , a pulsation at the very heart of the All That Is.它是在一切万有心中的一个波动、一个震动、一个脉动。
n. 标点；标点符号 同义词:point, interpunction System for representing letters , numerals , and punctuation marks by a sequence of dots , dashes, and spaces .以点、横画、间隔的安排来代表字母、数字或标点符号的系统。
adj. 惩罚性的；刑罚的 同义词:penal Officials have in the past tried to limit exports through punitive taxation or quotas .印度官员们过去曾试图采用惩罚性税收或配额限制出口。
n. 小狗；幼畜 vt. 生（小狗等小动物） vi. 生小狗 同义词:puppy, Zergling, bring into the world Martin and Douglas 's offering was a pup by comparison .相比之下，马丁和道格拉斯公司提供的轰炸机显得非常稚嫩。
n. 蛹化 Over the last 40 years , though, the global adult bluefin tuna pupation population declined by over 80%.在过去的40年内，全球的成年金枪鱼数量减少了超过80%。
n. 采购（purchase的ing形式）；购买 同义词:procurement, buy They purchased life at the expense of honour.他们以牺牲名誉为代价换得了生命。
vi. 净化；通便 vt. 净化；清洗；通便 n. 净化；泻药 同义词:fine purification, purify, cleanse, purify, purification, distillation The judge ordered him to purge his contempt by apologizing to the court.法官命令他做出道歉以赎蔑视法庭之罪。
adj. 清教徒的 n. 清教徒 He inherited characteristic Puritan preoccupations with sin , with gilt and with secrecy .他继承了清教特有的关于原罪、罪过和隐秘的观念。
vt. 继续；从事；追赶；纠缠 vi. 追赶；继续进行 同义词:maintain, undertake, address, have, course, give chase, proceed with The police are pursuing an escaped prisoner.警方正在追捕一名越狱逃犯。

vt. 放；表达；移动；安置；赋予 vi. 出发；击；航行；发芽 n. 掷；笨蛋；投击；怪人 adj. 固定不动的 同义词:set, establish, voice, gift, station, leave, set out, simple, turkey You put the tree from the back and I'll pull it at the front.你在后面推树，我在前面拉。
n. 油灰；氧化锡 vt. 用油灰填塞 同义词:badigeon, stannic oxide to putty a pane of glass in用油灰镶玻璃
n. 金字塔；角锥体 vi. 渐增；上涨；成金字塔状 vt. 使…渐增；使…上涨；使…成金字塔状 同义词:advance, to go up demand continues to pyramid需求量继续增加
n. 象限；[海洋][天] 象限仪；四分之一圆 同义词:sector, orthant Reports from every quadrant of the globe said the Earth was unraveling .从地球的每一个信号区发回来的报告，都在说地球正在分解。
n. 四边形 adj. 四边形的 同义词:dimetric A kite is a quadrilateral with one line of symmetry .风筝是个有一条对称线的四边形。
adj. 四倍的；四重的 vt. 使…成四倍 vi. 成为四倍 n. 四倍 同义词:fourfold " You could quadruple what the federal government spends on entrepreneurial rural development , " he says.他说道：“这样做，联邦政府可以把花在农村企业发展的钱增加三倍。”
vi. 畏缩，胆怯；感到恐惧 n. 鹌鹑 同义词:recoil from, shrink back from The coward quai- led before the enemy.这个懦夫在敌人面前畏缩不前。
n. 教友派信徒；贵格会教徒 These are issues of management competence rather than values , Quaker or otherwise .这些是管理能力问题，而与价值观、贵格会或其它问题无关。
vt. 限制；使具有资格；证明…合格 vi. 取得资格，有资格 同义词:block, set a limit to, be in a position, be qualified to His skills qualify him for the work.他的技能使他能担当这项工作。
n. 困惑；窘境；为难 同义词:corner, confusion Theorists have proposed ways of resolving this quandary .理论家提出了一些方法来解释这个问题。
n. 量；量子（quantum的复数）；额 On the contrary , some quanta have furtively revelled in the power that their apparently elite knowledge gave them .相反，一些宽客暗自沉醉于他们明显处于尖端水平的知识赋予自己的力量。
vt. 检疫；隔离；使隔离 n. 检疫；隔离；检疫期；封锁 vi. 实行隔离 同义词:insulate, segregant, investment, insulation, isolation Mary was quarantined for several weeks when she had scarlet fever.玛丽得猩红热时被隔离了几个星期。
n. 采石场；猎物；来源 vi. 费力地找 vt. 挖出；努力挖掘 同义词:source, provenience, dig up, scoop out They are quarrying the hillside for marble.他们正从山坡上采大理石。
n. [天] 类星体；恒星状球体 The fuzzy object near top quasar image is the foreground galaxy .模糊对象近顶部类星体形象就是前景的银河。
adj. 静止的；不活动的；沉寂的 同义词:still, resting Those " oligarchs " not in prison or exile are indeed politically quiescent .那些没有身陷囹圄和流亡海外的“寡头”的确在政治上都选择了“沉默是金”。
adj. 精髓的，精萃的 同义词:extractive As voters, he reckons , Latino evangelicals are therefore quintessential independents , up for grabs by either party .他认为，因此，拉丁裔的信福音教徒是无党派人士中的精华，等着被某一个党派全部拿走。
n. [数] 商；系数；份额 同义词:parameter, coefficient, lot, Shang, modulus That may be another way to speak of " EQ , " or " emotional quotient .换句话说就是“情商”或“情绪商数”。
n. 乌合之众；暴民；下层社会；（搅炼用的）长柄耙 vt. 聚众闹事；用长柄耙搅拌 同义词:sheep without a shepherd, tagraggery The clergymen of the Christian Church were often rabbled in the civil war.内战期间基督教教士常常受到袭击。
n. [内科] 狂犬病，恐水病 同义词:hydrophobia, canine madness If a dog bit him , it would get rabies .如果狗咬他，狗反而会得狂犬病。
n. 浣熊；浣熊毛皮 同义词:racoon, coon " Raccoon , " he mumbled thickly.“浣熊，”他咕哝着说。
n. 种族主义者 Its leader , Adolph Hitler , wanted to use the event as a platform for his racist views .领导人，阿道夫·希特勒试图以奥运会为平台推行他的种族主义观念。

adj. 半径的；放射状的；光线的；光线状的 n. 射线，光线 同义词:actinomorphic, ray, stream The enhancement in vaporization rate evidently depends on the radial location of the vapour decomposition flame zone .汽化率的增加显然取决于蒸汽分解火焰区的径向位置。
adj. 辐射的；容光焕发的；光芒四射的 n. 光点；发光的物体 同义词:roseate, pearlescent, bright spot, luminescent spot His future radiant , and this day was the needle's eye of his destiny .他的前途光明灿烂，这一天正是他命运中的关键时刻。

adj. 激进的；根本的；彻底的 n. 基础；激进分子；[物化] 原子团；[数] 根数 同义词:thorough, organic, fundamental, ultimate, complete, elements, basis, foundation, base, bed Fourth , it is time for radical reform of finance .第四，是时候对金融业进行彻底改革了。
adj. 放射性测量的；辐射度的；辐射测量的 The surveyed grids were also used for radiometric probing .该方格网还用来进行放射性浅孔测量。
n. 半径，半径范围；[解剖] 桡骨；辐射光线；有效航程 同义词:semidiameter Analysis the reasons and methods of radius compensation in round turning tool .分析了数控车床中圆头车刀刀具半径补偿的原因及方法。
n. [化学] 氡（元素符号Rn） 同义词:niton As for updating the periodic table, element 118 would slot in just below radon in the column that contains inert gases .至于元素周期表的升级，118号元素的位置就在氡列那些气体元素之后。
n. 愤怒；狂暴，肆虐；情绪激动 vi. 大怒，发怒；流行，风行 同义词:anger, wrath, obtain, anger She raged against her husband for some household affairs.她为一些家庭琐事对丈夫大发雷霆。
n. 繁音拍子（多切分节奏的一种早期爵士乐） adj. 滑稽的；不严肃的 同义词:funny, humouristic Ragtime is a kind of music played by a solo pianist .散拍音乐是一种钢琴独奏的音乐形式。
n. 袭击；突袭；搜捕；抢劫 vi. 对…进行突然袭击 vt. 袭击，突袭 同义词:robbery, assault, hit, descend on They were going to raid Warsaw the next day.他们将于次日袭击华沙。
n. 暴怒；暴跳；乱闹 vi. 狂暴；乱闹；发怒 同义词:fury, rough house, anger, chafe at A group of lawbreakers are rampaging around in the centre of the city.一群不法之徒正在市中心为非作歹。
n. 大农场经营者；大农场工人 The rancher wants us to Bring in more hay for his cattle .牧场主人希望我们为他的牲口带来更多的干草。
vt. 赎回，赎；勒索赎金；救赎；得赎金后释放 n. 赎金；赎身，赎回 同义词:redeem, atone for, redemption He was a slave ten years ago and was ransomed later by an old rich woman.十年前他是个奴隶，后来被一位有钱的老太太用钱赎了出来。

adj. 迅速的，急促的；飞快的；险峻的 n. 急流；高速交通工具，高速交通网 同义词:fast, forward, ready, express, quick, rush, whitewater Indeed the whole point of having a good design is to allow rapid development .事实上，所有良好设计的目的就是为了允许进行快速开发”。
adj. 稀有的；半熟的；稀薄的 adv. 非常；极其 vi. 用后腿站起；渴望 同义词:thin, subtle, extremely, badly, highly, greatly, too, aspire, long for raring to go一心要去

n. 比率，率；速度；价格；等级 vt. 认为；估价；责骂 vi. 责骂；被评价 同义词:degree, classification, coefficient, price, value, assess, count, find, guess, feel, hop on, tell someone off We rated his fortune at about one hundred thousand dollars.我们估计他的财产约值十万美元。
n. 等级；等级评定；额定功率 v. 对…评价（rate的ing形式） 同义词:degree, classification, grade, rank We rated his fortune at about one hundred thousand dollars.我们估计他的财产约值十万美元。
n. 比率，比例 同义词:rate, scale The census of 2000 and the CASS study both showed the ratio stable at around 120 .2000年的人口普查和中国社会科学院的研究都表明，性别比稳定在120左右。
vt. 配给；定量供应 n. 定量；口粮；配给量 同义词:admeasure, allowance, quantification, definite quantity Tea and sugar were scarce and were rationed during the war.在战争年代，茶和糖匮乏，均为定量供应。
adj. 合理的；理性的 n. 有理数 同义词:reasonable, logical, possible, just, legitimate In the jargon , they have " rational expectations ".用行话来说，他们具备“理性预期”。
n. 基本原理；原理的阐述 同义词:fundamental, basic principle Such a rationale enables even professionals to pretend that it is always someone else who is paying too much .这样的理论基础使得即便是职业人士也会假装出好像一直是别人在支付过高费用的样子。
n. 合理性；合理的行动 同义词:justifiability He predicated rationality of man .他断言人是有理性的。
adj. 贪婪的；渴望的；狼吞虎咽的 同义词:eager, hungry, desired, anxious, sick Bagels ! But , I ravenous ! I'm not a baby whining for a teething ring !只有面包圈！但我快饿死了，不像婴儿只想找“磨牙饼”而已！

n. 反动分子；保守论者 adj. 反动的 同义词:counterrevolutionary, retroactive He not only showed astonishing talent in literary creation , but also , based on the particular ancient Japanese anti- reactionist thought and culture , proposed a literary view on anti - benthamism .上田秋成是日本江户时代的著名小说家、国学家，不仅在文学创作方面展现了惊世才华，还以其独特的反复古主义国学思想为基础，提出了反功利主义的文学观。
n. [化工] 反应器；[核] 反应堆；起反应的人 Inside the reactor the large molecules are cracked into smaller molecules .在反应堆内部大的分子被裂解为较小的分子。
adj. 实际的；真实的；实在的 adv. 真正地；确实地 n. 现实；实数 同义词:practical, actual, effective, sincere, honest, strictly, indeed, undoubtedly, authentically, actuality, praxis The real economy ?真实的经济？
n. （美）房地产经纪人 同义词:real-estate agent, real estate broker Not yet , but realtor has assured us that it shouldn't be a problem to sell it .还没。但房屋经纪人保证说卖掉这房子没问题。
vt. 培养；树立；栽种 vi. 暴跳；高耸 adv. 向后；在后面 adj. 后方的；后面的；背面的 n. 后面；屁股；后方部队 同义词:cultivate, foster, plant, set, bed, rise, tower, fro, aback, latter, back, back, behind, ass The rabbit reared its ears.兔子竖起它的耳朵。
vt. 反驳；揭露；拒绝 vi. 反驳；揭露 n. 驳回；提出反证 同义词:reveal, negative, disclose, refuse, expose, open up, bring to light, disallowance This open letter is to rebut the argument of abstractionism.这封公开信是反驳抽象派论点的。
vt. 召回；回想起，记起；取消 n. 召回；回忆；撤消 同义词:think of, come back, memory, recollection I don't recall what he said at the meeting.我想不起来他在会上说了些什么。
vt. 夺回；拿回；再体验；政府征收再经历 n. 夺回；取回；政府对公司超额收益或利润的征收 同义词:reseize, take back, retrieval, reseizure They recaptured the prisoner who escaped last night.他们把昨天夜里逃走的囚犯又抓了回来。
vt. 重铸；彻底改动 n. 重铸；重做的事物 同义词:recoin, rehandle, recoinage The big bell in the Temple of Reclining Buddha was recast in the sixteenth century.卧佛寺的大钟是16世纪重新铸造的。
n. 收到；收据；收入 vt. 收到 同义词:income, proceeds, earning, receive from, to hand The cashier receipted the bill.出纳员在账单上盖上“收讫”印记。
n. [生化] 受体；接受器；感觉器官 同义词:ceptor, holding tank A particularly appealing one is the capsaicin receptor .其中最吸引人的目标是辣椒素受体。
n. 衰退；不景气；后退；凹处 同义词:depression, downturn, decline, cavity What did you do in recession , Daddy ?在经济衰退时你会怎么做，爸爸？
adj. 互惠的；相互的；倒数的，彼此相反的 n. [数] 倒数；互相起作用的事物 同义词:mutual, au pair That is because the second parameter is actually the reciprocal of the first.那是因为第二个参数值实际上与第一个参数值是可以互换的。
n. 开垦；收回；再利用；矫正 同义词:withdrawal, rectification The detailed design for Central Reclamation Phase III is in progress .中环填海计划第三期的详细设计工作现正进行。
vt. 收回；恢复；偿还；扣除 vi. 获得补偿；请求扣除 同义词:replace, restore, repair, tender, withdraw They are trying to recoup themselves for their losses.他们正在设法挽回他们的损失。

n. 招聘；新兵；新成员 vt. 补充；聘用；征募；使…恢复健康 vi. 复原；征募新兵；得到补充；恢复健康 同义词:hands wanted, big john, supply, to replenish, be cured of, pull round The wartime cabinet first recruited men into the forces from non-essential industries.战时内阁首先从非重点工业中招募人员补充武装力量。
n. 招聘人员，征兵人员 We can identify two specialisms within the recruiter 's role.在招聘岗位我们可以分为两个专业领域。
n. 招聘；招募 v. 招募；聘请（recruit的ing形式） 同义词:hands wanted, soliciting The wartime cabinet first recruited men into the forces from non-essential industries.战时内阁首先从非重点工业中招募人员补充武装力量。
n. 矩形；长方形 同义词:orthogon Make a rectangle with your fingers like this .像这样用手指做个长方形的形状。
adj. 矩形的；成直角的 同义词:quartering Construct a set of rectangular axes and resolve any inclined forces into rectangular components .作一组直角坐标轴，把各力都分解成正交分量。
vi. 复发；重现；采用；再来；循环；递归 同义词:relapse into, recrudesce If the swelling should recur, please take this medicine immediately.如果再出现肿胀症状，请立即服用这种药品。
vt. 救济；赔偿；纠正；重新调整 n. 救济；赔偿；矫正 同义词:repair, make good, relief, satisfaction King Arthur tried to redress wrongs in his kingdom.亚瑟王设法纠正他国内的弊端。
vt. 减少；降低；使处于；把…分解 vi. 减少；缩小；归纳为 同义词:shorten, weaken, to cut down, fall off They have to reduce expenses this year.他们今年必须削减开支。
n. 普通投票 " Median Voters or Budget Maximizers : Evidence from School Referenda . " Economic Inquiry ( 1982 ): 556 - 578 .中间投票者或预算极大化者：公民复决学派实证〉摘自《经济询问》1982年第556-578页。
n. 公民投票权；外交官请示书 Voters in each region will decide by referendum whether to approve a one - cent increase in the sales- tax to pay for those regional projects .每个地区的选民通过全民投票来决定是否批准哪怕增加一美分消费税用来支持区域项目。
n. 反射；反映；映像；回复；习惯性思维 adj. 反射的；反省的；反作用的；优角的 同义词:feedback, mapping, catoptric, repercussive Objective To obtain the normal value of blink reflex ( BR ) in the elderly .目的了解老年人瞬目反射（BR）的正常分布及变异。
vi. 退还；偿还，归还 vt. 退还；偿还；付还 n. 退款；偿还，偿还额 同义词:return, hand back, replace, tender, payment, repayment After a few days' delay the shop refunded my money at last.经过几天的拖延，这家商店最终还是将钱退给了我。
n. [医] 养生法；生活规则；政体；支配 同义词:government, disposal, ruling A regimen that suits one person will not suit another .适合这个人的饮食制度不一定适合另外一个人。
vt. 把…编成团；严格地管制 n. 团；大量 同义词:lots of, wealth, ocean, sea, mass The students were regimented into large groups for military training.学生们被编成大组进行军事训练。
adj. 回归的；后退的；退化的 同义词:degenerative, vestigial This method of portrayal emphasizes both the regressive nature and the time equivalence .这种图示方法既强调了海退性质也强调了同时性。

adj. 定期的；有规律的；合格的；整齐的 n. 常客；正式队员；中坚分子 adv. 定期地；经常地 同义词:qualified, stated, ordered, straight, periodic, familiar, elite, frequently, periodically A small flute pitched an octave above a regular flute .一种小笛；定位于八度音阶高于普通笛子。
vt. 使康复；使恢复名誉；使恢复原状 vi. 复兴；复权；恢复正常生活 同义词:repristinate, unmake, revive He was set free and rehabilitated as chief engineer.他被释放并恢复总工程师职务。
vt. 重讲；重新处理 n. 改变；略加修改的老作品 同义词:restate, modification, changing, alteration The spokesman has just rehashed the speech of the president.这位发言人只是稍加改动地又重复了一遍总统的演说词。
vi. 统治；支配；盛行；君临 n. 统治；统治时期；支配 同义词:predominate over, to rule, governance, disposal, rule, dominance The Queen of Britain reigns, but she does not rule or govern.英国女王是国家元首，但不治国事。
vt. 偿还；赔偿 同义词:replace, tender Tell me what you have spent and I will reimburse you.告诉我你花了哪些费用，以便我还给你。
vt. 重申；反复地做 同义词:ingeminate, restate He reiterated the importance of good health in his speech.他在讲话中一再重申健康的重要性。
vi. 重新点燃 vt. 重新点燃；再点火 同义词:reignite He blew hard on the ashes to rekindle the fire.他用力吹灰烬以便使火复燃。
vi. 转播；接替 n. [电] 继电器；接替，接替人员；驿马 vt. 转播；使接替；分程传递 同义词:take sth over, realy, supersedure, retransmit In ancient times the messages were relayed from one place to another.古时候信息是用接力的方式从一地传送到另一地。
adj. 无情的；残酷的；不间断的 同义词:cruel, iron, ongoing, ruthless The second problem relates to the firm's relentless expansion .第二大失误则与公司无止尽的扩张有关。
vt. 放弃；放手；让渡 同义词:desert, yield, quit She relinquished her claim to the property.她放弃了对财产的要求。

adj. 不情愿的；勉强的；顽抗的 同义词:narrow, unwilling Israel was at first reluctant —it fears that such a force would inhibit its own actions more than Hizbullah's — but may come round .以色列开始并不情愿——担心这样的部队将更多的妨碍自己的行动，而不是真主党——但仍有可能改变主意。
abbr. 识别内存（recognition memory）；指定由DOS忽略的命令行 And adult dolphins , as previously noted , do almost no REM sleeping .如前所提，成年海豚几乎完全没有REM睡眠。

n. [数] 余数，残余；剩余物；其余的人 adj. 剩余的；吃剩的 vt. 廉价出售；削价出售 vi. 廉价出售；削价出售 同义词:leaving, arithmetical compliment, surplus, residual, odd, bargain sale, undercut, bargain sale The unsalable books are to be remaindered next week.滞销书将于下周削价出售。
vt. 补救；治疗；纠正 n. 补救；治疗；赔偿 同义词:cure, help, repair, therapy, satisfaction, cure These tablets will do nothing to remedy my sore throat.这些药片一点也治不了我的嗓子疼。
n. 回忆；怀旧；引起联想的相似事物 同义词:memory, recall William did not share his brother 's passion for reminiscence .威利并没有分享弟弟回忆往事的幽思。
n. 新生；再生；复活 同义词:reconstruction, fresh, revival, renewal The second big obstacle that a nuclear renaissance faces is the problem of waste management .核能工业复兴所面临的第二大难题，就是核废料管理的问题。
n. 译文；演奏；提供；引渡逃奴 同义词:version, translation, playing, offering L. did an rendition of the Jackson 5 hit I 'll Be There .参加了杰克逊5组合的《我将在那里》的演唱。
vt. 废除；撤销；废止；放弃；否定 n. 废除；撤销 同义词:yield, desert, negative, abolish, abolition, destoolment He believes that death penalty will be repealed sooner or later.他相信死刑早晚会被废除。
n. 全部节目；计算机指令系统；（美）某人或机器的全部技能 They can all become part of the leader 's repertoire .这些风格都可能成为领导人傍身之技的一部分。
adj. 充满的；装满的 n. [昆] 贮蜜蚁 同义词:filled, full, consumed That is the biggest task — not least because the euro 's history replete with failed attempts at doing so.那是很艰巨的任务，特别是因为欧洲的历史上充满了这种做法失败的历史记录。
vt. 复制；折叠 vi. 重复；折转 adj. 复制的；折叠的 n. 复制品；八音阶间隔的反覆音 同义词:repeat, fold, read back, hammer, scored, reproductive, reproduction, ectype a replicated petal翻折的花瓣
n. 贮藏室，仓库；知识库；智囊团 同义词:warehouse, stockroom This book is a repository of useful information .这本书里蕴含着许多有用的知识。
n. 责备；耻辱 vt. 责备；申斥 同义词:blame, thumbs-down, blame for, talk to The manager reproached the new salesgirl for her carelessness.经理斥责新来的女售货员工作上粗心大意。
adj. 爬虫类的；卑鄙的 n. 爬行动物；卑鄙的人 同义词:poor, mean, base, dirty, insect, ratfink Rise , and don't degrade youself into an abject reptile .起来，可别把你自己贬成一个下贱的爬虫。
adj. 爬虫类的；卑鄙的 n. 爬虫类动物 同义词:poor, mean, base, dirty Being from Orion do Zetas contain DNA from the Reptilian race?齐塔人是从猎户座而来，DNA来自爬虫族吗？
vt. 拒绝；否定；批判；与…断绝关系；拒付 同义词:negative, refuse, deny She repudiated her only daughter.她与她的独生女儿断绝了母女关系。
n. 否认，拒绝；抛弃，断绝关系 同义词:contradiction, denial, rejection That was a major repudiation of Iran the other day at the Security Council.联合国安理会在前几天又通过了对伊朗的主要制裁决定。
vi. 解除；废除；撤回 同义词:release from, want out The agreement on cultural cooperation between the two countries was rescinded on 30 April, 2002.两国间的文化合作协定于2002年4月30日废除。
vt. 怨恨；愤恨；厌恶 同义词:hate, be down on His father seems to resent my being here.我呆在这里他的父亲似乎不大高兴。
n. 预约，预订；保留 同义词:preservation, booking, hold, retention I want to confirm my flight reservation .我要确定我预约的班机。
vt. 辞职；放弃；委托；使听从 vi. 辞职 n. 辞去职务 同义词:yield, desert, refer, quit, step down, quit to resign one's hope放弃希望

n. 凭借，手段；度假胜地；常去之地 vi. 求助，诉诸；常去；采取某手段或方法 同义词:instrument, shift, road, tool, implement, appeal, ask for help Many teachers and students resort to Beidaihe beach in the summer vacation.很多教师和学生在暑假中去北戴河海滨。
vt. 呼吸 vi. 呼吸 同义词:breathe, breathe Conclusion Clindamycin Hydrochlorideis beneficial to treatment respire infection in old patients.结论：克林霉素治疗老年呼吸道感染安全有效。
adj. 响应的；应答的；回答的 同义词:answering But what if one side is a responsive mirror , just as the chameleon is, in part reflecting , in part generating ?那么，如果其中一面镜子具备了变色龙似的反应功能，既能反映又能生成图像会如何呢？

n. 恢复；赔偿；归还 同义词:recovery, satisfaction, retrieval, renewal, return The Italians had pushed for the restitution of 46 items , while the Getty had earlier offered just 26 .意大利政府一直催促博物馆归还其46件文物，可博物馆却只愿意还26件。
n. 复活；再现；再起 同义词:revival, regenesis Diplomats hope to reinforce this co -operation before the bug 's expected resurgence in the autumn .外交官们希望在今年秋天病毒可能卷土重来之前巩固这种合作关系。
n. 复苏；复兴；复活 同义词:reconstruction, renewal, revitalization They resuscitated an old man who fell in a faint.他们使一位晕倒的老人苏醒过来。
vt. 零售；转述 vi. 零售 n. 零售 adv. 以零售方式 adj. 零售的 同义词:sell-through, resale This kind of chocolate is retailed at one pound a kilo.这种巧克力糖零售每公斤一英镑。

n. 报复；反击；回敬 同义词:revenge, reprisal It is just the latest in a massive wave of attacks across Pakistan that are seen as Taliban retaliation for army operations against the militant group.这次爆炸事件被认为是塔利班对巴基斯坦最近的一次大规模进攻，是对巴方军队对抗其武装组织的报复行动。
vt. 延迟；阻止；妨碍；使减速 vi. 减慢；受到阻滞 n. 延迟；阻止 同义词:dispute, let, stem, block, prevention, check, detention Shortage of labour power retarded our economic development.缺乏劳动力使我们的经济发展速度减慢。
n. 保留；扣留，滞留；记忆力；闭尿 同义词:memory, preservation, mind, hold, reservation The bonuses were retention payments .红利是保留性支付。
adj. 保持的；记性好的 So , the prosthodontic treatment for severe attritted dentition with retentive telescopic denture was suggested .因此以双重冠义齿做为牙齿严重磨耗病患之膺复治疗方式是可行的。
n. 税收，国家的收入；收益 同义词:taxes, income, proceeds, yield Being the company 's main source of revenue , critics say , it is hardly a model of openness and transparency .批评者说，作为公司的主要收入来源，它很难被视为一个公开和透明度的模型。
vt. 敬畏；尊敬；崇敬 同义词:honor, fear, regard, worship Mr White was revered for his great learning by all the students in the college.怀特先生学识渊博，受到学院全体学生的尊重。
vt. 修正；复习；校订 vi. 修订；校订；复习功课 n. 修订；校订 同义词:update, edit, to amend, recension, emendation The English textbooks for middle schools have been completely revised.中学的英语教科书已经全部被修订过。
n. 修正主义者 adj. 修正主义的 The difference among these revisionist conservatives is really one of temperament .这两派愿意改革的保守分子之间的分歧，实质上是气质上的不同。
vt. 使…复活；使…复兴；使…恢复生气 The Chinese light industry was revitalized in the 1980's.中国轻工业在20世纪80年代重新振兴起来。
n. 复兴；复活；苏醒；恢复精神；再生效 同义词:reconstruction, renaissance, renewal, resurrection Is this West Side Story revival worth seeing ?那么《西区故事》是否还值得一看呢？
adj. 可取消的，可废止的；可撤回的 同义词:retractable, rescissible It was a revokable at any time on whim of the authorities.这种恩赐只要当权者心血来潮随时可以取消。
n. 修辞，修辞学；华丽的词藻 adj. 花言巧语的 同义词:trope, eloquence, smooth-tongued, plausible I may not offer rhetoric , but I do promise results .我不会用美丽的修辞，但我保证给出满意的结果。
adj. 患风湿症的；风湿症的 Finally , treating people with glucocorticoid hormones to control conditions such as rheumatoid arthritis can lead to depression .最后，用来控制像风湿性关节炎这种病症的糖皮质素，可能引起抑郁。
n. [脊椎] 犀牛 Would you rather be crushed by a snake , eaten by a crocodile or sat on by rhinoceros ?你是愿意被一条蛇缠着，还是被一只鳄鱼吃掉，或是被一头犀牛坐在屁股底下？
n. [病毒] 鼻病毒 The common cold virus , rhinovirus , is thought to set off half of all asthma attacks.在所有的哮喘病中，一半是由鼻病毒属，普通感冒病毒引起。
n. [数] 菱形；[数] 斜方形 同义词:lozenge, diamond shape There is a small network of rhombus in Tokyo Astronomical Observatory .在东京天文台有一个小的菱形台网。
adj. 有节奏的；有韵律的 同义词:cadent, metronomic His breathing became more rhythmical .他的呼吸变得更有节奏了。
n. 肋骨；排骨；肋状物 vt. 戏弄；装肋于 同义词:costa, sparerib, fool with, kid They often ribbed her for her accent.他们常常拿她的口音开玩笑。

n. [细胞][生化] 核糖体；[生化] 核蛋白体 George Church, a colleague of Dr Szostak 's at Harvard , dreams instead of making something intensely practical that Dr Venter has left out : a ribosome .乔治·切奇，萧斯泰克在哈佛的同事，却梦想造出一个极其实用，文德尔却又遗漏的东西：核糖体。

adj. 正确的；直接的；右方的 vi. 复正；恢复平稳 n. 正确；右边；正义 adv. 正确地；恰当地；彻底地 vt. 纠正 同义词:immediate, true, direct, correct, just, validity, justice, correctly, properly, thoroughly, entirely, completely, exactly, fully, repair, remedy Although the ship started to tip over,she soon righted herself.虽然这艘船开始倾覆，但她很快就恢复了直立状态。
adj. 严格的，严厉的；严密的；严酷的 同义词:strict, rigid, precise, severe, tight Science needs more competition between hypotheses and ever more rigorous tests as well.科学始终需要各个假说之间的竞争和严格的检验。
vt. 漱；冲洗掉；漂净 n. 冲洗；漂洗；[轻] 染发剂；染发 vi. 冲洗掉；漂净 同义词:gargle, irrigation, hair dye She rinsed her hands quickly before eating.她吃东西以前很快洗了一下手。

n. 对手；竞争者 vt. 与…竞争；比得上某人 vi. 竞争 adj. 竞争的 同义词:equal, comparative, opponent, match, adversary, match, compete against, contest, cope, struggle to, competitive, vying The two students rivaled each other for the scholarship.这两个学生为获得奖学金而互相竞争。
n. 知更鸟 同义词:redbreast If you want to find robin 's nest , look in a small tree .注意观察那些矮小的树林，你就会找到红襟知更鸟的窝。

n. [机] 滚筒；[机] 滚轴；辊子；滚转机 同义词:platen, tumbling barrel A 12 -year-old boy roller coaster at a Disney MGM park .一个12岁的小男孩在MGM迪斯尼公园玩云霄飞车的时候，见了上帝。
adj. 粗制的；粗削的（石头，木材） 同义词:unshaped Robin first time met Quinn , a gruff rough-hewn cargo pilot , when she was look for the charter plane .罗宾在寻找他们的包机时，首先遇见了奎恩，这是一个声音粗哑，举止粗俗的飞行员。

adj. 基本的；初步的；退化的；残遗的；未发展的 同义词:elementary, basic, fundamental, essential, primary What would be the utility of the rudimentary beginnings of such structures ?这种构造，在其最初的幼稚的阶段能有什么样的用途？
vi. 统治；管辖；裁定 n. 统治；规则 vt. 统治；规定；管理；裁决；支配 同义词:king it over, reign over, governance, regulation, order, define, regulate, manage, state, conduct Hilter ruled Germany for only 12 years.希特勒统治德国仅12年。
n. 跑步者；走私者；推销员；送信人 同义词:salesman, smuggler Please prepare a stopwatch to record every runner 's time .请准备好跑表记录每个跑步者的时间。
n. 破裂；决裂；疝气 vi. 破裂；发疝气 vt. 使破裂；断绝；发生疝 同义词:fracture, cracking, fracture, crack, crack, fracture, stop The diplomatic relations between the two countries have been ruptured.两国外交关系已经断绝。

n. 骶骨化；[外科] 骶骨融合 this sacralization was a way of resisting what they perceived as the relentless corruption of human values by the marketplace .这种神圣化是一个抵抗那种被他们视为市场无情的毁坏了人的价值的现象的手段。
adj. 畅销的；适于销售的；价格适当的 同义词:bestselling, saleable She was a slave , and salable as such.她是个奴隶，既然是奴隶，也就可以出卖。

n. 显著（等于saliency）；突出；卓越 同义词:projection, prominence This research on " tax salience " has practical implications .此项有关“税收凸显”的研究具有现实影响。

n. （日）武士；武士阶级 同义词:knight, swordsman The days of xenophobic samurai , killing non- Japanese Christians to preserve the purity of Nipponese culture , are long gone .虽然，为保证日本文化的纯洁性而屠杀非日本籍基督教徒的仇外武士时代已一去不复返。

n. 避难所；至圣所；耶路撒冷的神殿 同义词:haven, home, harbor, shelter As Jack continues to search the vacant sanctuary grounds , security guards watch him from a distance .杰克继续在空荡的保护区场地上搜寻，在远处，安全警卫观察着他。

n. 疗养院；疗养所 同义词:sanatorium, rest home One day , a bearded old man is sent into the sanitarium with a large bag .一天，人个身背大包袱的大汉郑明（乔宏饰）被送入院。
adj. 卫生的，清洁的 n. 公共厕所 同义词:clean, hygienic, latrine, public convenience I hope you 'll be able to improve the sanitary conditions .我希望你们今后能更好地改善卫生条件。
n. [植] 树液；精力，元气；活力；坑道 vt. 使衰竭，使伤元气；挖掘以破坏基础 vi. 挖坑道 同义词:energy, vitality, tunnel, spring, steam, deplete to sap a rubber tree割胶

n. 规模；比例；鳞；刻度；天平；数值范围 vi. 衡量；攀登；剥落；生水垢 vt. 测量；攀登；刮鳞；依比例决定 同义词:dimensions, ratio, graduation, calibration, chip, shell, climb, sound, gauge to scale peanut剥花生皮

vt. 扫描；浏览；细看；详细调查；标出格律 vi. 扫描；扫掠 n. 扫描；浏览；审视；细看 同义词:glance through, look through, survey, scrutiny to scan enemy's front with a telescope用望远镜观察敌方阵地
n. 替罪羊，替人顶罪者；替身 vt. 使成为…的替罪羊 同义词:goat, stand-in Strike leaders tried to scapegoat foreign competitors.罢工领导人极力把外国竞争者作为替罪羊，在他们开办的工厂内举行罢工。
n. 不足；缺乏 同义词:shortage, short of, deficiency, insufficient, need They do this, first , because the internet , in effect , eliminates scarcity in the medium .他们这么做，首先，是因为互联网，有效地消除了媒介中的缺乏。
vi. 分散，散开；散射 vt. 使散射；使散开，使分散；使散播，使撒播 n. 分散；散播，撒播 同义词:spread around, spread about, disject, disperse, dissemination, decentralization to scatter seeds播种
n. 方案；情节；剧本 同义词:drama, action, plot As US diplomats engage in yet more weeks of costly bargaining at the UN , this is scenario they are striving to avoid .美国外交官还要在联合国进行更多周的讨价还价，而他们在努力避免的就是上述情况。
n. [内科] 血吸虫病 同义词:bilharzia This is the group of flat worms that schistosomiasis .这种扁平蠕虫是血吸虫病的病原体。
n. [内科] 精神分裂症 In general , schizophrenia have smaller brains than unaffected individuals of similar age and sex .一般而言，精神分裂症患者的大脑要比年龄性别相近的正常人来得小。
n. 学校；学院；学派；鱼群 vt. 教育 同义词:academy, college, breed, to educate to be well schooled in foreign languages在外语方面受过良好教育
vi. 发出火花；闪烁 同义词:coruscate, spark the molten steel that scintillated闪着火花的钢水
vt. 烧焦；使枯萎；挖苦 vi. 烧焦；枯萎 n. 烧焦；焦痕 同义词:blast, wither up, flag, wither away, singe She scorched the cake.她把蛋糕烤焦了。
vi. 冲刷；擦；腹泻 vt. 擦亮，洗涤；冲洗，清除 n. 擦，冲刷；洗涤剂；（畜类等的）腹泻 同义词:mop up, wipe, wash, rub up, swabbing, brushup to scour the coffee service把咖啡具擦干净

n. 屏，幕；屏风 vt. 筛；拍摄；放映；掩蔽 vi. 拍电影 同义词:curtain, creen, project, ree, shoot, make a film to screen off the corner of the stage with the setting用布景隔开舞台的一角
adj. 细心的；小心谨慎的；一丝不苟的 同义词:meticulous, circumspect There are many notes which indicate scrupulous Jane is about facts .有许多短信可以表明，简对事实是一丝不苟的。
vi. 细阅；作详细检查 vt. 详细检查；细看 n. 仔细或彻底检查 同义词:scan to scrutinize one's visa仔细查看某人的签证
adj. 下流的；说话粗鄙恶劣的；无礼的 同义词:dirty, blue She was often quite scurrilous in her references to me .她一提起我，常常骂骂咧咧的。

n. 降神会；会议 同义词:session, congress, meeting a spiritual agency that is assumed to assist the medium during a seance .在降神会上操纵桌子；被认为是灵魂来了。

adj. 世俗的；长期的；现世的；不朽的 n. 牧师 同义词:chronic, long time, standing, eternal, lay, minister, priest, preacher Indonesia prides itself on being a secular state that happens to have a Muslim majority .印尼人认为，该国是世俗国家，恰巧穆斯林占多数，他们对此感到自豪。

adj. 久坐的；坐惯的；定栖的；静坐的 This prosperity has bought a sedentary lifestyle and a sugary diet , which may have triggered a genetic predisposition to diabetes among Arabs .繁荣带来了凝滞不动的生活习惯和嗜糖的饮食结构，在阿拉伯人中这容易诱发高血糖的遗传倾向。

n. 地震学家 The prediction had been posted weeks earlier by a seismologist at the Gran Sasso National Laboratory in Abruzzi , Italy .该预告是在数周前由意大利阿布鲁齐的巨石峰国家实验室的地震学家发布的。

adj. 轰动的；耸人听闻的；非常好的；使人感动的 同义词:immense, lurid The Master always frowned on anything that seemed sensational . "The divine ", he claimed , "is only found in the ordinary ".大师总是对看上去耸人听闻的事情蹙眉。他主张：”神圣的东西，只在平凡中找得到。

n. 西班牙人 What do you call a Spaniard who can't find his car ?你叫一个不能找到他车的西班牙人什么？

adj. 空间的；存在于空间的；受空间条件限制的 同义词:dimensional, spacial The TES instrument has fairly low spatial resolution : a pixel is several kilometers across.TES仪器的空间解析度相当低：一个像素大约代表数公里。

adj. 特殊的，特定的；明确的；详细的；[药] 具有特效的 n. 特性；细节；特效药 同义词:precise, strict, decided, detailed, particular, quality, tang, identity, detail, character On the other hand, culture is concrete and specific .另一方面，文化又是具体的和明确的。

adj. 投机的；推测的；思索性的 同义词:conjectural Speculative borrowers can meet current interest payments from cash flows but need to " roll over" their debt in order to pay back the principal .投机借款人能够从现金流中支付现行利息，但需要通过延期偿还他们的债务来偿还债务本金。

n. 溢出；外流人口 同义词:superflux, extravasation First, we review the literatures of research on the technology spillover , and summarizes the estimation of spillover .本文对技术外溢的研究做了综述，并对技术外溢的测量进行了概述。
n. 脊柱，脊椎；刺；书脊 同义词:backbone, spinal column These disks can compress or expand , and this mechanism is what enables us to move our spine .这些盘可以可以压缩和伸张，这种机械装置可以使我们的脊柱移动。

adj. 令人吃惊的 同义词:screming, thunder-struck I was startled at the news that 129 persons were killed last Sunday in the attempt by rebel air force officers to overthrow the government in the capital.上星期日在该国首都，由空军官员发动叛乱，在企图推翻政府的战斗中，有129人被打死，听到这一消息我感到十分震惊。

adj. 障碍的 同义词:impedient She nearly fell down by stumbling over my stretched leg.她绊在我伸出的腿上，险些跌倒。

adj. 有实质的；大量的；真实的；独立存在的 n. 名词性实词；独立存在的实体 同义词:massive, extensive, actual, sincere, macro The question will be whether they favor a substantive reform or some kind of symbolic action .但问题是，他们是支持实质性的改革，还是某种象征性的行动。

adj. 极好的；华丽的；宏伟的 同义词:wonderful, excellent, famous, grand, great Those states have done a superb job of managing their deer , elk and bear .这些州在管理野鹿、麋鹿和野熊方面做的很好。
adj. 表面的；肤浅的 n. 表面文章；外表；浅薄的人 同义词:surface, external, facial, shallow, person, garment This stance has a superficial logic .这个观点的逻辑是肤浅的。
n. [天] 超新星 A nearby supernova might come through as a burst of static .邻近的超新星可能听起来就像一阵天电爆丛；
vt. 取代，代替；紧接着……而到来 vi. 推迟行动 同义词:substitute for, displace He was superseded by a young girl for the post.一位年轻的姑娘取代了他的职位。
n. 迷信 同义词:aberglaube, fetish Science is the great antidote to the poison of enthusiasm and superstition .科学是对于宗教狂及迷信之毒的大消毒剂。
n. 补充，补遗；补充物；附录 vt. 补充，增补 同义词:recruitment, renewal, to replenish, eke to supplement an appendix to the book为该书补编一篇附录

adj. 补充的；追加的 n. 补充者；增补物 同义词:complementary, adscititious, enlargement Article The State shall encourage the employing unit to set up supplementary insurance for labourers according to its practical situations .第七十五条国家鼓励用人单位根据本单位实际情况为劳动者建立补充保险。
n. 恳求者，乞求者 Berkshire ' was a supplier of liquidity and capital to the system , not a supplicant , ' he wrote.我们是金融体系所需流动性和资金的供应者，而不是资金乞求者。
adj. 制止的；抑制性的；遏抑的 n. 抑制药 同义词:deterrent Water is a natural appetite suppressant . Do NOT underestimate the power of this statement .水是天然的食欲抑制剂，不要低估这个说法。
n. 表面；表层；外观 adj. 表面的，肤浅的 vi. 浮出水面 vt. 使浮出水面；使成平面 同义词:face, outside, garment, external, facial, shallow, superficial, Head Above Water, tabulate to surface a road铺路
vt. 超越；胜过，优于；非…所能办到或理解 同义词:overcome, top, exceed, cap, transcend He surpassed me in maths.他的数学比我学得好。
n. 剩余；[贸易] 顺差；盈余；过剩 adj. 剩余的；过剩的 同义词:residual, spare, remaining, residual, odd When was that old tank surplused out?那辆破坦克是什么时候卖出去的?
n. 敏感性；感情；磁化系数 同义词:sensitivity, affection, heart, feeling, sentiment Perhaps there were once many codes , all with different degrees of susceptibility .也许，过去曾存在多种密码系统，每种的出错率都不同。
adj. 易受影响的；易感动的；容许…的 n. 易得病的人 同义词:impressionable, suggestible Infants are particularly susceptible to vitamin D intoxication .婴儿尤其容易引起维生素d中毒。
vt. 维持；支撑，承担；忍受；供养；证实 同义词:maintain, undertake, support, accept, favor to sustain the main beam支撑主梁的重量
vi. 膨胀；肿胀；隆起 vt. 使膨胀；使隆起 n. 肿胀；隆起 adj. 漂亮的；一流的 同义词:fill, intumesce, expand, plim, tumefaction, tumidness, pretty, smart, tony, cute Your ambition,I think, is swelling.我看你的野心是越来越大了。
vt. 转换；用鞭子等抽打 vi. 转换；抽打；[体]换防 n. 开关；转换；鞭子 He switched the boy with a cane.他用手杖抽打那个小孩。
n. 音节 vt. 划分音节 vi. 按音节发音；讲话 同义词:to speak, to address Accent the word "energy" on the first syllable .重音在第一音节或第二音节均可。
adj. 匀称的，对称的 同义词:well-proportioned, meristic This problem can be avoided by using three components which produce a symmetrical path curve .使用三块能产生反对称形路径曲线的元件，即可避免上述问题。
n. [临床] 症状；征兆 同义词:premonitor, prefiguration One symptom is bloating , or expansion of the abdomen area .一种症状就是肿胀，或者在腹部产生膨胀。
n. 辛迪加；企业联合；财团 vi. 联合成辛迪加；组成企业联合组织 vt. 把…联合成辛迪加；在多家报刊上同时发表 同义词:consortium, cartel Several firms of mechanical engineering have been syndicated.几家机械工程公司已组成了机械工程辛迪加。
n. [临床] 综合征；综合症状；并发症状；校验子；并发位 Sick building syndrome is a disease of our time.办公大楼病综合症是一种现代病。
adj. 同义的；同义词的；同义突变的 For many people , sumo is synonymous with Japanese culture .对于很多人来说，相扑代表日本文化。
vt. 合成；综合 vi. 合成；综合 同义词:compound, colligate Then he synthesized his statement before winding it up.结束陈述前，他综述了一下他的观点。
n. [生化] 合成酶 Glutamine synthetase ( GS ) is the key enzyme in the assimilation of ammonium in higher plants .摘 要：谷氨酰胺合成酶（GS）是参与高等植物氮同化过程的关键酶。
n. 碑；药片；写字板；小块 同义词:wordpad, nubble They tableted the drugs.他们将毒品制成了片剂。
n. 禁忌；禁止 adj. 禁忌的；忌讳的 vt. 禁忌；禁止 同义词:ban, don't, ticklish, bar, inhibit The subject was tabooed.这个话题禁止讨论。
n. 大头钉；粗缝；行动方针；食物 vt. 附加；以大头针钉住 vi. 抢风航行；作文字形移动 同义词:food, diet, eating, annex, subjoin He tacked the timetable to the door.他把时间表钉在门上。
n. 策略，战略 adj. 按顺序的，依次排列的 同义词:strategy, device The new tactic was put into operation early in 1939 .这个新的战略是在1939年初开始运用的。
adj. 战术的；策略的；善于策略的 Underlying this tactical dilemma is the more strategic question of what the left is for when there is no money to spend.当左翼党派遭遇财政问题时，引起这种战术上的进退两难原因更多是一个战略问题。
adj. [生理] 触觉的，有触觉的；能触知的 同义词:haptic Tactile imaging is a perception or FEELING of localised bodily awareness .触觉想象是身体局部知觉的一个知觉或感觉。
n. 标签；名称；结束语；附属物 vt. 尾随，紧随；连接；起浑名；添饰 vi. 紧随 同义词:name, ticket, label, belonging, dog, shadow, couple, tread on the heels of They have tagged all the items in the store.他们已经给店里所有的商品贴了价签。
vt. 拿，取；采取；吃；接受 vi. 拿；获得 同义词:carry, adopt, have, eat, assume, pick up, get access to Taking a pen in her hand,she began to write.她手里拿着一支钢笔，开始写起来。
n. 接管；验收 同义词:assumption of control, acceptance check Undervalued share price can lead to dealership competition and hostile takeover .低估的股价可能引发代理权竞争和敌意接管。
n. 计数器；标签；记账 vt. 使符合；计算；记录 vi. 一致；记分 同义词:counter, ticket, label, cast, register, figure, shape, cotton, square, identify, score, coincide He has tallied the result of the ballot.他已经将投票结果记录下来了。
n. 罗望子；罗望子的果实；酸角 同义词:Tamarind Pulp Township government clearance tamarind .乡政府驻望子关。
vi. 篡改；干预；损害；削弱；玩弄；贿赂 vt. 篡改 n. 填塞者；捣棒 同义词:intervene in, take a hand in, manipulate, interpolate Don't tamper with my business.别干预我的事。
adj. 切线的，相切的；接触的；离题的 n. [数] 切线，[数] 正切 同义词:contiguous, excursive For ? 0 we naturally get a circle ; for ? 0 we obtain two tangent circles .对?0我们当然得到一个圆；对?0得到两个相切的圆。
adj. 有形的；切实的；可触摸的 n. 有形资产 同义词:concrete, bodied, material property Now America must demand , and receive , the tangible support it implies.现在，美国务必要求、并接受其所必需的切实支持。
adj. 迟缓的，迟发的 同义词:logy, cunctative We developed an experimental animal model of tardive dyskinesia simply by treating rats with neuroleptics .我们仅仅通过对大鼠施用神经松驰剂，就搞出了一个迟发性运动障碍的实验动物模型。

n. 关税表；收费表 vt. 定税率；征收关税 As a group , brokers have demonstrated much more muscle in engineering tariff reductions than fund managers are ever able to do on their own .作为一个团体，经纪人已经表明，在设法降低收费上，他们比基金经理人自身的力量要大得多。
n. 格子呢（苏格兰） adj. 格子呢的 同义词:admiralty cloth My tartan skirt. It 's scottish night .穿我的格子裙，今晚是苏格兰之夜。
vt. 取笑；戏弄；梳理；欺负；强求；使起毛 n. 戏弄；爱纠缠的小孩；挑逗者；卖弄风骚的女孩 vi. 取笑 同义词:guy, exact, kid, razz, poke fun at, to make fun of He teased Mary with a jest.他说俏皮话逗玛丽。
n. 技术统治论者；专家政治论者；技术统治 Mr Makoni , a respected technocrat , has at least a chance .马科尼先生，这位令人爱戴的技术统治论者，至少还有机会。
adj. 沉闷的；冗长乏味的 同义词:dreary, dreich It would , however, be very tedious and difficult to write all information in binary code .把所有的信息都翻译成二进制码是十分枯燥和困难的。
n. [地质] 玻陨石；[地质] 熔融石；似曜岩类 同义词:queenstownite
n. （美）地震 同义词:earthquake, seismic event, seismos A few miles away, a government building stands virtually untouched by last Monday 's temblor .几英里之外，政府大楼巍然耸立，丝毫没有被地震撼动的迹象。
n. 戒酒；节欲；（气候等的）温和 adj. 温暖的；有节制的 同义词:abstinence, nephalism, warm, moderate Exercise , temperance , fresh air , and needful rest are the best of all physicians .锻炼，好脾气，清新空气和合理的休息对身体最有好处。
n. 速度，发展速度；拍子 同义词:speed, rate, beat The army and marines say morale remains strong but , equally , they say the current tempo cannot go on indefinitely .陆军和陆战队表示士气仍然高涨，然而同样地，现时这种状态不会无限期的继续下去。
n. 原则；信条；教义 同义词:principle, belief, teaching, doctrine, creed I think that 's just a very basic tenet of being a creature of the world .我认为这是存在这个世界上的生物所要具有一个最基本的原则信念。
n. 男高音；要旨，大意；票据的限期；稳定的进程 adj. 男高音的 同义词:general idea, main points The tenor of his speech was that hard work brings success .他演讲的大意是说努力工作是成功之母。
adj. 试验性的，暂定的；踌躇的 n. 假设，试验 同义词:experimental, cut-and-try, hypothesis, proof, experiment, try All theories , however , are tentative and are subject to criticism .然而，所有的理论都是试验性的，都会遭到批判。
vt. 使终止；使结束；解雇 vi. 结束，终止；结果 adj. 结束的 同义词:fulfill, drop, kill, result, drop, determine, pass, set, ended, closing, over, past, concluding to terminate a partnership终止伙伴关系
n. 术语，术语学；用辞 同义词:technology, onym The terminology of financial markets can be imprecise .金融市场术语的定义也许不那么精准。
n. 赤土陶器；赤陶土；棕橙色 Look , all these terra-cotta warriors and horses face the same direction . Why so ?瞧，所有这些秦俑及战马都面朝同一方向，这是为什么？
adj. 地球的；陆地的，[生物] 陆生的；人间的 n. 陆地生物；地球上的人 同义词:earthly, telluric He hopes to distribute it on terrestrial television soon .他希望尽快在无线电视上播放。
n. 领土，领域；范围；地域；版图 同义词:domain, province, world, extent, boundary, region, kingdom We ask to be the sole agent for your clocks in our territory .有人问我们把你的钟表在我们区域的代理权卖给他。
n. 恐怖主义；恐怖行动；恐怖统治 Climate change , poverty , disease , terrorism -- each issue on its own is enough to consume all of our time .气候变化、贫穷、疾病、恐怖主义，等等，每个问题都足以耗尽我们所有的时间。
adj. 简洁的，精练的，扼要的 同义词:brief, summary, compact, concise Professor Dressel had written a terse note just below the grade : " See me after class . ""德雷斯尔教授在分数下面写了简短的一句话：“下课后来见我。
n. [法] 证词，证言；证据 同义词:proof, witness The prospect of new testimony and additional Cross-examinations soured him still more .重新作证和更多的盘问的前景使他更加苦恼了。
art. 这；那 adv. 更加（用于比较级，最高级前） I bought a car yesterday. The car is very expensive.我昨天买了一辆小汽车，这辆车很贵。
item.phonetic: [辅音前读作 ðə; 元音前和j-; hi-; he-; hə-前常读作ði; 罕强'ði; ,ði; 强ði:; 在元音前有时用作弱式; 元音前弱 ði; 辅音前弱 ðə; ð]

item.trans: adv. 其后；从那时以后 同义词:subsequently, thenceforth But , thereafter , he limited his drinking to a glass of wine after supper .不过从那以后，他就限制自己晚饭后只喝一杯葡萄酒了。
n. 入口；门槛；开始；极限；临界值 同义词:entry, conception, limitation, beginning, opening The gain is now well above the ( lowered ) oscillation threshold .此时，增益大大超过（降低了的）振荡阈值。
vi. 繁荣，兴旺；茁壮成长 同义词:succeed, flower The region is thriving.这个地区繁荣起来了。
n. 节流阀；[车辆] 风门；喉咙 vt. 压制，扼杀；使……窒息；使……节流 vi. 节流，减速；窒息 同义词:throttling valve, THORT, kill, silence, slow down, speed reduction They throttled the watchman and robbed the bank.他们勒死了看守人，抢劫了银行。
vt. 挫败；反对；阻碍；横过 adj. 横放的；固执的 n. 划手座；独木舟的横梁 adv. 横过 prep. 横过 同义词:defeat, combat, slow, fixed, persistent, set, across We successfully thwarted the enemy's conspiracy.我们成功地挫败了敌人的阴谋。
n. 甲状腺；甲状软骨；甲状腺剂 adj. 甲状腺的；盾状的 同义词:hypothyroid, scutum, peltate, scutiform Iodine tends to localize in thyroid .碘易集中于甲状腺内。
vt. 使发痒；使高兴；使满足 vi. 觉得痒；（东西）使人发痒 n. 胳肢；痒感；使人发痒、高兴的东西 同义词:please, glad, satisfy, content He tickled my feet with a feather.他用羽毛搔我的脚。

adj. 紧的；密封的；绷紧的；麻烦的；严厉的；没空的；吝啬的 adv. 紧紧地；彻底地 同义词:severe, hard, fast, sealed, rigorous, thoroughly, entirely, completely, fully, fast Tight credit could suppress any rebound in spending , furthermore .此外，信贷紧缩可能抑制开支复苏苗头。
vi. 倾斜；翘起；以言词或文字抨击 vt. 使倾斜；使翘起 n. 倾斜 同义词:pitch, slope, lean, slope, lean, slope, pitch, clino The girl tilted her head forward.女孩把头向前倾。
prep. 乘以 v. 使…相乘（time的第三人称单数） n. 时代（time的复数）；[数] 次数 同义词:eras Two times four is eight.2乘以4得8。
n. 淡色；些许味道；风味 vt. 微染；使带气息 同义词:flavor, delicate colour The child's cheeks are tinged with red.孩子的脸蛋微带红色。
n. 补锅匠；修补匠；焊锅；（美）小鲭鱼 vi. 做焊锅匠；焊补；笨手笨脚地做事 vt. 修补；粗修 同义词:weld up, burn on, piece up, patch up He tinkered with my old clock.他马马虎虎地修理我的旧钟。
n. 纸巾；薄纱；一套 vt. 饰以薄纱；用化妆纸揩去 同义词:set, gauze a pool tissued with ice水面结薄冰的池塘
adj. 巨大的；四价钛的 同义词:huge, tremendous, enormous, massive, macro From light saber battles to the sinking of the Titanic , some special effects seem almost magical .从刀光剑影的战争到泰坦尼克号的沉没，有些特效看上去简直就是魔法。
n. 学步的小孩；幼童装 In fact , the toddler averages about four ear aches per year .事实上，刚刚学步的小孩每年平均会有四次耳朵疼。
n. 音调；色调 同义词:tone, hues I focused more on being relaxed and having clear, deep and slow tonality .我更加注重放松，并且发音低沉而又缓慢。
n. [耳鼻喉] 扁桃腺切除术 Tonsillectomy and curettement of adenoid are the effective way to treat children OSRD .扁桃体切除和（或）腺样体刮除是治疗儿童OSRD有效方法。
adj. 地志的；地形学的（等于topographic） 同义词:physiographic Topographical detail visible in daylight is printed in subdued colours .白昼可见的地形起伏部采用色调柔和的颜色印刷。
vi. 倾倒；倒塌；摇摇欲坠 vt. 推翻；颠覆；使倒塌 同义词:collapse, founder, collapse, upset The bicycle toppled down to the ground.自行车倒在了地上。
n. 表层土；上层土 Villagers may be persuaded to build terraces to stop topsoil running off .村民会被劝说建造更多的梯田好让表层土不被冲刷掉。
n. 墨西哥玉米粉圆饼（tortilla的复数） Tortillas are made from finely ground corn or flour .玉米饼是用细玉米面和面粉做的。
vt. 折磨；拷问；歪曲 n. 折磨；拷问；歪曲 同义词:harry, colour, worry, trouble, tear, violence, ordeal The secret police tortured him to obtain information.秘密警察拷问他以获取情报。
adj. 全部的；完全的；整个的 vt. 总数达 vi. 合计 n. 总数，合计 同义词:entire, all, overall, complete, absolute, to the amount of, amount, aggregate, sum, amount, gross He told me to total those numbers.他让我把那些数字加起来。
adj. 极权主义的 n. 极权主义者 In present or formerly totalitarian countries , this downward cycle is even more apparent .在当今以及过去的那些极权国家里，这种萧条周期更加明显。
vt. 兜售；招徕；刺探赛马情报 vi. 兜售；招徕顾客；拉选票 n. 侦查者；兜售者 同义词:drum up, hawk, seek a vote We should tout our wares on television.我们应该在电视上兜售商品。
adj. 有毒的；中毒的 同义词:poisonous, virous The House and Senate each passed bills the next year to control toxic substances .美众议院与参议院各自通过了明年的控制有毒物质的法案。
n. 毒素；毒质 This toxin comes from the bacterium that produces the poisons responsible for causing botulism .这种毒素来自细菌，它们产生一种能引起肉素中毒的毒素。
n. 贸易，交易；行业；职业 vi. 交易，买卖；以物易物 vt. 用…进行交换 同义词:commerce, profession, employment, career, pursuit, traffic, exchange, truck Our company trades with many foreign companies.我们公司和许多外国公司进行贸易。
n. 特性，特点；品质；少许 同义词:quality, tang, identity, sort, distinction The same genes can often control more than one physical trait at a time .同样的基因通常在一个时期可以控制一种以上的物理特性。
adj. 叛逆的；不忠的；背叛的 同义词:treasonous, disloyal Now the president 's people boast that the " traitorous " opposition has been broken and the country is back to normal .现在总统支持者们宣扬“背信弃义的”反对党已经被瓦解，国家生活恢复正常。
n. [物] 轨道，轨线；[航][军] 弹道 同义词:path, track, railway, orbit Continuing that trajectory , the markets will be in perfect synch by the end of next year .若按照这个轨道继续下去，两类市场将在明年底前达到完全同步。
adj. 大西洋彼岸的，横渡大西洋的；美国的 同义词:American It is where transatlantic cables that carry much of Britain 's telephone and internet traffic land .这就是跨大西洋电缆承载着英国人电话和互联网流量的那片土地。
vt. 转录；抄写 同义词:to copy The secretary transcribed those letters on the typewriter.秘书用打字机打出了那些信。
vt. 改变，使…变形；转换 vi. 变换，改变；转化 同义词:influence, fashion, vary, innovate, veer from, to change A little paint will transform this old car.喷点漆就能让这辆旧车变个模样。
n. 晶体管（收音机） 同义词:tansistor A tube or a transistor can amplify an incoming signal .电子管和晶体管能放大输入的信号。
vt. 传输；传播；发射；传达；遗传 vi. 传输；发射信号 同义词:release, send, communicate, project, let go He has transmitted the report to us.他已经把报告传送给我们。

n. [电讯] 发射机，[通信] 发报机；传达人 同义词:sender, communicator The transmitter sends out short intense bursts or pulses of energy with a relatively long interval between pulses .发射机发出的是短促而又强烈的，具有相当长的时间间隔的能量“突发”即能量脉冲。
adj. 跨国的；超越国界的 The transnational corporation is out to capture the European market .该跨国公司旨在夺取欧洲市场。

n. （英）[数] 梯形（等于trapezoid）；（美）[数] 不规则四边形；大多角骨 同义词:ladder type, en echelon At the heart of the artwork is a set of four monstrously massive stars, collectively called Trapezium .在艺术品的心脏地带是四颗怪兽般的大质量恒星的集合体，统称为猎户座四边形。
n. [外科] 创伤（由心理创伤造成精神上的异常）；外伤 同义词:wound, vulnus Listen to a child 's repeated telling of his / her trauma experience .倾听孩子一遍遍讲述给他/她造成创伤的经历。
n. 穿过；横贯；横木 vt. 穿过；反对；详细研究；在…来回移动 vi. 横越；旋转；来回移动 adj. 横贯的 同义词:crossrail, ledger strip, combat, thread, circle, wheel, spin, transcurrent He traversed the desert alone .他独自一人穿越沙漠。
n. 国库，金库；财政部；宝库 同义词:chest, public purse Low and stable Treasury yields have been a factor .国债收益稳固持低一向是个影响因素。
n. 沟，沟渠；战壕；堑壕 vt. 掘沟 vi. 挖战壕；侵害 同义词:sulcus, reen, infringe upon, infringe on to trench land for draining在地面挖沟排水
adj. 尖刻的；锐利的；苛刻的；锋利的（名词trenchancy，副词trenchantly） 同义词:severe, pointed, sharp, cutting, bitter Some of their comments were quite trenchant .他们的有些批评十分尖锐。
n. 三角（形）；三角关系；三角形之物；三人一组 同义词:trigona, Misumi No , the triangle is wet !不，三角形是湿的！
adj. 部落的；种族的 同义词:ethnic, racial Among tribal people all knowledge inherited by tradition .在部落中，通过传统继承的知识。

n. 三分法，人类三分（指肉体，灵魂，精神）；三断法，三相法 Based on the trichotomy of fuzzy theory a synthetic evaluation model was set up for structure capability of inhered road .从三分法的基本原理出发，建立了原有道路结构性能的模糊综合评价模型，并将其应用于实际工程的道路结构性能评价。
vt. 修剪；整理；装点 vi. 削减 n. 修剪；整齐；情形 adj. 整齐的 同义词:shear, arrange, crop, cut to the bone, cut down to, status, shear, regularity, ordered, regular, straight, soigne to trim up a room把房间收拾整齐
adj. 三倍的；三方的 n. 三倍数；三个一组 vi. 增至三倍 vt. 使成三倍 同义词:trinary, threefold, ternion, triad, trifold, treble They tripled their sales last year.他们去年的销售额增至三倍。
adj. 陈腐的；平庸的；老一套的 同义词:banal, bromidic It is tempting to dismiss this trite formulation as a meaningless excuse for inaction .有人认为政府试图用这样的陈词是政府不作为的晦涩借口。
adj. 不重要的，琐碎的；琐细的 同义词:small, unimportant Nobody calls these issues trivial — but they are also among the hardest to deal with .没有人认为这些议题是微不足道的——但他们也是最难以处理的问题。
n. [生化] 色氨酸 Drink a glass of milk . It contains tryptophan , which as it is metabolized is converted to mood - boosting serotonin .喝一杯牛奶。牛奶里含有色氨酸，颠末新陈代谢后可以转换成提高情绪的血清素。
n. 肺结核；结核病 同义词:phthisis The Global Fund to Fight AIDS , Tuberculosis and Malaria requested a study to see if the interventions were helping .全球抗艾滋病、结核病和疟疾基金要求进行一项研究以确定是否干预是有益的。
adj. 管状的 同义词:tubiform, fistuliform Blood incompatibilities can also result in tubular damage and severe oliguria .血型不合也能导致肾小管损害和严重的少尿。
vi. 摔倒；倒塌；滚动；打滚；仓惶地行动 vt. 使摔倒；使滚翻；弄乱 n. 跌倒；翻斤斗；跌跤 同义词:collapse, founder, founder, mess, falling down, circumgyration She tumbled off her bicycle.她从自行车上摔了下来。
n. [动力] 涡轮；[动力] 涡轮机 So why not attach the magnets directly to the external , rotating parts of the turbine ?那为什么不把磁体直接放置在涡轮机外部旋转的部件上呢？
adj. 骚乱的，混乱的；狂暴的；吵闹的 同义词:angry, chaotic, troubled, confused IT HAS been another turbulent week for the euro .对于欧元而言，这又是充满骚乱的一周。
n. 混乱，骚动 同义词:combustion, disorder, chaos, confusion, involvement Turmoil was not avoided : the insurgency of 1972 - 79 was proof of that.骚乱并没有得到避免“1972-79年的起义就是最好的证明。
vt. 转动，使旋转；转弯；翻过来；兑换 vi. 转向；转变；转动 n. 转弯；变化 同义词:wheel, roll, shift, roll, screw, variation, shift, change, diversification, mutation Is it electricity that turns the wheel?是电使轮子转动的吗?

n. 翻覆；营业额；流通量；半圆卷饼；[篮球]失误 adj. 翻过来的；可翻转的 同义词:volume of business, rollover, upturned, eversible Similar to receivable turnover , the inventory turnover also tells us the speed of fund turnover and the liquidity .同应收账款周转率相类似，存货周转率也会告诉我们资金的周转速度和流动性。
n. 类型学；血型学；象征主义；象征论 同义词:symbolism, iconology DeShong, M. " Housing Typology and Urban Morphology : London and Paris . " 1990 .居住类型学与都市形态学：伦敦与巴黎＞，1990。
adj. 残暴的；暴君的；专横的 同义词:ruffianly, atrocious The people soon reacted against the tyrannical system .人们不久便起来反抗暴政。
n. [生化] 酪氨酸 同义词:Tyr The drugs work by preventing an enzyme called tyrosine kinase from launching a signaling cascade that fuels tumor cell growth .这些药物的作用机制是阻断酪氨酸激酶启动信号级联反应，后者可以促进肿瘤细胞生长。
n. [病理] 溃疡；腐烂物；道德败坏 同义词:sore, demoralization Gastritis may cause symptoms resembling those of peptic ulcer .胃炎可引起类似消化性溃疡的症状。

adj. 最终的；极限的；根本的 n. 终极；根本；基本原则 同义词:final, organic, fundamental, radical, underlying, telos, fundamental principle Indeed , many college students do not select their ultimate career path until after they graduate .当然，很多大学生直到他们毕业才会选择他们的最终职业道路。
adj. 放肆的；无拘束的；激烈的 v. 放纵（unbridle的过去分词形式）；卸下马辔头 同义词:acute, licentious His annoyance had unbridled his tongue.他的烦恼使他喋喋不休。
vt. 廉价出售；较便宜的工资工作；从下边削球 vi. 底切 n. 底切；牛腰部下侧嫩肉；砍口；切球 同义词:bargain sale The plastic surgeon undercut the skin of her cheek.整容外科医生将她的脸皮下部切开。
vt. 经历，经受；忍受 [过去式underwent 过去分词undergone 现在分词undergoing ] 同义词:experience, stand, stomach, tough, abide The city has undergone many changes during the last ten years.这个城市在过去十年中经历了很多变化。
adj. 潜在的；根本的；在下面的；优先的 v. 放在…的下面；为…的基础；优先于（underlie的ing形式） 同义词:organic, potential, fundamental, preferred, ultimate Shale underlies the coal.页岩层在煤层下面。
vt. 破坏，渐渐破坏；挖掘地基 同义词:destroy, founder The soldiers undermined the wall.兵士们在墙下面挖地道。
vt. 巩固；支持；从下面支撑；加强…的基础 同义词:cement, encourage, strengthen, carry, second to underpin a sagging building加强下陷房屋的基础
adj. 单院的；一院制的 The unicameral parliament of Israel .以色列共和国的单院的议会。

n. 统一；一致；联合 同义词:accordance, alliance, agreement, identity, combination, union, association The traded value of the Deutschmark had not fallen to reflect the higher unit wage costs that were a legacy of the unification boom .东西德统一带来的经济繁荣使德国单位工资成本较高，而德国马克的贸易值并未下降以反映这一点。
n. 和谐；齐唱；同度；[声] 同音 同义词:accordance, concert On the screen Moxy the cartoon dog in his funky toon room dances unison .与此同时，卡通狗莫西也会在屏幕上他那个时髦的桃木屋里随之起舞。
n. 普遍性；广泛性；一般性；多方面性 同义词:catholicity, generalizability One might question the universality of this method .有人会怀疑这个方法的普遍性。
adj. 无比的；无双的；空前未有的 同义词:matchless, incomparable Even that tentative upturn relied on unparalleled looseness in fiscal and monetary policy .经济试探性的好转也仅是得益于其独一无二的财政和货币紧缩政策。
adj. 空前的；无前例的 同义词:unheard-of, all-time I think this is an unprecedented time .我认为这是一个空前的时期。
adj. （论据等）站不住脚的；不能维持的；不能租赁的；难以防守的 同义词:indefensible If the Pru loses the vote , the management 's position would be untenable .如果保诚的计划被股东投票否决，这个管理层将站不住脚。
adj. 不能独立生存的 Using the unviable jar will be the best , then can feel free to drink .贮藏用的高山茶茶叶罐最好为不透明之密闭容器请安心饮用。
adj. 无根据的；无保证的 同义词:baseless, rootless Rather than thinking , " I am now displaying unwarranted trust , " you just feel … off .你不会去考虑“我现在表现出的是无道理的信任”，而只会感觉…不好。
adj. 笨拙的；笨重的；不灵便的；难处理的 同义词:problem, awkward, clumsy But they are unwieldy for the sorts of far- flung wars it has been fighting in Iraq and Afghanistan .但英国人不切实际的目标，是那场在遥远的伊拉克和阿富汗进行的战争。
adj. 不知情的；不知不觉的，无意的 v. 使精神错乱；使丧失智能（unwit的ing形式） 同义词:uninitiated, involuntary Mosquitoes unwitting new ally in the war on infectious diseases — conservationists .环境保护主义者在不知不觉中成了蚊子传播疾病的新帮凶。
n. 上升气流；[建] 向上之排气 adj. [建] 向上通风的 Some viewers wondered if they were scraps of paper or plastic caught in updrafts from the spotlights ' heat .有些人以为这些物体可能是聚光灯发光时产生的热量捕捉到的漂浮在高空的纸片或塑料碎片。
vt. 使升级；提升；改良品种 n. 升级；上升；上坡 adv. 往上 adj. 向上的 同义词:promote, prefer, rise, raise, updates, ascension, upward, up to upgrade a clerk to manager将办事员提升为经理
n. 剧变；隆起；举起 同义词:up with, lift Is the world facing a new food - price upheaval ?世界正在面临粮食价格新剧变吗？
adj. 迎合高层次消费者的；质优价高的 vt. 升高一级 同义词:upmarket My colleague used to work as a receptionist at an upscale salon .我的同事过去时在一家高档沙龙作一位接待员。
adj. 北部的；偏僻的 n. 州的北部 adv. 在州的北部；在州内远离大城市地区 同义词:northern, remote, lonely IT IS what passes for a winter 's day upstate São Paulo.这是今年冬天圣保罗州北部发生的事情。
n. 高潮，高涨 vi. 涌起，高涨 同义词:wave, climax, gather steam, comb Water upsurged rapidly.水迅速上涨。
n. 情况好转 vt. 使……转朝上；翻转 vi. 向上 同义词:evert to upturn the ground翻起土地
n. [化学] 铀 Uranium is a big factor too.铀也是一个很大的因素。
n. 顽童，淘气鬼；海胆；刺猥 同义词:monkey, elf U is an Urchin , a mischievous boy.是顽童，调皮又捣蛋。
vt. 篡夺；夺取；侵占 vi. 篡夺；篡权 同义词:seize, snatch up Little by little he usurped his boss's authority.他逐渐地篡夺老板的权力。
vt. 利用 同义词:do with, trade on, capitalize on, avail of, presume on We must utilize all available resources.我们必须利用可以得到的一切资源。
n. 空缺；空位；空白；空虚 同义词:gap, blank I see a vacancy board outside for a kitchen helper . Is it still available?我在外面招工牌上看到有个厨房帮手的空缺。这空位现在还有吗？
n. 疫苗；牛痘苗 adj. 疫苗的；牛痘的 同义词:bacterin The decision to make pandemic vaccine is a gamble .制造大流行流感疫苗的决定是一次赌博。
n. 真空；空间；真空吸尘器 adj. 真空的；利用真空的；产生真空的 vt. 用真空吸尘器清扫 同义词:room, gamma space She vacuumed the room this morning.她今天上午用吸尘器清扫了房间。
adj. 模糊的；含糊的；不明确的；暧昧的 同义词:fuzzy, dark, uncertain vague commitments only serves to create fears that little substance lies behind the words .含糊的承诺只会引发人们担忧：在相关言辞背后很少有实质内容。

n. 帷幔，挂布；窗帘上部的短幔 同义词:dossal, antependium Lighting valance / base cabinet : the base cabinet is composed of shelf , bottom panel, side panel , door panels , front and back setting levers .灯线/地柜。地柜是由层板、底板、侧板、门板、前后拉挡这些板件构成。
n. [计] 有效性；正确；正确性 同义词:availability, right As of February 11 , 2005 , the validity of these clearances has been extended .自2005年2月11日起，审核的有效期已经被延长了。
n. 虚荣心；空虚；浮华；无价值的东西 同义词:blank, mud The least defensible motive is vanity .最牵强的理由就是虚荣心。
adj. 变量的；可变的；易变的，多变的；变异的，[生物] 畸变的 n. [数] 变量；可变物，可变因素 同义词:mobile, liquid, unstable Fixed , variable , and mixed costs can be graphed as functions of their cost drivers .固定、变、合成本可以以其成本动因的不同功能用图表表示。
adj. 静脉曲张的；曲张的，肿胀的 同义词:swollen, cirsoid Haemorrhoids (piles) are varicose veins that occur inside, on or just outside the anus .痔是由肛管内外的血管曲张引起的。
adj. 各种各样的；多方面的 同义词:varieties of, miscellaneous QUOTE】 The judge quoted various cases in support of his opinion .那法官引证许多不同的案例来支持他的意见。
adj. [生物] 血管的 同义词:hemal, vasal The development of coronary atheros -elerosis reduces the capacity of the vascular bed adapt to hypoxic stress .动脉硬化的发展降低了血管床适应血氧压力的能力。
n. 矢量；带菌者；航线 vt. 用无线电导航 同义词:carrier, lane It is proposed that the drift of the continents was vectored by westward forces.大陆的漂移被认为是由向西的力造成的。
n. 素食者；食草动物 adj. 素食的 同义词:veggie, herbivore, meatless, maigre Bonnie cooks vegetarian meals for her seven children still living there .邦妮给仍然居住在她家的七个孩子做素食饭菜。
n. 植被；植物，草木；呆板单调的生活 同义词:plant, vegetative cover This means removing all vegetation , right down to the soil .这意味着把所有的植被埋到土壤里面。
adj. 激烈的，猛烈的；热烈的 同义词:fierce, acute, violent, hard, furious I seemed to feel in him some vehement power that was struggling within him .我好象感觉到一种猛烈的力量正在他身体里奋力挣扎。
n. [力] 速率；迅速；周转率 同义词:speed rate, expedition But such velocity antiatoms are not very useful .不过这种高速的反原子并不是很有用。
n. 天鹅绒，丝绒；天鹅绒似的东西 adj. 天鹅绒的 同义词:continental quilt, velour It feels like velvet to me .我摸起来像天鹅绒。
n. 卖主；小贩；[贸易] 自动售货机 同义词:peddler, packman This installation package is not supported by this processor type . Contact your product vendor .这个处理器类型不支持该安装程序包。请与产品供应商联系。
n. 外表；虚饰；饰面；胶合板的一层；薄木片 vt. 胶合；虚饰；给…镶以饰片 同义词:facing, person, garment, gild to veneer a pine desk with mahogany用桃花心木薄板镶在松木桌上
adj. 庄严的，值得尊敬的；珍贵的 同义词:precious, golden, solemn, sacred, majestic These venerable glasses disappeared a couple of weeks ago .这副有年头的墨镜前几周不见了。
n. 复仇；报复；报仇 同义词:revenge, revanche Now that wealth effect has reversed with a vengeance .目前，这种财富效应已出现报复性逆转。
n. 毒液；恶意 vt. 使有毒；放毒 同义词:spite, malice, envenom He lowered his voice and said with venom over his lemon squash.他把声音压低，一边喝柠檬汁一边恶狠狠地说着。
n. （感情的）发泄；出口；通风孔 vt. 发泄感情；放出…；给…开孔 vi. 放出；（通过排泄等）减轻压力 同义词:exit, way out, relieve one's feelings, reel out, let off to vent smoke排放烟雾
vt. 敢于 vi. 冒险；投机 n. 企业；风险；冒险 同义词:dare to, be bold to, adventure, take a risk, enterprise, risk, undertaking, throw Men ventured their lives in war.人们在战争中冒着生命的危险。
n. 结论；裁定 同义词:conclusion, ruling Muslim groups immediately said they would appeal against the verdict .穆斯林团体立即表示将对该裁决提出上诉。
vi. 濒临，接近；处在边缘 n. 边缘 同义词:go on for, come close to, margin, brink, suburb, beaded edge He had taken over an old company verging on liquidation.他接办了一家行将破产的老公司。
n. 可验证性；能证明 Later,findings verified the scientist's theory.后来的发现证实了这位科学家的理论。

n. 逼真，貌似真实；逼真的事物 同义词:lifelikeness, photorealistic Skeptics contend the shroud is a medieval hoax or forgery - or even a devotional work of artistic verisimilitude .怀疑论者声称这块裹尸布是中世纪的愚弄或伪造物——或者是一块艺术逼真的信仰作品。
adj. 本国的；地方的；用本地语写成的 n. 本地话，方言；动植物的俗名 同义词:native, patrial, provincialism, patois The vitality of Latin was doomed to wane before the rivalry of the vernacular tongue .拉丁语的持续性遇到本国语言的竞争而注定衰弱。
n. 多功能性；多才多艺；用途广泛 同义词:multifunctionality Their versatility makes them extremely useful for medical research .它们的多功能性非常适合用于医疗研究。
n. 版本；译文；倒转术 同义词:edition, translation The witness corroborated her version of the event .证人证实了她对那事件的看法。
n. 顶点；[昆] 头顶；[天] 天顶 同义词:height, summit, sky, peak, apex We shall present some of the basic properties of the vertex and edge chromatic numbers .我们将介绍顶点色数和边色数的一些基本性质。
adj. 垂直的，直立的；[解剖] 头顶的，顶点的 n. 垂直线，垂直面 同义词:standing, perpendicular, perpendicular plane, perpendicular line We call this the vertical migration .我们叫他们垂直迁徙。
n. 船，舰；[组织] 脉管，血管；容器，器皿 同义词:container, ship, pocket a vessel of wrath遭天罚的人
n. 遗迹；残余；退化的器官 同义词:remain, leaving, relic A human being has the vestige of a tail .人类仍有尾巴退化的痕迹。
adj. 可行的；能养活的；能生育的 同义词:feasible, working This proved that the technology , although still at an early stage , was viable .这表明：该技术尽管仍处于萌芽阶段，但确是可行的。
n. 维希（法国城市） The Vichy in France during the Second World War were German Stooges .法国的维希在二战期间成为了德国的傀儡政府。
n. 邻近，附近；近处 They sense soil moisture in the immediate vicinity of the cup.他们能对直接接近林子的土壤水分作出感应。
n. 受害人；牺牲品；牺牲者 同义词:sacrificial lamb My first victim was you young brother .我的第一个受害人是你的弟弟。
n. 胜利者 同义词:winner, conqueror Victor says that when he calls back , Mason had better have an answer .维克多说，等他再打电话过来时，梅森最好给他一个答复。
n. 邪恶；恶行；坏事；罪恶 同义词:crime, evil, sin, bad, wrong Of course , we will never give in to villainy .当然，我们永远不会向邪恶屈服。
n. 葡萄酒商；酿造葡萄酒的人 The vintner worked the wine in big oak vats .酒商在大橡木桶中酿酒。
n. 乙烯基 同义词:ethenyl Roller Foot : good for stitching on leather , synthetic suede , and vinyl .滚轴压脚：适用于缝制皮革、仿麂皮和薄膜。
n. 中提琴，中提琴演奏者 We usually have more callous on the left hand , and the viola is bigger .主要是我们的左手经常会磨出硬茧，而且中提琴的尺寸也要稍微大一点。
adj. 处女的；纯洁的；未经利用的，处于原始状态的 n. 处女 同义词:stainless, pure, white, Parthenos, demi-vierge The peasant girl adores the statue of Virgin Mary .这个农家姑娘非常崇拜圣母玛丽亚的塑像。
adj. 梦想的；幻影的 n. 空想家；梦想者；有眼力的人 同义词:dreamy, adream, daydreamer, fancier So isn't the visionary Mr Obama just sloganeering ?由此看，难道充满幻想的奥巴马不是在空喊口号吗？
adj. 视觉的，视力的；栩栩如生的 同义词:optical, Life-like Nearsightedness is a visual defect .近视是一个视力缺陷。
adj. 硫酸的；刻薄的 同义词:acid, acrimonious Even the Liberal Democrat candidate — not fancied to triumph — reports vitriolic abuse on some doorsteps .即使是从不幻想胜利的自由民主党候选人报告了一些上门的刻薄虐待。
n. 生动；活泼；明亮 同义词:animation, brightness Your telling of the story lacks vividness and variety .你讲的故事缺乏生动性和变化。
adj. 歌唱的；声音的，有声的 n. 声乐作品；元音 同义词:audio, sonic, vowel But should we lengthen or shorten vocal folds to raise frequency ?不过是要拉长声带还是缩短声带来升高频率？

adj. [化学] 挥发性的；不稳定的；爆炸性的；反覆无常的 n. 挥发物；有翅的动物 同义词:unstable, explosive Also the best trades often crop up at the point when investors are most nervous and markets are most volatile .同样，最景气的行业也总是在投资者们最紧张、市场最不稳定的情况下突然出现。
adj. 大量的；多卷的，长篇的；著书多的 同义词:massive, extensive, substantial, macro, much He is a voluminous writer .他是个多产作家。
vi. 进行；发动；从事 n. 工资；代价；报偿 vt. 进行；开展 同义词:progress, do, price, expense, pay, cost, do, carry with to wage a struggle进行一场斗争
n. 墙壁，围墙；似墙之物 vt. 用墙围住，围以墙 adj. 墙壁的 同义词:enclosure, fence, inwall, mural to wall a room with books用图书作墙围住的房间；在房间四壁设置图书
n. 战士，勇士；鼓吹战争的人 同义词:champion, fighter, brave The death of one warrior will not cast a cloud between them forever .尽管一位战士死了，但他们之间决不会永远蒙上阴影的。
n. 路旁 adj. 路旁的 同义词:roadside, roadside I change my dress for her night after night, leaving the tattered cumber of the old in the wayside inns when the day dawns.每个夜晚都为她换上新装，每个清晨，我都将褴褛的旧衣留在路旁的客栈里。
adj. 楔形的；V形的 同义词:cuneate, sphenoidal The checkgate mainly includes frame , poling board , wedge -shaped device and etc .堰门主要有堰框、堰板、楔型装置等部件组成。
vt. 焊接；使结合；使成整体 vi. 焊牢 n. 焊接；焊接点 同义词:combine, bond, jointing, soldering to weld the crack in the water pipe焊接水管的裂缝
n. 幸福；康乐 同义词:happiness, welfare Some regional trade deals in the right circumstances have indeed added to economic well-being .在适当情况下，一些区域性的贸易协议的确能在经济上锦上添花。
n. 奇想；一时的兴致；怪念头；幻想 同义词:vagary, fancy Now he is subjecting Parliament to whim .现在他强迫国会听命于自己的率性政治。
n. 旋转运动；旋转玩具；陀螺 同义词:top, rotary movement The kid was happy when he saw whirligig going round.那小孩看到不停转动的旋转木马非常高兴。
adj. 白色的；白种的；纯洁的 n. 白色；洁白；白种人 同义词:stainless, pure, leuko, chalkiness Snow is cold and white .雪很冷而且是白色的。
adj. 完整的；纯粹的 n. 整体；全部 同义词:complete, pure, integrated, full, intact, full, integer Germany , however , is not whole zone .但是，德国并不是整个欧元区。
adj. 批发的；大规模的 n. 批发 adv. 大规模地；以批发方式 vt. 批发 vi. 批发；经营批发业 同义词:mass, wide-scale, sales by bulk, cosmically This kind of wine wholesales at $50 per case.这种葡萄酒批发每箱50美元。
n. 宽度；广度 同义词:breadth, extents The purpose is to keep the tree within height and width bounds for more economical management .目的是使树冠保持在一定的高度和宽度的范围内，更经济地管理。
n. 假发；要人；头脑 vt. 使戴假发；斥责 vi. 激动；发狂 同义词:brain, personage, tongue, carpet, warm, fire The wig is tied in a ponytail in the back .这个假发在后面梳成马尾辫。

adj. 犹豫不决的；不容分辨的 adv. 乱七八糟地；不管愿不愿意地 同义词:dithery, indecisive, arsy-varsy The Chinese are acquiring resources all around the world and willy- nilly , an overseas empire that threatens U .中国正在拢络世界各地的资源，并势所必然地构筑了一个威胁美国利益的海外帝国。
n. 挡风玻璃 How can you see out the windshield ?这样的挡风玻璃你怎么看得清楚？
n. 翼展；翼幅 Eagles have a wingspan longer than two meters .鹰的翼展超过两米。
vt. 使凋谢；使畏缩；使衰弱 vi. 枯萎；凋谢；衰弱 同义词:debilitate, devitalize, flag, damp off Flowers withered up soon after they were cut.花儿摘下不久就枯萎了。
prep. 没有；超过；在…外面 adv. 户外；在外面；没有或不显示某事物 n. 外部；外面 同义词:beyond, above, than, outside, ectad, outside, extraneousness without his reach超出他所及的范围
vt. 抵挡；禁得起；反抗 vi. 反抗 同义词:low range, strive against, strive against, come out against As a politician, he is able to withstand public criticism.作为一名政治家，他经得住公众批评。
adj. 诙谐的；富于机智的 同义词:humorous, jocose He also set an extraordinary standard for clear , dry , witty writing .他清晰、朴素、诙谐的写作风格树立了一个卓越的标准。
n. [解剖] 子宫；发源地 vt. 容纳 同义词:matrix, uterus, contain, accept, accommodate, hold up to a room wombed in warm暖融融的房间
n. 土拨鼠 同义词:groundhog, marmot He sits by woodchuck for half an hour , talking to it .他在一头山鼠旁边坐了半个小时，对它讲话。
vt. 发泄；报仇 同义词:give vent to, take revenge to wreak wrath (或desire)泄愤(或欲)
n. 花冠；圈状物 vt. 环绕（等于wreathe） vi. 盘旋（等于wreathe） 同义词:crown, lei, corolla, zone, environ, orbit, serpentuate He had to pose wearing a laurel wreath .他得摆好戴着月桂花冠的姿势。

n. 袖口；腕套；手表带 同义词:cuff, watchband Laura: It 's a UV wristband . Expose it to the sun , and it turns purple . Then put it on your wrist at the same time you apply sunscreen .这是紫外线测试手带。把它暴露在阳光下，它会变成紫色。当你涂上防晒乳的同时，把它带在手腕上。
n. [会计] 勾销；销帐；削减；报废物 同义词:cut, curtailment The car was a write -off after the accident.出事后，这辆汽车成了一堆废铁。
n. 仇外；对外国人的畏惧和憎恨 同义词:zenophobia Just as strikingly , the decline of empire has repeatedly coincided with intolerance and xenophobia .令人吃惊的是，帝国的衰落多次与不宽容和排外巧合在一起。
n. 酵母；泡沫；酵母片；引起骚动因素 同义词:bubble, foam The vacuoles of yeast cells represents persistent organelles .酵母细胞的液泡是永久性的细胞器。
adj. 黄色的；黄皮肤的 n. 黄色；黄种人；黄色颜料 vt. 使变黄或发黄 vi. 变黄或发黄 同义词:maize, xanthic, sunking, giallo Bleach keeps the white clothes from yellowing.漂白剂防止白衣服变黄。
vt. 屈服；出产；放弃 vi. 屈服，投降 n. 产量；收益 同义词:desert, quit, succumb, to surrender, crop, output, harvest, proceeds an orchard that yielded a good crop收成好的果园
n. 活力；生命力；精力；子弹声 vt. 对…挑剔 vi. 发尖啸声 同义词:vitality, vigor, spring, steam, be particular about to zing up one's face使满面春光
n. （美）分区制；都市的区域划分 Zoning and building codes could make siting tricky in some places .土地使用分区和建筑法规可能会影响某些地点的选择。
n. 急速上升；嗡嗡声；[摄] 变焦摄影 vi. 急速上升；摄象机移动 vt. 使摄象机移动 同义词:bum The prices of food have zoomed this year.今年食品价格猛涨。
